'od bye ba phrag brgya dang/ 'od gsal bye ba phrag brgya dod/ dgachud bye ba phrag brgya dang/ tshad mad dag bye ba phrag brgya dad/ dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang/ sprinam da bye ba phrag brgya dang/ lo gras

bu che bye ba phrag brgya dang/ bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang/ gya nom snang bye ba phrag brgya dang/ shin tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang/ mi na bye ba phrag brgya dad/ mi gdung bye ba phrag brgya dang/
'og min gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dag 'tshangs pa chen po ni re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dad ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang/ phyag bya pa'i phyir dang/ mchod pa'i phyir dang//
bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang/ sa mnyan pa'i phyin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// lha'i bu dbad phyag chen de la sogs pa// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha bya ba phrag brgya dag kyang//
bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang/ phyag bya ba'i phyi'i dang/ mchodara'i phyir dang bstanab kun bya ba'i phyir dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags sa/ klu'i dbar

po bya ba phrag brgya dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rtse ba phrag brgyadang/ dri za'i dbang po phyi'aphrag brgya dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po phyi ba phrag brgya dang/ nam mkha' lding gi deb da po bya ba phrag brgya dang/

mi 'am ci'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang/ lta'i pa chen po'o dbang po bya ba phrag brgyar yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang/ phyagabya ba'i phyir dang/

mchod pa'i phyi'i dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang/ tshesamanyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// mi dang mam yin pa dpag tumad/grangs med ba dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la pa lta ba'i
phyi dang phyag bya ba'i phyir dang/ mchod pa'i phyi'i dang/ bsnyan bkur bya nga'i phyir dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyi'i btsam ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// dag pas naadang/ dag

zla bsanam bye ba khrag khrig pa bum phrag mang po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang/ phyag bya ba'i phyir dang/ mchod pa'i phyir dang/ bstan bkur bya ba'i phyi'i dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ rtswa dang shing gel ba dang/ sman dad nags tshal gyi lha gang dag yin pa dag dang/ lhun po dang/ lhunapo chen po dang/ btang zung dad/ btang tsung chen bo dang/
gangs ri dang/ khor yug dang/ khor yug chen po la sogs pa ri rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad gnas dang bcos te/ btse ldan bdas la blta ba'i phyir dad/ phyag bya ba'i phyir dad
mchod pa'i phyir dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang/ chos ma nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// rgya mtsho dang/ rgya mtsho chen po dang/ chu klung dad/ chu bran dang/ mtsho
bran dang/ na tsho'u dang/ chu mig dang/ 'bab chu rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gna' dug dang bcas te// bcom ldan 'das la lto ba'i phyir dang/ phyag bya ba'i
phyir dang/ mched pa'i phyir dad/ bsan bkur bya ba'i phyir dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir btsemaldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/
yul 'khor dang/ rgyal bo'i pho brang 'khor dang/ khor rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rang gi gnas dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyi'i dang byag bya ba'i phyir dang//
mchodapa'i phyir dang// bsnyenabakur bya ba'i phyir dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhagasaso// klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dad/ nam mkha'
lding dad/ mi 'am ci deng/ lte bar+ya chen po'i gnas rnams kyi lha gang drag yin pa de dag kyang rang rang gi gnas su zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyi'i dang phyag bya ba'i phyi'i dang//
mtshadapa'i phyir dang/ bstan bkur bya ba'i phyir dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan ba das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sems can 'ga' la yang gnod pa ma

cing sgrib pa mdad// zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang/ nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang/ rgya mtsho bye ba phrag brgyar ra yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang/ phyag
bya ba'i phyir dang/ mchod pa'i phyi'i dang/ bsnyan par bya ba'i phyir dad/ tshes ma nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa yang 'khor dang bcas
te/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dad/ phyag bya ba'i phyi'i dang/ mchod pa 'phyare dad/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang/ chos mnyan pa 'o phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so//
dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can thams cad kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang/ phyag bya ba'i phyir dang/ mchod pa'i phyir dang// bsnyen bkur bya
ba'i phyir dang/ chos mnyanang 'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can da dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mos pa/ thag ban de la
ga zhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shes 'dod pa sha stag go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis pa dag dang/ gzugs dang/ gzi brjid dang/ 'od kyi ba kho thamasacud bal gyis
mnan te/lham me/ lhunan/ lhang nge'o/bdi lta ste/ dar lan nyi ma 'od byedu ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs mad pa phyung ste/ srin bu ma khyer thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/lhamam/mnan/ khyung

ngan+ta da bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ pajig rten skyong ba thams cad zil gyis mnan te/lhom mi/lhan na/lhang de// 'di lta ste/ dang ran zla yar gyi de tshos bco lnga la
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin gyi dra ba las grol ba ni skar ma'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nus/lham ma/lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang//
'jig rten skyong ba thams cad spyi bkong ste/ zil gyi mnan nas/ lham ma/ lhan na/lhung de sta/ ri rgyal po ra ba ltar dpal gyis rab tu babar te/ sku mi g.yo mi 'gyur mi 'gul bar lhamatsha/ lhan ne//
lhang dag/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sogs dang chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad cas smras so// kye rgyal ba'i
sras de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni sku mi g.yo mi 'gyur mi 'gal bar bzhugs so// de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dang ba chen po sgrib pa thams cad nam pags labs/
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bdi skad ces smras so// 'jam dpa la de bzhin gshags pa 'di la 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni rab tu bu byung bar mngon du phyogs shing/ khyim nas mngon
par 'byad bshes sa// kha cig gisa'i btubyung zhing dka' ba spyod pa la gnas shesaso// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nan gnas kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi snying gi gshegs pa shes so// kha cig gis ni

byang chub kyi snying re la bzhugs bar shasaso// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni bdud la kho'i grangs med dpag tu mad pas bskor ba bcom par shesaso// kha cig gso ni lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod

sbyin dang/ dri ba dad/ lha ma yin dad/ nam mkha' ldid dang/ mi 'am ci dad/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ rgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jige rten skyong ba dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis ded dpon chen po rgyal
yi// rgyal la nas spro bar byed par shas so// kha cig gis ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/brgya byin rnams gsol ba 'debs pa shasaso// kha cig gis tshangs pa rnams gsol gab des
bar shes so// la khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis 'jig rten skyong ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la gso la ba 'debs las shes so// kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag la sbyin pa'i gtam ston par shes so// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la tshul khrims kyi gtamaston par shes so// kha cig gisan bakhrod pa'i gtam/
khacig gis ni brtson 'grus kyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni bsam gtan gyi gtan/ kha cig gisani shes rab kyi gtam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston pa shes so//kha cig gis ni thabs
mkhas pa'i gtam/ kha cig gsani rdzu 'phrul gyi gtam/kha cig gisani smon lam gyi gtamakha cig gis yang shasakyi gtam/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston pa lags so// kha cig gis ni nyan sa/
kyi thog nga khe gtam/ kha cig ga sa nA da sangs rgyas kyi theg pa leb gtam/ kha cipa gis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston pa ngashas go/ kha cig gis ni
mas can dmyal sa skya pa'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni dud 'gror skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston pa 'a
shesaso// kha cig gis ni yi dgas su skya ba'i chos rnams/ kha cig gis ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyo ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag caga' ston pa shes so/ kha cig/
0 gis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lu'i nang du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston pa bshes so// kha cig gis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su ska ba dad/ pa cig gas ni/
'thab bral gyi gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba dang/ kha cig gis ni'aphrula dga'i gnas su/
skya ba dang/ kha cig gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su skye ba dang/ kha cig gis na bdud kyi gnas su skya pa dang/ kha cig gisani tshangs pa'i gnas su skya ba tshosa rnams bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag la ston pangashes so// de bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang/ tshangs 'khor dang/ 'od chungadang/ tshad med 'od dang/ bod gsal dang/ dgachud dang/ tshad med dag
dang dag rgyas dang/ sprin med dang/ bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu tshe dang/ mi tshe dang/ mi gdung dang/ gya nom snang dang/ shin tu mthong dang/ 'og min dang/ nam mkha' mtha'
yas skye mched dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang/ ci yang med pa'i skya mdadad/ 'du shes mda'adu shes mad min skye mchedadu skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan bdas bdag cag la
ston pa shes so// 'jam dpal ba khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni mi'i skyaba'i chos rnams/ kha cig gis ni ba khogolos sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur pa'i chos rnams/ kha cig gis
za @#/// ni grur gnyis dang/ gsum dad/ bzhi pa 'khor los sgyur ba dad/ stong gnyis dad/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad pa bdag bag 'khor 'dis sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ 'a jam dpal 'khor 'di
zla nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshags pa'i 'dom do tsam du 'phags pa shes so// kha cigags na rgyar grags tsam du 'phags kha cig gis ni rgyud grangs gnyis tsam
du khang gas/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad tsam du 'phags pa shes so// kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegasab sku dpag tshad gnyis tsam du 'phags par shes
so kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dbag tshad bcu tsam dushes so// 'khor 'di nyidakyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad stod du shes so//
kha cig gisan de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang/ nyi shu dang/ sum cu dang/ bzhi bcu dang/ lnga bcu ba shes so// kha cig gis ni dpag tshad 'bum dang/ kha cig
gis ni dbazhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu dang/ nyi shu dang/ sum cu dad/ bzhi bcu dang/ lnga bcu pa shes so/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag
tshad 'bum phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong par shas so// 'kher 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshags pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bgrangs ba las 'dus par ngashas so//
'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gsanid bzhin gshegs pa gsan gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo// kha cig gis ninar bu rin po tsho bo DUrla'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chen po a
rnyil gyi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis nir bu rin po che mthon ka chen po' kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che ska 'od kyi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che pad+maral gyi kha dog tu//

kha cig gisani nor bu rin po cha brgya byin shogs pa kha dreg tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dag tu/ kha cig gsan nor bu rin po tsha lha thamasacad snang pa'i kha dog tu/ kha

cig gis ni nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gsonanor bu rin po che chu'adang gi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu ran po tsha shel rgya la dag tur shes so/

kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha deg tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gisan nor bu rin po tsha rgyal po seng garal pa can gyi kha

dog tu/ kha cig gin nas bu rin po che sangaga'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtsa mo'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin pa che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog
sha/ tu shes so// 'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu rinapo ma'i kha dog shes so// 'jam dpal kha
dgadang/ spyod lam dad/ dbyibs gang dang gang kho nas sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la deg dang/ spyod lam dang/ dbyibs de dang de kho nar
sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo// 'jam dang mtshes bstan pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su sminapar 'gyur ba'i chos de dang de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ston par sems/
can rnams kyis shes so// 'jam dpal spyod pa gang dang gang gisasems can rnams de bzhin gshags pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'dzudacing 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de la/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa bzhugs par sems can rnams kyis shes so// 'jam dpal gal tashar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis ma khyab/ mtshungs/
pamed/ ga na ba du ma da/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjed du med pa dag/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am
ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs ba dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su gangabar gyur la/ shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/

bcas lha dad/ de bzhin du nub dang/ de bzhin du byang da/ de bzhin du shar lho dang/ de bzhin du lho nub dang/ de bzhin du nub byang dang/ de bzhin du byang shar dang/ de bzhin du stong dang/ de bzhin
du 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams da dag tu mad/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad mod/ brjod du bad pa'i yang brjed du med pa dag/
lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ driza dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' ldingadang mi 'am ci dang lce'aphye chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/
mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dag gis dpar na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag/ 'jam dpal gal te de bzhi
gshegs pa mthong bas 'dul ba yin nam/ sems can de dang de dgagis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga na 'dom gang tsam na 'khod par shes so// 'jam dang 'a kha dog dang/ spyod lam
dang/ gnas gang dang gang gsasems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa mdunan bzhugs par sems can de dag gis mthong de// 'jam dpal chos bstan
pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de dang de nyid kyis chos ston par thos so// 'jam dpa' spyod pa gang bdes sems can da dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la
thubya// 'jug par 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de 'bad bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshags pa'i mdzad pa thams cad lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtogs par 'gyur
'jam dpal 'di lta ste dang ran/ zla ba yar gyi nga'i dkyil 'khor nam phyed kyi dusan/ 'dzam bu'i gling ga sems can thams cad kyi so so'i mdun na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dug par
shes kyang/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na sems can de dag gis bdag ci'i phyir/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du shes par 'gyur bar bdag sems can de dag gi mdun na 'dug par bya'o snyam du mi
rtog rnam pa 'am rtog mod kyi/ na kyang 'jam dang lazla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan r sa lhagyis grub cing/ rnam par mi rtog la de lta bu'i bya ba 'di 'byung ngo// 'jam
dpa la de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'khor dpag tu med/ grangasamad/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du
mad tshod med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i dbus na bzhugs na 2 de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mdunan bzhugs pa mthong mod kyi/ 'jam dor la dbazhi/
gshegs pa ni sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mdunan bzhugs pa shes par 'gyur bar nga sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug par bya'o snyam du mi rtog/ rnam pa mi rtag ste/
za00'on kyang sems can rnams ji lta bu s 'dul ba de bzhin du/ dbazhin pa gshags pa mdun na bzhugs par shes so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ma'adresapa'i tshadad ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal
dbaran/sems can rnams kyi las kyi tha ma dad/ 'bring dang/ rab rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis/ sems can rnams kyi 'du byed tha ma dang/ 'bring dang/ rab rnams 'byung la/da 'du
byad rnams ni mi rtag/ rnam pas rtog sta/ 'on kyang 'du byed de dag lhun gyis grub tsaji rnam par mi rtog par thamadang/ 'bring dad/ rab rnams kyi bya ba dragal 'dug go/ 'dzam dpal da
khazhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa thamadang/ 'bring dang/ ba kyi dbang gis de bzhin
gshags pa tha ma dang/ 'bring dang/ rab dusems can rnams kyis Na bo dang/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa/
de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de lhun gyis grub par 'byungang// 'jam dpal dpar na nor bu rin pa mi d+d+he d+ham+marigs ma yis tha dad pa nyid kyis dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'jam
dbal gal te nor bu'in po che ba rnamaras sa'i po'i steng du bzhugan ni/ nor bu rin po che ba 'a dag sar por 'gyur/ gal te sa dmar po'i steng du bzhagan ni/ na bu rin po chapa m+makha
0 kukla// dog dmar por 'gyur/gal te ras sngon po'i stang du bzhag nani/ nor bu rin po che ba kha dog sngon por 'gyur te/de ltar nas kha dog cidad ci 'dra ba'i stong du bzhag
! pa de dang de nyid kyi kha dogakhen 'gyur yang/ 'jam dpalanor bu rin po che de ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam pami rtog pa de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'khyud
de/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshags pa yar sems can tha dad po nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'jamadang lagal te sems can rnams de bzhin gshag
tshoba'i sku gsar gyi kha dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba yonAnani/ da dug gis ni de bzhin gshegasang ba sku gsar gyi kha dog tu ma 'ong ngo// gal sems can rnams nor bu rin po tshape cha ma'i
kha dog lta bu s gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshags pa'i sku nor bu rin po che ba chu'i kha dog du mthong ngo// gal te samasacan rnams mu tig gi kha dog lta bu s
gdul bar bya yin nani/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshags pa'i sku mu tig gi kha dog tu mthong ngo// gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po tshaan+da rnyil gyi kha dog lta bu s gdul ba 'dul
yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku nor bu rin po che an nA sigyi kha dog tu mthong ngo// 'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog lta bu s
00 gdul bar bya ba yin nani/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshags nga'i sku nor bu rin pa cha mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo// gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che 'du thams cad
bsdus pa'i de kha dog lta bu s gdul bar bya ba yin nani/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshags pa'i sku nor bu rin po che bod thams cad bsdus pa kha dog tu mthong de// gal te sems can
rnams nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog lta bu s gdul bar bya ba yin nani/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshags pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo// gal
sems can rnams nor bu rin po rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dag lta bu s gdul bar bya ba yin n ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i n po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong ngo// gal te sems can nams nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sad ga ral
pacan gyi kha dog lta bu s gdul bar bya ba yin nani/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshags pa'i sku nor bu rin pa nga rgyal de da ga ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong de// gal te sems can
nams nor bur bo mi seng ga'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog lta bu s gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu'an pa ches ga'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtsi mo'i
kha dog tu mthor de// 'jam dpal gal te sems can nams nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog lta bu sag dul bar bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin
zla gshags pa sku nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong ngo// gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog lta bu s gdul bar bya ba yin n ni/ de dag gis kyang du/
bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po man 'dang gi kha dog tu mthong ngo// de bzhin du samasacan rnams de bzhin gshags pa'i sku brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog
tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba min na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshags pa'i sku brgya byin dang/ tshungs dad/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog tu mthong// de bzhin du spyar te/ sems can /
rnams sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jogi rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog gis gdul bar byab yin nani/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
susamasacan dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas dang/ shin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha de'ogatu mthong ngo// gzugs da bar rgyas pa'i bar gyi gzugs dang/ lus pa
kha dog dang/ spyodalam gang dang gangagis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur bab gzugs dang/ lus dang/ kha dog dang/ spyod lam de dang de lta bur bzhin gshegs pa mthadad//
[j]de bzhin du sgo nga las skyes pa dang/ mngal las skyes pa dang/ drod gsher las skyes pa dang/ rdzus te skyes ba dang/ gzugasacan dang/ gzugs can ma yin pa dang/ 'dushas can dang/
'du shes can ma yin pa dang/ 'du shes med 'du shesamadayin gyi sems can nams gzugs dang/ lus dang/ kha dog dang/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis/ 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs
dang lus dang/ kha dog dang/ spyod lamad dang de de bzhin gshegasal mthengo yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'adi dag gis gsar gyi kha dag tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu
na po ma pa cha glu'i kha dog tu mthong bas na ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin pa mi skya'i kha degatu mthong bar gyur 'a// nor bu rin po che an+dal gyi kha dog tu mthong ba ni
mgyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin pa tshaacha rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyural/ nor bu'in po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dag tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di
dag gsani nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po de la dag tu mthobar gyur la/ nor bu rin pa mi 'od thams cad bsdusala'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ samasacan 'adi dag gsazhin du
'on po tshe bod thams cad bsdus ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ ni'i bu ran po che dbang gi rgyalapa'i kha dog tu mthong bar nim gyu+ig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po tshe dbang gi
cha rgyu// rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po chargya mtsho'i so nas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dag tu mthong bar nam
gyur cig/ sems can 'di dga' sa ni nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dgapa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dogatu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po
tsha'i rgyal po sangag ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni mgyur ge/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po ma'i rgyal du sa dag ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu

rin po chesangag ga'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dag tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig// sems can bde dag gisananag bu rin po cheseng ga'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu
rin po cha brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar nam gyurag/ sems can 'di dgagasan nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthongs gyur la/ nor bu'i dpomi rdo rjesnang ba'i kha

dog tu mthong bar nam gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gisani nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog du mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu zhapatshe lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dag tu mthong ba ni mgyur cig/

sems can 'di dag gis nizhin bu rin po tsha lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong sa nim gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu

[; ]ni po tsha te zla sna da ba'i kha dog tu mthod bar gyur la/ nor bu rim ni glog ga sgron pa bde kha dog tu mthong ba ni ma gyuracig/ sems can 'di dag gisan nor bu rin po che glog gi sgronAm ba kha dog
tum thong bar gyural/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi kha dog tu mthong bar nim gyur cig ces mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i/
sems can rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par ma rtog med kyi/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa de'i mdzad pa de lta
bu de 'byung ngo// (bam po gnyis pa// 'jam dpal dpa' na/ nor bu rin potshadabod gi rgyal po gad du'abyung ba der lcags dang/ lcags
las byas pa'i yo byad rnams 'byung mod kyi/ 'jamadar la 'on kyang nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po nAmi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'di snyam du bdagagang du byung pa der lcags dang/
lcags las byas pa'i yo byad rnams 'byung bar ma gyur cig snyam du mi sams mod kyi/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal da bzhin
du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dud bzhin gshogs pa byung pa de mu stegs can spyod pa dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stagasacan gyi gnas thams cad mi 'gyur/ de lta ba'i
[r ]ku'u/ gyur pa thams cad m ba byung/ de la khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung/ der mtshams madra pa lnga de dag mi 'byung/ der mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi las rnams mi babyung//
dar rgyal lo'i bka' 'dung dang/ chos gces pa 'dor ba mi 'byung/ der nyi zla'i 'od dgami 'byung/ der brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dag dang/ lha thams cad kyi 'od
dag mi 'byung/ der nor bu rin po tshe 'od rnams dang/ ma lod rnams dang/ glog gi 'od rnams mi 'byung/ de lu datsam dang/ udatsam phyadadad/ zla ba dang/ zla ba phyed pa dad/ la'i
bgrang ba rnams mi 'byung ste/ 'jamad la gzhan du nasems can yongasasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni ma gtogosaso// 'jam dpal de bzhin
gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal dpan/ nor
bu rin pocha mthon kachen po'i 'od kyis rig pa de dag thams cad nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur yang/ nor bu rin po che mthonachen po ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog
ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa'i yid la byed pa'i bod kyis reg
pa de dag thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu bsgyur yang/ de bzhin gshags pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'o jam dpal lcan gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par da
bzhin gshekas pab mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byungang// 'jam dpal dparan/ nor bu rin po che chen po yi glu phyogs der legs par byas la/ mga'i rgyan rnam/ mgul pa'i rgyan nam/ lag ru 'i

rgyananam/ rkang pa'i rgyun yang rung ste/ gangadang gang gi 'phrogs na rgyan du 'dug ba de dang des rgyun du shin tu lham ma/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// nor bu rin po che chen po bslade nyid kyi na bus rgyan du dbu

kyadangashun tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug la/ nang du rin ngo tsha chen po ba cha ni mi rtogo/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ bon kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtogo par de'i bya ba de lta bu de
'byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang spyod lamagyi gnas gang dang gang gis nyan thos kyi spyod pa 'am/ rang
sangs rgyus kyi sbyang pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa 'am spyod pa pa dang/ kun tutshu dang/ gcer bu pa'i spyod pa'i m/ dud 'gro
dang yi dgas dar/ gshen rje'i 'jig rten dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ srin po'i spyod pa 'am/ lha dang/ klu dar/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za'i spyod pa bam/ spyod pa
bya// gang dang gang la gnas pa'i spyod pa de dang de nyid shin tu lham ma/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi mthus spyod pa de shin tu lham me/ lhan na/
lhang nger rnam par spyod kyang/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'khyud de/
'jam dpal dpa' no/ sa gnas/ sa la brten nas/ sa bon thams cad dang/ rtswa dang/ shing gil ba dang/ sman dang/ nags tshal rnams skye zhing 'phral la// shin tu rgyas pa nyid
du 'gyur yang/ 'jam dpal sani mi rtago/ rnam par mi rtog sta/ 'on kyang lhun gyi grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo//khajam dpal dang zhen du dbazhinagshegs pa
la gzhis/ dbazhin gshegs pa la brten nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad skya zhing 'phel te/ shin tu rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/
rnam par mi rtog sta/ 'onakyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtag par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal dpalan sprinachan posa'adzam bu'i gling thams cad khebs par drag
nas/ rtswa dang/ shing gal ba dang/ smanadang/ nags tshal rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su char ba chen po'ab tu phab ste/ ro gci'i pa'i chu'i rgyun des rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dang//

nags la rnam pa tha dad pa rnams skye bar byed cing/ gnas rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su chud ra tha dad pa dang kha dog thadadapal yod gnas la 'jam dpal sprin ni mi rtag/ rnam pa'i m rtog sta/ 'on kyang
lhun gyis grub cing rnam par ma rtogapar bya ba tha dad pa rnams 'byung ngo shu'ajam dpal der zhin du dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin gyis khyab pa mdzad de/sam nad pa'i rtsa ba snatshog bas gar nang ma dang/ lhag bab bsam pa dang mosapa tha dad cing/ mos
ba tha dad pa la gnas ba thams cad la chos kyi char chen po mngon bar phab sta/ 'jam dpal chos kyi char dmang gcig pa yin mod kyi ('jam dang lasems can dag ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags
pa/smon lam dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ mos pa tha dad cung/ mos pa tha dad pa la gnas/ dag ba'i rtsa ba dang/ smon lam dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ mos pa tha dad pa la zhug

pa rnams lam pa thadad pa nyid kyi chos thudadad/kho nam pas nus pa ji ltas dang mthuji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed kyang/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mo rtago/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'de
lta sta sems can 'di dag la ni nyan thos kyi gsas khagyur ba'i dag pa'i rtsa ba dga rnam par bskyod par bya'o//sam 'di dag ni'i dogs nas kyi shas su 'gyur ba'i dag pa'i rtsa bdag rnam rab
bskyod par bya'o// sems can bde dag la ni sangs rgyas kyi yashes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyod par bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni rgya chen
bzhi ba'i lha'i gnas su skyo ba'i dag ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyod nga ra bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba'i dag bra'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o//
de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'thab bral rnams dang/ dga' ldan rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang/ de bzhin du tshangs pa rnams dung/ tshangs chen
rnams dad/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang/ bod chung rnams dad/ tshadamad 'od nams dang/ 'od gsal rnams dad/ dgachung rnams dad/ tshad medadag rnams dang/ dag
rgyas rnams dad/ sbyin mad rna sradang/ bsod nams skyas rnams dang/ 'bras bu che rnams dad/ mi rnams dang/ mi gdung rnams dad/ gyanom sna rnams dang/ shin tu mthengo
klu rnams dad/ gnas gtsang ma'is rnams dad/ 'ogaman rnams kyi dag ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyod par bya'o// bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par baspyad par
bya'o snyam du/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go/ sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal po'i skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba snatshogs dga rnam par bskyed rar bya'o//
sems can bad dag 'ani me'i skya ba'i dag pa'i rtsa ba sna tshogs drug rnam par bskyod par bya'o// sems can 'di dag lan dang du phyag tu 'gyur ba 'dag pa'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par/
bskyod par bya'o snyam du 'dram dpal da bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtogo/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshags pa ni lhun gyis grub cing/ rnam par mi rtog par sems can
smon lam dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ mos pa ji lta ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/ dbazhinagshegs pa ni thams cad du btang
snyomos su bzhugs shing btang snyoms la rnam par mi rtogago/ 'jam dang la dper na/ nyima'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu lo datsun bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs mad pa btang
nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mun pa mun nag thams cad med par 'gyur yang/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtag/ rnam pami rtag ste/ 'an kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par
bya ba de lta bu de ba byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu ya shas kyi bod ces bya ba khragakhrig 'bum phrag grungasamad pa btang bas/
sems can rnams M kyi lta bar gyur pa'i mun pa thams cad med par gyur te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyi rlabs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams
su lta bar gyur pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshagasapanangs sam can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa bsam le sAm mam/ bsalabar
bya'o snyam du mi rtag/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtogapar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rnam par mi rtog cing mnyam ste/ btor soms pa'o// 'jam dpal dare ra na sgyu ma sprul pa ni/ sgyu mamakhan gyi dbang gisaM bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs
rung/ lus tha dad pas tshogs ston kyang/ 'jam dang la skya ma sprul pa de ni brjod du med// ma skyes pa/ ma 'gagasol/ yi ga med paM/ sgra med pa/ yul mad pa// dngos po
med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gonyis su mdang/ kun tu spyod pa med pa// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing gnyan po med pa yin yang/ 'jam dpa' skya ma
sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis lhunagyi grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba sna tshogs ston te// 'jam dang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i saMdas
rgyas kyang sems can gyi dbang gis/ 'khor gyi nangan gzugs kyi sku dang/ kha dog dang/ spyod pa dang/ spyod lam dang/ bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas sna tshogs 'byung mod kyi//
[d/ ]'jim dang la de bzhin gshegs pa de ni brjod du mad pa/ ma skyes pa// ma 'gags pa// yi ge mad pa/ sgra med pa// yul med pa// dngos po med pa// bsam gyis mi khyab pa//
mtshan nyid na da nga// gnyis su med pa/ kun tu spyod pa med pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs shing gnyen po med pa// khams gsum 'batsayang dag par 'das pa ste/ 'ong kyang 'jam dpal
dang zhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing/ rnam par mi rtog par sems can gyi dbang gis ma dzad pa sna tshogs dag ston to// 'jam dpa 'dapar na/ nyim ni gcig khe na yin na/ 'i
rgyal po ri rab kyi dbang gis glang bzhi rnams su sems can rnams kyis rnam pa mang por mthong sta kha cag gis ni de 'char bar ma byed/ kha cig gis ni shar zin par mtheng/ kha cig gis
ni bag dres pa tsam du mthong/ khacig gis ni dros man tsam du shes/ khacig gisanInam da/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma ma' tsathun gcig tsam du shar bangs/
kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed yol tsan du shes// kha cig gis nyi ma snar tsam dugs/ kha rnyeg gis ni rangs tsam du shes te/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig yin med kyi/ 'on kyang
gling bzhi dag tu sems can rnams kyis gzhan dang gzhan du mthong yong nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtag/ rnam par ma rtogasta/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par rtego bzhin du/ rab kyi
dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten khams su bya ba sna tshog saston to// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
sangs rgyas kyang sems can gyi dbang gis 'khor gcig kho na'i nang nas kyang/ sems can kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar ngashes/ khacig gis ni
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa bshas/ 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das
yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shas/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'bo bcu 'an par shes/ khacig gis ni da bzhin
gshegs pa yengasasu mya ngan las 'das nas le bcu lon pa shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa snying por gyur bar shas/ kha cig gsani bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa nub
pa shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan nas/ le bcu dang/ nyi shu dang/ sum cu dang/ bzhi bcu dang/ lnga bculenapar shas/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan
'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas le bcu dang/ nyis dudang/ sum cu dang/ bzhi bcu dang/ ldabculenangar shes/ kha cig gsani bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogasar
sangs rgyas nas le brgya dang/ lo stengalenapar shas/ kha cig gis na bcom ldan badas yongasasu myang nalas 'das nas lo brgya dad/ lo stong lenapa bas/ kha cig gis
ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ lo stong phrag bcu dang/ nyi shu dang/ sum cu dang/ bzhi bcu dang/ lngabculen par ngashas/ kha cig gisani bcom ldan 'das
yod/su mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong phrag bcu dang/ nyishudang/ sum cu dang/ bzhi bcu dang/ lnga bcu lenang ra shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'dasan ngenapar rdzogs par
sangs rgyas nas/ bsal khyi ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang/ nyi shu dang/ sum nudang/ bzhi bcudang/ lnga bcu len par shes/ kha cig gis nibcom ldan 'das yongs su mya
ngan las 'das nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ba bum phragabcu dang/ nyi shu dang/ sum cu dang/ bzhi bcu dang/ lngabculen par ngashasaso// 'jam dad la 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang
nas lhadang/ mi kha cig gis ni bcom lda'adas shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bskal pa brjod du med pagi yad brjod dumadang len par shes/ 'jam dang la
'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas lha dang/ mi kha cig gis na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ bskal pa brjod du mad pa 'i yang brjod du med pa lan pa shes
kyang 'jam dpal dbazhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtag sta/ 'on kyang lhunagyis grub cing rnam pa mi rtag bzhin du sems can gyi dbang gis da
kA bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo// 'jamadapaladaparan/ 'dzam bu gling du rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po langs pas rtswa dang/ shing ga' pa dang/ smanadang//
nags tshal dang/ le ma thams cad g.yo/ rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu bag yo/ 'gal/ 'datu'agul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ bur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur
bur 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu khrugs shinge/ le ma kha cig na/ shar phyogs su dma'/ nub phyogs su mtho/ kha cige ni nub phyogs su dma' la// shar
phyogs su mtho/ la ma kha tsakhe na mtha' dma' la/ dbus su mtho/ kha cig ni byang phyogs su dumab la/ lho phyogs su mtho yang/ rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dang/
nagasatshal dang/ lam rnams mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dang 'arung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang gis bya ba sna tshogs ston to// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin
gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzob/sa pa'i sangs rgyas kyang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtogoste/ 'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis rtag tu skad chag skad cig la gzugs kyi sku dang/
kha dog dang/ spyod pa dang/ smon lam dang/ bya ba la 'jugapa'i gnas grangasamad pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'byung ngo// 'jam
dang lasems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa yid la khyad pajisnyad byung ba desnyad kyi bskal par sems can dma' ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas dang/
gshin rje 'jigarten du skye ba'i rgyan chad 'di ldog ste/ 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas n yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan taM/
de bzhin gshags pa gcig la dmigasapa'i yon tan gyi mtha' yang byang chub sems dpa lasams dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin bsamagyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa
rnams kyis kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang rtogs par mi nus// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha
rnams dang/ mi rnams ni ches nyung/ phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ bdod pa dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis shing rta'i 'phang
le'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches ming do// 'jam dpal phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon pa rang shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa dag la 'dod chags dang
byabya// khral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po' bajig rten gyi khams na sems can dag mthong ni ches nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos
dgra bcom pa// zag pa zad nga/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas lha'i mig gis shing rta'i 'phang 'a'o tshod tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na/ sems can dag mthong ba ni sa mang
ngo / brngam dpal de bzhinagshegs pa'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa zag pa rbadang/ rnam par thar pabargyad la bsam gtan pas/ lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji sAd mthong ba de bsani/ 'jam dpa la rang sangs rgyas kyi lha'i mig gis shing rta'i 'phang 'a'o tshad tsam gyis phyogs gcig nasems can dag mthong
bani ches mang ngo// 'jamadang 'a rang sangs rgyas kyi lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasan/ sems can jisAd mthong ba de bsani/ 'jam dang labyad
chub sems dpa' rnamapar thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas/ lha'i mig gisashing rta'i 'phang lo'i datsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na/ sems can
dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo// kha jam dang la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang/ ting de 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas/ lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stor
che/de'i 'jig rten gyi pa san/sems can ji snyed ma byed pa de pas ni/ 'jug dang 'du de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i spyan gyis shing re ba rang 'a'od tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na//
sems can dag gzagasar ches grangs med do// 'jam dang la de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad/ shing rta 'phang mdatsam kyi sa phyogs
thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can re de'i sam dang/ sems las byung pa'i chos byung ba dang/ 'byung bar bgyur ba gang dag gzigs pa dadag ni/ byang chub sems dang 'i rnam da//
thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis khyab pa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang bgrang ba 'am/ bsamapa 'am/ grangs su bya ba sla ba
ma yin te/ 'jam dpal sems can 'dus da dang/ ma 'das pa dang/ da ltar byung ba de dag gi sa mas dang/ sems las byung pa de dag nad pa zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lhun gyis grub par skad cig thang cig yudatsam gcig la rab tumakhyen to// 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'a jig rten gyi khams thams ca da du gtogs
pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sams dang/ sems las byung ba rnams rgyu gangadang/ dmigs pa gang dang/ rtsonagang gi dzaltar byung ba dang/ 'byung pa dang/ 'byung bar 'gyur pa dang//
sems cand dag gi spyod pa dang/ spyod lamar/ bya ba la 'jug ba'i gnas gang dag byung ba dang/ 'byung pa dang/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag da bzhinagshegs
pas lhunagyis grub pa la shes kyis rnam pami rtog pa'i skad cig thang cig yudatsam gcig la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'jam dpalasems cand dug ji ltar
blonamad pa yod dag pardzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dul ba yang wun gyis grub pa'i bshasukyis rnam pa mi rtog pa skadacig thang cig yudatsam gcig l rab tu mkhyen to// 'jam dpal
gams can ng pa'i mdag pa'i gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa gta'i klong gi bya ma bas mang ba de dag kyang/ dbazhin gshegs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ngashes kyis rnam par mi rtog pas
skad cig tha cig yud tsam gcig la rab tu mkhyen to// 'o jam dpal rgyu gang dang/ dmigs pa gang dang/ rkyen gang gis nyon mongs pa de dag dziltar 'byung ba dang/ thabs kyi shes
pa gang gis sems can de dag gi nyon mongs pa dziltar zhi bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang lhunagyis grub pa mi shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la rab tu mkhyen
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gzugs dang/ kha dgadad/ gzi brjid dar/ bod rab 'a bring thamur snang yod zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nib grib ma
'bal ba yang med de/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas rim bgrang ba dang/ yud tsam dang/ yudatsam phud kyi grangs brtsi ba bya ba de lta de yang 'gyur
la 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtag/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing/ rnam par mi rtog pa dge bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin
dude bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du bsam pa rab bsring tha mas sems can
rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ 'od rab 'bring tha ma mthong yang/ 'jam dpal sems can gang gi dag pa'i rtsa ba dang/
spyod pa dang/ mos pa dad smon lam gyi snyobasang/ byin rlabs ci'adra ba la pad dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'jam dpal der zhin gshags pa lanarab ba khring tha ma mad do//
da ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa yis dbargyas ni chos kyi skulta/ shin tum skyasar/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gags pa yin na/
'jam dpal yonakyad sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rab 'bring tha mas de bzhinagshegs pa'i b 'bring tha ma mthong gi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs bzhi mi rtog
rnam mi rtog sku/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grubacing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de babyung ngo// 'jamadar stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i brjig rten gyi khams 'di na/ lha dang/
'a dad/ gnod sbyin dad/ dri ba dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang//
mi dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams dad/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song bsems can gang dag de bzhin gshegasanga' bshos gsol ba dang/ gang dag bshesami gsol ba dang//
gar dag mthong ba dang/ gang dag mi mthong pa dang/ gang dag sdodapa dang/ gang dag mi sdod pa dang/ gang dag gangasha bdad/ gang dag mi gsha ba dang/ gang dag rig pa dang/ gang dag mi 'ag
pade dag thams cad kyi bya ba de lta burnams kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lhun gyis grubatsa nam par mi rtog pa 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal dang na/ gang dag gis nor bu 'an pa mthon ka
[% ]chab bod pa dad/ reg pa dang/ spyod yul du gnas pa de dag thams cad ni nor du ban patshemathon ka chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur yong/ nor rin poche na thon katshan ro na mi rtog/ rnam/
pa'i mi rtog ge 'jam dpal da bzhin dusamasacan gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa than mor bris pa dad gzugs su byas pa mthong ba dang/ rig pa dang/ de'i spyod yul
lasogs pa de dag thams cad ni gzugasadar/ kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su grub pa thob par 'gyur yang/ de bzhin gshags panimi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go/ 'jam
daral dar ran/ rtsi'i rgyal po legs pa mthong zhes bya ba soms can gnodasams kyi sams dad ldan pa'i m/ dar ba'isams dad ldan pa yod rung/ gar dag gis mthong ba dadag
gi migazham par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'i m/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan b.ladanang/ gang dgagis rna bas de rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra thos pa de dag gi rnab
rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba bsams dang ldan pa yung rung/ gang dag gis dri tshor ba de dag gi snam par dag par 'gyur/
gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan r 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yabazung/ gang dag gis cus de'i myong ba da dgag/lce'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi
sam dang ldan pa ma/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung/ gang dag gis lus kyis rig pa de dag lus rnam par dag par 'gyur yong/ bajam dpal rtsakhargyalapalegs pa'i
mthong na mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtogasta/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtag par de'i bya ba da lta bu de ba byurd// 'jam dpal dbazhin du gnod sems/
kyi sa mas dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i soms dang ldan pa yang rud/ gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha na ri mor bris pa dang/ gzugs su byas pa mthong de dag gis dag
'gro ba'i rtsa ba des me ga rnam par dag par 'gyur/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su songab yang rung ste/ gnodasams kyi sams dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung/
ga nga dag gis de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'om/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po zhes bya ba 'am/ thams cad mkhyenapa zhes bya ba'i sgra thos pa de dag dag
ba'i rtsa ba des rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'agyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dang ba'i sams dang ldan pa yang rung/ gang dag gis de'i yon tan gyi dri tshor ba de
dag dag pa'i rtsa ba des sna rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dad ldan pa lam/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yong chung/ gangadag gis de'i chos kyi ro myong ba de dag dbye//
pa'i rtsa pa des lce rnam par dag pas 'a gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan r 'am/ dang ba'i sams dang ldan pa yod rung/ gang dag gis lus kyis rig pa de dag dag ba'i rtsa ba/
des lus rnam bar dag par 'gyur yang/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ lhunagyis grub cing rnam
pa ma rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de khu byung nga/ 'jam dang la dparan/ ba rgyal po'abral ba zhes bya bas bsus pa'i rdza sgra sems can zug rngus zug pa dang bcas pa// dug dang
bcas pa/ gang dag gis thos pa de dag gi zug rngu thams cad 'byung zhing/ dug kyang mi gdug pa 'gyur yang/ 'jam dpo'artsi'i rgyal bo' bral ba ni mi rtag/ rnam par mi rtog
sta 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin nga tsho dbang dang/ rgyu rkyenatshogs pasalhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par rtse'irgyalapa 'bral ba'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung
ngo 'am dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thasam thag tu/ sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa zug rngu dga' byung zhing/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sbra dang/
kAti mug gi dug kyang mi gdug par 'gyur yad/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtag/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'jim dpal lhun gyis gru cing rnam pa la mi rtog pa 'di

ba zhinagashag pa'i mdzad b de lta bu d 'byung ngo//de ci'i phyi nyin m 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyi phyogs 'jam dpal stod gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdula rnams zhims ltud de//
[@]// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sngon byang chub sems dapa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams
der yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul de ba la bsdu ba'i dngos ba bzhi po dag gis/ sems can yongs su sminapar mdzad pa dag ni ches mang ngo// 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ga da'i
ka klung gi bye ma snyad dag gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches nyung gi/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyun mi gcod balhunagyis grub cing/ rnam par mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
khamasamatha' yas mu med pa dag tu 'phra rab kyi rdul re la la/ sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu longs su smin par mdzad zin pa dang/ yongs su smin par
mdzad pa dang/ yongs su smin par mdzad pa 'gyur pa dag ni ches mang sta/ 'jam dpal de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sems can yongs
su sminang mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// 'jam dpal dab na/ zla ba'i dkyil la khe ni nyima'i dbang gis 'bri ba dang/ rgyab dang/ mi snyabar 'gyur bar yang snang//
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'bri ba dang/ mi snang ba dang/ skya ba mdad/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dag pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ nye ma'i grangs dang/ yud tsam
dang / yudatsam phyad dang/ zla ba spyod dang/ zla ba dang/ la bgrung ba'i grangs gzhag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bya ba du lta bu de dag 'byung yang/ 'jam/
dbal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba dang/ ral pa 'am/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba med de bod kya'ajam dpal sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dag ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa dang
nyi ma'i dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing/ rnam par mi rtog par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo// bajam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sngon dag pa'i rtsa ba'i tshog sabasags pa'i samasacan rnams kyi nga rgyal dang/ rgyagasapa dang/ drags yang dag par gzhom pa'i lus dang/ sngon
gyi dag kha'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su sminar ba'i phyir dang/ de bzhin bshegs pa'i bstan pa la gzud pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmapa'i chos 'grib pa dang//
nubapa kun tu ston// bajamadapalasamasacan gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshags pa'i dam pa'i chos nub pa dang/ 'grib pa dang/ 'phel bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyada'ajam
dbal soms can gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog khar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal dpar na/ nam mkha' la gnas//
nam mkha' la brta gnas / samasacan thams cad kyi bya ba sna tshogs dag 'byung lang/ nam mkha'ani ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa// 'dus ma byas pa/
yi ga med pa// sgra mdang// brjod du med pa/ brjod par bya ba ma yin pa/ gnyis sumad pa// [â€]gnyen po med pa ste/ 'on kyalhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya
sna tshogs dag 'khyud de// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gnas/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brten nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad 'byung yang/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i m skye mi 'gag ste/ badzamadang 'a de bzhin
gshags bani 'dus ma byas pa/ yi ga mdang/ sgra med pa// brjod du mad pa/ brjod por bya ba ma yin ng/ gnyis sumed ba/ gnyen po mdang sta/ 'on kyang ston gyi dag pa'i
rtsa ba dang/ spyod pa dad/ smon lam gyi stobs dang/ byin gyi rlabs kyis lhan gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtag par sems can rnams la chos kyi mdzad pasnyatshogs dag kyang 'byung de//
'jam dpal thog pa chen po 'amos pa'i byang chub sems dar 'osangs rgyas la dmigasapa'i yid 'byabakacigs kyang phugs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ dpag tu med
pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdular de la/ sems can dpag tumad/ grangs med pa dag ni bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba byed/sems can dar ba gtumed/ grangs med pa
dag na nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag ni tshangs pa thob par byed/ sems can dang gtumad/ grongasam da pa dag
ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob ra byed/ sems can dang ga tu mad/ grangasamadang dgun 'phrul dga' lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/ bams can/
dpag tum// grangs mdang dag ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dang gtumed/ grangasamadang dgan 'thab bral gyi lha'i gnas su skye ba thong par
byed/ sems cand pa gtumed/ gas med pa dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gnas su skyab thob par byed/ sams cad gtumad/ grangasamadar da ban rgyal chen bzhi'i lha gnas
su klu ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu mdu/ grangs med ma draganelha'i rgyal po thob par byed/ soms can dang gtumed/ grangasamad pa dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob/
par byed/ sems cand pa ga tumad/ gras med pa dag ni stobs kyi ba po'i las sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med/ gangasam da pa dag gi tshub dbang po the bab
khyed sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rgyug pas khyed/ sems can dpag tumad/ grangs med pa dag ni dri bra'i dbang po thob
ba'agyed/ sems can dang kha tu med/ grangs med ba dag ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po klob bar byed/ sems can dpagatumad/ grangs med pa dag ni ma maci'i dpang po thob par byed/
sems can dang kha tu med/ gras med pa dag ni lta'aphya chen po 'dabang lo theb bar byed/ somasacan dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dganama'i rgyal po thob pas spyod/ sems can
dar gtumed/ grangs med pa dag ni mi skyab thog las byed/ sems can dang gtumed/ grangasamad pa dag ni gsanan po skya ba thob par byed na/ thal mo sbyar ba lta ci smos/ bdug
pa phul ba lta ci smos/ de bzhin du mar ma phul ba lta ci smos/ spos phul ba lta ci smos/ ma tog phul ba lta ci smos/ mchod pa rnam pa mang po gzhan phul ba lta ci smos/ tshags su
bcad ba gcig tsam yang nyanar dad/ klog pa dang/ 'dzin pa lta ci smos/ dam pa'i chos rnam pa mang po yongs su 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de bas ches grangs med pa'i sangs/
rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas par 'gyuro// 'jamadapal byang chub sems dpa' bskalar 'am/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa dpag tumed/ grangasamed par sems can
dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob pa ni pa'i/ byang chub sems dpar ngas rgyas mnyes par ma byas/ chos dang dge 'dun
mnyes par ma byas ni de lta ma yin na// 'jam dpal de la sangs rgyas la ma mnyes par byed pa dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dunami mnyes par byed pa ni tha na bdag gi chung ma la mi tshos
bar spyod pa las byung ba'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa la de 'byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam pa zhe sdang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la b.rus pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'
la khyad du gsod pa dang/ chos sdong ba dang/ chos 'dor ba dang/ byang chub sems dpag la gus par mi byed pa dang/ dag ba'i bshes gnyana'akhasnyan bakur mi byed dang/ samasacan
yongs su smin par byed pa bdor ba dang/ bla ma dad/ sbyin pa 'i gsadad/ slob dpon dang/ kham dar/ dag sbyong dang/ bram ze yang dag par 'dod dang/ yang dgapar gsal
la rgyus dang mi byed pa dad/ chos skyab/ chos khyad par can rtogs pa/ tshesargya chen po stenang dang/ thag pachan po la yang dag par gnas pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ba la mgyi bya ba
sakha/ gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa rnams lami bdud cing/ rjed byed ra dad ( khengs pa yin/ chos r/ chos b.lami gus pa skyod nga dad/ sri zhu dang/ rim gro man/
[s/ ]@#// pa dang/ chos rgya mtsho chen po bsgrags pa byung na/ la la zhig dad par 'gyur na/ mi rung nge snyam nas/ chos smanga'i gang zag la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mi
byed pa dang/ bdag shes pa la mi 'jug pa dang/ tshes la des par soms pa mi spyod pa dad/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal spyod du bsngags par 'os pa'i gang zag rnams kyi bsngags pa bcags
a shing mi snyan r brjod pa dang/ pha rol gyi yon tan dang/ bsngags pa la mi dga' ba yin/ gangazag lan stang bas/ chos la zhe sdadabar khyad cing sang ba dang/ gzhan dag kyang
rtso da du 'jug pa dad/ stan mthon po' dod cing thabs mo' bdad/ gzhan las rim gro bya ba bdag gar byed ci mngon par dga' ba dang/ gnas brtanargan zhing yun ring du tshangs
a par spyad pa rnams la mgro ma byed cid/ bsu bar mi byed la bzhin khro gnyen can yin/ rtag tu sams rtsub cing kun ka tshel ba dang/ glags lta ba dang/ dargyal bskyed nas mkhas
pa gon du mi ba gro ma bstan/ bsAng ra mi byed/ bkur sti mi byed cing/ dag bgang/ mi dag banigang/ bya ba ni gang/ bya ba ma yin pa na gang ci zhig byas na/ yun
ring po'i donadad/ phan pa dang/ bde bar gyur nasami 'dri ba dang/ nges par 'byur bar me lha zhing/ rtsod pa mang pa mad pa yin te/ 'jam dpal de ltar na sangs rgyas dad [}]
0 chos dad/ dge 'dunami mnyes pa byed pa yin no// 'a jam dang la dag pa'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs/
thob par 'gyur/ rgya mtsho dam pa'i snyid po dri ma med par snang ba 'od gsal ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dag ba'i bshes gnyan gyis yongs su ban ba'i byang/
chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu mad/ grungs med pa dag tusems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas dad/ gshin rje'i
'jig rten du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rnams tsho 'di la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ kladapatsha bas sam/ rims tsha bas sam/ rtsib lags na Tas sam/ rgyal srid 'khrugs
bas sam/ kla klo 'khrugs pas sam/ mug 'i 'khrugs pas sam/ lus la gnod pa dang/ yid la gnod pa gang yang rung bas brgyadang kha pas kyang tshog cig la byang bar 'gyur
ti than rmi lam tsam gyisis kyang byang bar brgyu'o/ dro'ajam dar la dag pa'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
dang ga tu med pa dag las dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang/ mchedapa las byung ba dang/ de dag gi thad nas bslab pa bzung ba las byung ba rnams snga dro gcig gis
zil gyis gnon// de ltar dag ba'i bshes gnyen la bstan bkur bya ba ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'jam dpal dag ba'i bshes gnyan gyis
yongs su thon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gtan bcu/dpar 'gyur te/ banu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bgrang bar sbyor nga'i gter dang/ sangs rgyas kyi
['# ]nas thams cud la nges pa sams pa'i gso dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzungs snang ba'i gter dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las sogs yang dag pa/
rig pa rab tu ston pa'i gtam dod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brjod du med pa' tshul mkhas pa rtogs par khyadapa'i gter dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul
pa dang/ cho 'phrul thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba'i gtan dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad mthong dang ma 'bral ba'i gte dad sgyu mar gyur pa ba bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'grub par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i gtos dad/ sangs rgyas dang//
byang chub sems dar la thams cad la dgabab dang mchog tu dga' ba dad/ dang ba chen po 'thob pa 'i sa gter ro// 'jam dpal dag ba'i bshes gnyan gyis yid ng/su zin pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bsu thob pa ba gyur te/ bcu kangan na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa brjod du mad pa yang brjod du med pa dag tu byin gyis rlobs pa'i phyir/
tsheladabang ba dang/ ting nge 'dzinapagatumad/ gras mad pa dag la nges par sems pa'i yanas la 'a jug pa'i phyir/ sems la dbang ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thar
bkod pa dang/ rgyan du mas brgyan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kun tu ston pas phyi'i/ yo byad la dbangab dad/ 'jig rtanagyi khams thams cad du skye ba kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ sbyang
la dbang ba dang/ dus ji lta ba bzhinadu lasakyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ 'as la dbang ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis
gang bar byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ mos pa la dbang ba dang/ dus gang dang gang gi tsho/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dodapa'i dus de dang des byang chug/
mngon par btsad rgya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'a dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing da dang der byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/ smon lam la dbang ba dang
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul 'dabang ba dang/ mtha' dang dbung med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba kun tu ston pa'i
phyi chos la dbang ba dad/ de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ mtshan dang/ dpa byed bzang po rnams dang/ rdzogs pa'i
byang chub kun tu ston pa'i phyir yoshes la dbang ba'o// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sku'i khyen tsamagacig 'phyogs banu'i
nam mkha'i mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'jug par byed kyang/ sems can gang la yang gnod pa dang sgrib pa medad/ sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhinano//
bskal pa dpag tumadu/ grangs mad/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshudas pa mad pa rnams yud tsam gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing yud tsamagacigani bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs
med bsamagyis mi khyab par byin gyis slob sta/ bskal pa re re la yad mas 'jig pa dang/ chus ba jig pa dang/ rludagi 'jig pa byin gyis rlob kyang sems can gang la
yang yo byad cis kyang thongs ba'i mi 'gyur zhing/ lus la gnod pa 'am/ sams lami bde ba yang mi 'byungal/ samasacan gang ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba des bya ba
delta bu langashes sa// 'jam dpal dgu ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'dod na phyogs bcu'i phyogasar yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul
yagyi mthus spras pa'i bar gyi 'jig rtenagyi khams rnams su/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ran rdul phra rab kyi rdula'i ri 'a sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyi mthas klas pa'i lus rnams kyis/
lasa'i 'os kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas nias shi 'phos pa dang/ skya ba dang/ mngon pa rab byungab dang/ dka' ba spyodangar sbyor ba dang/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang/ bdud 'dul/
bar ston pa dang/ mdon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor 'a bskor ba'i bskul ba dang/ yodos su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ston to// 'jam dpal
dag pa'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'dodan phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rer rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re lasangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mgrus
gsar 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'jug par byed cing/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi nang thamasacad kyi rgyan gyi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yin pa de dag zhing gcig tu ston par byed//
zhing gcig gi rgyan gyi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yin pa de dag zhing thams cad du ston par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang
na yar snang la gnas nas kyang mi yo'o// 'jam dang 'dage ba'i bshes gnyen gyis longs su sin nga 'ibyang chub sems dpa' ni 'dodan/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams/
thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi lus sems can gcig gi lus su ston to/ sems can gcig gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus su ston kyalus
'dus pa yang mi bdad/ samasacan gang yang gnod ngar ma 'gyur zhing/ bye ba de lta bu de yang ston to// lhun gyis grub cing dmar mi rtag par sems can rnams kyang yongs su
ba/ smin par byed do// 'jig rten gyi khamasarab 'byams thams cad kyisangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig u tu byin gyis rlobacade/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang sangs rgyas
kyi yul kyi mthas klas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byon gyis rlob la/ dbazhin gshegs pa rnams 'dres par yang ma 'gyur te/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam pa mi rtog
par bya ba de lta bu thams cad kyang ston to/ lus gcig gisamanyamanga' 'jog la/ lus dpag tu med/ grangasamad pa dag gis ldang zhing/ lus dar/gtumad grangs med
pa dag gis mnyam par bzhag/ lus gcig gi snang ngo// (bam po gsum la sta thumakho// 'jamadang la dag ba'i bshas
gnyan gyis gangasasu brin pa'i khyad chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings laspyod yul yang yin la/ sems can gyi khams la sbyor yul der yad sad do// sangs rgyas kyi spyod
00 yul la mngon par dga' yang yin la/ bdud kyi spyod yul bag yang snang de// mya ngan las 'das pa'i spyod yul yang yin la/ 'khor pa spyod yul bar yang snang ngo// thamA
cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes spyod yul pa yayin la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yulabar yang snang ngo// zhi pa'i spyod yul yang yin la/ ma zhi ba dang/ rab tu ma zhi bdad
bdam zhi ba'i spyod yu'ador la nga snang sta/ samasacan rnams kyang 'dul go/ blang med pa dang/ der ba med pa dang/ sprasapa med pa dang/ ma spros pa dang/ mtshan
ma med pa dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ shes par bya bam dang dad/ bar snang dang mtshungs pa spyod yul ba yad yin l/ spros pa dang/ mchon ma dang dmagasapa spyod yul/
ba'i sems can thams cad kyi nang na yang snang ngo// stobs bkod pa spyod yul ba yayin l/ gzugs babrang po'i spyod yul bar yang snod do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa
dad 'gag pa med pas gnyan po spyod yul yang yin la/ sems can longs su smin par byed pa'i spyod yul bar yod snang ngo// ye shes dang/ rnam par thar pa dad (mngon
pa' gas pa dang/ gapa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i spyod lul ba yang yin la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtanagyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi lha dang/ glu dang/ gnadasbyin
dad dri ba dang/ lha ma yin dang// nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ le'atshe chan pa dang/ brgya byin dad/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rtan skyong pa dang/
srin po dang/ 'byung pa dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha zad ng/ grul bum dang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po dang/ sems can dmyalag dang/ dud bgro'i skyo gnas dad/ gshin rje'i
ba 'jig rten du skyes podang/ sgo nga las skyes pa dang/ mngal nas skyes pa dang/ drod gsher las skyes pa dad/ rdzus te skyes pa dang/ gzugs can dang/ gzugs can ma yin pa dang/
du shes can dang/ kha sa can yin pa dang bdushisamed 'dushes modaman nas gzugs med pa bar gyi sems tsana rnams yongs su sminapar byadang ra yang snang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sdudang dad/ mngon par rdzogasang byang chub pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bkodang thams cad kyi spyod yul thob ba lang yin la/ nyan thos dad rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho ga dang/
skyid lha' yang kun tu ston to// 'jam dpal dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs suwin pa'i myong chub sems dang kan sems can kyi sgrasems can gcig gi sgrar 'jug par
byed l sems can gcig ka sgra sems can thams cad kyi sgrar 'jug par byed cing/ sga rnams 'dres pa yang mi 'gyural// sems can gang gi gal yang sgrib par mi
0 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal drag pa'i de shes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dar 'ani lhan gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog ban phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagyi khamasa'ab
'byas thams cad du 'a dge lus sab khams dung/ chu'i khams dad/ ma'i khams dad/ rlung gi khams su byin gyis slob de/ 'jam dpal dag ba'i bshes gnyen
gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mas can gyi lus l zhing za 'dus kun tu ston kyang/ sems can gyi lus dang 'dres par yang mi byed/ zhing gi lus la
sems can gyi lus kun du ston kyang/ zhingagi lus dang 'dras par mi byed de// sangs rgyas kyi sku la nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lus su kun tu ston kyang/ songs rgyas kyi
sku duman par yang mi byed do/ nyan thos dad/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lus la sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston kyang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rgya chen por yang m khyod do//
skyid pa'i lus la mngon par byang chub pa'i sku kun tu ston kyang/ spyod pa'i rgyun dpar yang mi byed do// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i skul spyod pa'i lus kun tu ston kyang/
mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku nyams pas yang mi byed do// mya ngan las 'das dal bor ba'i rgyun du ston kyang/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par zhan pa yang mi spyad do//
'khor ba mya nganalas 'das par kun tu ston kyang/ gtan du yongasasu mya nganalas 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang mi byed do// mnyam
par yang gzhag la bya ba thams cad kyang ston te/ 'di lta ste/ 'ong ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'grang ba dang/ nyal bar byed de// spyod lam thams cad kyang kun tu ston la/ ting nge
'dzin rnam pa 'khrugs par yang mi byed do// de bzhin gshogs pa gcig gi zhabs kyi drung nachos nyan pa yang snang la/ phyogs bcu'ajig rten gyi khamagarab 'bar dam/
cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dgan gzugs dang/ lus dang/ kha dog yongs su 'grub pa gzhan dang/ gzhan dag gis kyang ngos kyab
nyana'/ ting pa 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed cing/ chos kyang lan 'a 'dzin te 'dan cing kun chub par yang byed la/ sangs rgyas dang dga' sa chos nyan pa'i rgyun chad par yo byad do//
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du gzugs dang/ lus dang/ kha dog yangs su 'grub pa tha dad pas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par yang
khyod la// lus pa dad par yang mi byed cing gnas nas kyang mi g.yogo/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du bya ba thams cad kun[E]stan kyang ted de
0 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed do// sems kyi skad cig sams kyi skad cig 'a ting de 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag du mad grangasamadapa dag kyang mden pa ra snyab 'a/
ting nge 'dzin tha dadapar yang mi byed do// 'jam dpal rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sames dpa'
sangs rgyas kyi ni nga ba mthas klas pa'i bskal par ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyab pa mngon par bsgrub kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting de 'dzin gyi sgo bsgrub pa rnams kyi mthar thug pa
'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzinaphun sum tshogs pa de dag thamaso cad ni/ dgaba'i bshes gnyen las des par byung ngo// 'jam dang la de bzhin du/
gzungs kyi sgo brjod du med pa mngon par sgrub pa mtha' yas dpag tu med/ grangs mad/ bsam sa ma khyab/ mtshungs pamed/ gzhal du med/ tshad med pa dag dang/
gzungs thob pa phun sum tshogs pa de dag thomasacad kyang dge ba'i bshesagacan las nges par byung ngo// stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/
grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad mad/ brjod du med pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'jam dpalamador bsdu nadi ltar
byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrub pa mtha' yas pa thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni dgu ba'i bshes gnyen las
nges par byung ba yin no// 'jam dpal dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos dbyings mtha' yas pa'i sgo la 'jug pa saMms can la kun tu ston
pa'i yul dad/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs su mngon nga ra bsgrub pa 'gro ba thams cad shes par byed pa yul dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad d sprul pa
mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dad/ de bzhin gshags pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa'i lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyor mngon
par bskaba'i yul dang/ nam mkha'i khams 'jig rten gyi khamasasu mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khamanam mkha'i khams su mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang/
'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa kho bor mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang/ sems can gyi skad brjod pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi
ches thams cad bstan pa'i yul dang/ gdeng dang/ lus mthalasapa kun tu bstan pa lus gcig tu byin gyis slob cing/ lus kyi rim pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i
yul dang/ lus gcig gisachos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gangs pa'i yul dang/ sems can gcig de sams bskyed pa rnams 'asamasakyi skad cig sems kyi skaci re 'ayad sgo/
mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i byang chub rnam par mi rtog pa'i yul dad/ 'jam dpa' dar sogs pa yu 'bye ba khrag khrage 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ gusamad/ bsam gyis mi
khyab da/de dag khyadachub sems dpa' la yang dag par 'grub bo// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshen gnyen gyis yongs su zinapa byang chub samasadapa' ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
'jig rtan gyi khams gcig tu mos shang 'jug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mos shang 'jug ga/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad pad+ma'i
gdan gcig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis yongs su bya bar mos shing 'jug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du kun tu ston par mos
shang 'jug ga 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyun dus bde 'jug 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dad 'i 'dusakyiTayongs su khyab par mos shing 'jug/
go 'jig rnan gyi khams thams cad skya tsam gyi lo gcig la 'jog par mos shing 'jug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig tu bajug da dang ldand la mos shing
'jug gi 'jig rten gyi khams thamasacad de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi khang nub kyi shing dad/ byang chub kyi snyang ngos yongs su khyapar mos shing 'jug khag/
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgra skadagacig gis go bar byed cing/ sems can gyi khams sna tshogs kyi sgra la 'jug pas tshim par byed pan mos shing 'jug go/ sems can thamu/
a cad kyi ngo ba nyid dang/ lus sumos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus la 'jug pa dang ldan par mos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams/
thams cad byang chub sems dpa' khad du song bar masashing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i khod du zhugs ng ra mos shing 'jug go/ sems can
gyi khams thams cad mas can gacig gi lus la bstan par mos shing 'ajug le// sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du mos shing 'jug go// sems
skyo can gyi khams thams cad brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba gang 'dodapa dang/ mosang ba gzugs dang/ lus dang/ kha dog dang/ rtaga'amaden du
phyogs pa ston par mos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams thamasacad nyan thos dang/ 'dasangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang/ lus dad/ kha dog dad/ rtags dang/ tshu'adu
ston par mos shing 'jug go/ sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyis legs par brgyan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kun tu ston ramasangashang 'jug go/
sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshags pa'i gzugs dad/ mtshan dang/ dpe byad bzad de dad/ gzugs dad/ lus drad/ kha dog sna tshogs dang// sbyod
lam dang/ spyod pa kun tu ston pa gzhan shes par byed par mos sha'ajug go/ 'jam dang la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa'i
khams nas kyang ma g.yo la/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dad/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'i jugad nams 'alang snyams
par 'jug cing/ dadab gi dbang gis kyang mi skya'o// nyan thos kyi lam mngon du shasang la zhugs pa yang yin l/ snying rje chen po'i stobs kyang rgyunami gcod de// rang sangs rgyas
kyi lama mngon bushes shing mthong ba la mkhas pa yang yin la// snying rdzachen po stobs kyad nami gcod de// g.yog 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor ba yang yin l/ lhadad
me'i ga mog 'khor mang po rnam par dag pa dang yang ldan no// lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag dag gru dgrongs rjes su sgrogs shing/ sil snyan 'bum dag sel khro'a' byin pa dad lang
lcal/ byang chub sems dang le lam dad ldan pa'i bsam gtan dad/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi 'dor te// 'gro ba'i
dga' ba dang/ rtsa ba dang/ bzhad gad dang 'jo sgog thams cad dad/ sems can brkam chags nag ba du'adzithamasacad kyi nang na gnas pa yang minal/ sems kyi skad cig
gcig la yang byang chub kyi sams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang mi 'dor ro// 'jig rten lasa'adas pa yang yin te/ 'jig rten thams cad dad ma 'dres la/ nga la tu 'gro ba'i lam
'a slobang ba yang snang zhing las dang nyon mongs par bying ba'i samasacan rnams yongs su smin par yang byed do// lam la gnas shing lamaji lta ba bzhin du shes pa mthong ba la zhugs
pa yang yin la/ 'am ngan par lhung pa'i sems can yongasasu sminapar bya ba'i phyir/ lam ngan pan yang snang zhing/ lam de snying po'i 'du shes dang yang m yin la// sa dag
pa' 'dod pa yang ma yin no// lus dang/ dag dad/ yid kyi las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa yang yin te/ rtag tshul khrims lags par bsrungs shing/ dbazhin gshegs
pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la ladagal la/ sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyi'i/ phyis pa sose ba skyo bo ngo 'a pa spyod phul ba la yang kun
tu snang ngo// bsod nams dad ye shesakyi tshogs bsags shing/ byang chub sems dang 'i 'gro ba la yang gzhol la/ngan 'gror skyes pa'isamasacan yongs su smin par bya ba'i
phyir/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud bgro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ mi khom pa dang/ dbul po'i khyim du 'gro ba'i skye ba yang kun tu ston la/ 'gro
ba der yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma yin no// bshes dang/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pas gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i lashas la mkhas pa
yang yin no/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi skudad/ lus gzugs gcig tu gyur pa dang/
sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin ng 'i chos kyi tshul dad/ dgongs pa snang ba rtogs pa dang/ theg pa thams cad manyam pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi spyod yul la mngon du phyogs pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis bsngags par 'os pa dang/ samasacan gyi khams thams cad kyis gdod du blta ba dang/ 'gro ba thamA
cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa dang/ zab cing brtan pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i dusarlabs lta bu ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtsa ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dad/ kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs
su 'grub pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa yang yin la/ chos yongs su tshol ba'i rgyun la nga me gartsed do// lha dad/ mi dad/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za bcas
pa'i 'jig rten gyi slob dpon dam pa yong yin la/ tsog tsog pur 'dug pa thal mo sbyar nas mkhan po dang/ slob dpon las chos 'anapar yang kun tu ston cing/ gus par bya ba
thams cad kyis nye bar gnas par yang snyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnasaMnas thabs gangadang gang gisasaMmasacan rnams yongs su sminapa'i maM/ 'dul bar 'gyurab
thabs da dang de nyidasems can rnams la ston to// dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tubasdus pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thamasacad kyi rtsa mor phyin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs
ba thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba dang/ chos kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po dam pa'i mchog thob pa dang/ chas kyicodapan thogs pa med cing dri ma med pa bcangs pa dang/
'jig rten gyi khams thams nyid du thogs pamad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kun tu ston pa dang/ thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khel bskor ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa dad/ lus gzugs
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa dang/ ltar ba dang/ thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog thobs dang ldan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad mib pa dad/
'gro ba'i zhing thams cad du skya ba ston pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs dad/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang yul gcig tu gyur pa yang yin la/
byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pa'i rgyun yang mi gtsed/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon ra 'ad bya ba'i stobs las kyang yongasasum nyams/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs las
kyang thagand du mi 'gyur/ byang chub sams dpa'iches nyid kyadam 'dor/ byang chub sems dang las kyi mtha' las kyang mi 'da'/ byang chub sems dang tshe lam 'as kyang phyir ma lde'o//
byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhum par yang mi khyadad// 'jamadapaladag ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dang bani chos thams cad la byang ba mdar dang/ do ba
med pa dang/ bdagapa ma dang dad/ 'jag pa med pa dang/ sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu dang/ rmi lam dang/ mig yon dang/ gzugs brnyan dang/ chu zla dang/ stong pa nyidi
dang mtshan ma mad ra dan/ smon pa tshadapudang/ mngon pa rab du bya ba med pa dang/ brjod du med pa dang/ sman med pa dang/ bsnyad du mad pa dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/
