yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ rnam pa 'jig pa med pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid dang/ dbyer med pa dang/ gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba de ni de'i dmigs pa yin te/ chos thams cad ni
spya// gnyen po med pa'i bya so// chos khams cad rtsis bya ba de ni de'i dmigs pa ste/ 'dushes 'dzin pa'i phyir dmigasapa'o// gci'i phyir zhe na/ somasamadang/
las sams su dmigs pa ni 'dushes phyin ci log yin pa'i phyi'i te/ sems phyin ci log tu gyur na/ sams myos par 'gyur// sems myos na sams bsladarar bgyur ro//
samasabasad pa las sems sku par 'gyur// sams skagal las byang chub kyi sams nyams par 'gyur// 'jam dpal de lta bsan/ byang chusamasadapa'i nyams la/
sams kyis rjesasu blta bar bya'o// 'jam dang dag pa'i bshesaganyen gyis yodas su zin pa'i byang chusems dpa' ni dbang bsu thob par 'gyur te/ banugang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
tshel dag nga ba dad/ sems la dbang ba dad/ yo byad la dbang ba dang/ lasal dbad ba dang/ skya ba 'dabangabadad/ mos pa la dbang ba dad smon las la dbang ba dang/
rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang/ chos la dbangab dang/ ye shes la dbang ba'o// rnam par sprulapa banu yang 'thob ste/ bcugang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnam par sprul pa dang/
ni rnam par sprul pa dang/ chos rnam par sprul pa dang/ lus namapar sprul ba dang/ smon lam rnam par sprul ba dang/ spyod yul rnam pa sprul pa dang/ phebashes rnam pa'i sprul
pa dar/ mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dad/ stobs rnam par sprul pa'o// 'jam dpal dag ba'i bshesaganyan gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub
samasadapa'i ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis mos po la 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nyid la 'jug pa dang/ phyogs thams cad kyi dri ba rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa/
dang/ 'jig rten gyi khamasastang bog mad cing gzhi phul ba'i rgyud thams cad 'jug pa dang/ chos thams cad gcig pa dang/ tha dad pa nyid rab 'byams rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa
la ba jug pa dang/ las thams cad bsgyur bar gzhug pa la 'jug pa dad/ bdu shes phyin 'og gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i 'jig rtan gnas pa tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes can tha dad pa nyid la
'jug pa dang/ chos thams cad bsgyur ba la 'jug pa'i mtha' nges par 'byung bgacage la 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi dbyis thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul par byin gyisazlog pa
la'ajug pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad dus gsum la 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung rgyunami 'chad pa la zhugs pa ma shes mngon par sgrub bo// 'dzom dpaladag ba'i
bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag las dag pa'i rtse ba bskyed pa sbyin pa las byung ba dang/
mchod pa las byung ba dang/ dadag gi thad nas bslab pa gzung ba las byung ba rnams snga dro gcig gis zil gyis gnon// 'jam dpal de ltar dag ba'i bshes
zla gten/yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan na// 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyan gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams de ra na yang jul dra rab kyi rdug de la dus
gsum la 'jug cing bsal pa'i phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug par bskal par byin gyis brlabs te/ dus gsum la 'jug pa'i chos ston to// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rtag pa// brtan pa// ther zug pa yin pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
yongs su zinar 'a byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'du shes phyin ci log tum 'gyur ro// 'jamadang la'adu shes phyin ci log gis sems phyin na leg tu gyur pa'i sa mas can rnams
'di dag nisangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no zhes mngon da ra zhen nas chos spong bar byed do// mi dag ba'i las sna tshogs kyang byed do// 'jam dang 'a sangs
rgyas kyi chos rnams ni skye ba lam/ 'gag pa med da/ 'jam dang lasangs rgyud kyi chos rnam sa ni ma skyes pa// ma 'gags pa/ yi ga mdang// sgra med pa/ gnyis su med pa/
gnyen po med nga// sgra las la nga dag par 'das pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gnyen po med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dang 'a'adi dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ni mtha' sta/ 'jam dang 'a mtha' gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin te/ 'jam dang 'a sangs rgyas kyi chos ni mtha' med pa'i ngo ba nyid de//
brnyam dar la mtha' med pa'i ngo ba nyidanemo/ mi 'gagag/ 'jam dpal mi skya mi 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' dang/ mtha' mdar yongs su sbyangs pa stsa/ yi ga med pa//
sgramed pa/ sgra la sa yang dag pa rab das pa gdags par bya ba ma yin pa// gnyis sumadang/ gnyan po mdang 'o// 'jam dpal gang gnyen po med pa nga nimi skya mi 'gag go/
gang mi skya me'agag pad nas nigs rgyas kyi bka' yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bajam dpal dbazhin gshags pa ni chos kyi lta ste/ shin tu ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gags pa 'od
da 'a ni tshig ma dmod kyi/ sngon gyi dag ba'i rtsa ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ smon lam gyi stobs bskyodapa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthod nga/ 'jam
dpa' dpagan/ ma burin po che chu 'dang ba byed pa/ chu'i nang du bcugam thag tu/ 'dam rdzabadud/ rnyogamathams cad 'dang bar byed kyang/ 'jam dang 'azhu zhu/
pa cha chu 'dang bar byed pa'i/ ma rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i byab de lta bu de 'byung ngo// 'jam dang lade bzhin du de bzhinagashag
pa byang ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mo ngasanga' 'damardzob dang/ ga pa thams cad 'dang bar byed kyang/ der/
gshog pa ni mi rtag/ rnam par mi rtogasta/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung de// 'jam dpal dpar na/ rdza mkhan gyi 'khor loshin tu myur zhing/
stobs kyi shugs kyis 'a pa des pa ni/ rdza mkhan gyi dbang gis snod spyad sna tshog sa mngon ngag 'du byed kyang/ 'jam dpal rdza ma khan gyi ba lor lo nam rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/

'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo//'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sngon gyi dag nga 'i/
rtsa ba dang/ sod pa dang/ smonalamagyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi shugs kyis/ sems can gyi dbang gisasems can rnams la dag ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs mngon par 'du mdzad kyang/ de[4]
pazhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam pa mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhunagyis grubacing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ste sangs rgyas kyi chos ma badres pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//
'jam dpal sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol ba dang/ gang dag bshes mi gsol ba dang/ gang dag gis mthong ba dad gang dag gis ma mthong ba dad/ gang
dag stod pa dang/ gang dag ma stodapa dang/ gang dag gshe ba dang/ gang dag mi gshe ba dang/ gang dag zhu ba byed pa dang/ gang dag zhu ba mi byed pa de dag thams cad kyi bya ba rnam sa kyang/
sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis lhun gyis khru bcud rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegasang 'khyu mchog tugyur pa thams cad kyang dag ba'i gshes gnyen gyis yongs
su nad las byung de// 'jamadang 'dab gshas gnyan gyis yongs su thanang bang nus sams dang sasangs rgyas kyi sku dang/ kha dog mtha' yas modas su 'grub pa bslab pa'i
gzungs 'thob sta[à¥° ]/ gzungs de thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thamasacad sangs rgyas kyi skus khyab pa byed d// 'jig rtan gyi khams re bar dang mngon par rdzogs
par byang chub pa'i sku ston te// lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtogapar chos kyi 'khor la bskor ba grangs med pa dang chos tha dad pa nyid grangs med pa sten te gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o//
ba jam dar la de ltar na drag ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yon tan bsam gyisami khyags dang ldan pa yin no// 'jamadang 'delta bsan/ byungachub sems dpa'
dbazhin gshegs pa la khyab bzhin du dag ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bstan par bya// bstan par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bya'o/ 'jam dang la mi dag ba'i bshes gnyena rnams ni
brag gi bya skyibs rab tu 'bar ba bzhin du yongs su spang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'jam dpal mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bstan na/ byang chub sams dpa'i sams dang/ 'du shes
phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro// sems phyin ci log tu gyur na/ kun tu 'khrul par 'gyur// sems kun tu 'khrul par gyur na/ rnam par rmongs par 'gyur/ sems rnam par rmos
na skrag par 'gyur ni// sems skrag par gyur na/ byang chub kyi sems 'dor bar 'gyur// byang chub kyi samasabe'o na lha yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro// lha yongs su gtongan/
lha rnams kyang de la bsngags pa ma yin pa sna bar 'gyulo// klu rnams dad gnod sbyin rnams dang/ dri za rnams dang/ mi 'am tsa rnams dang/ lta'aphya chen po rnams dad/
mi rnams dad/ mi ma yin pa rnams nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bar dag kyang de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyupa// 'jam dpal de lta bsan byang chub sems dpas dag ba'i bshes
gtana rnams la bstan pa la bya'o// bstan par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bya'o// 'jam dpal dpagan/ skyabs zhes bya ba'i smananiganod sems kyi sams dang ldan pa lam/ dang ba'i
sems dad ldan bsa mthong yang rung ste/tha na dud 'gro'i skyo gnasasu song ba de dag gi nad thams cad mad par 'gyu long/ spyabs zhes bya ba'i smanani ma rtogo/ rnam par ma rtag ste/ mab dris
ra'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtag par de'i bya ba delta bu de 'byung ngo// badzam dpal de bzhin duganod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dadaba'i sems
dang ldan pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ri mo bris pa dang/ gzugs su byas pa mthong na/ thun dud 'gro'i skye gnasasu song ba yang rung ste/ de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad/
thamasacad med par gyur pa de bzhin gshags pa'i mi rtag/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ ma badras da'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam pa mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu
de 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal dang ran/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho chen po las mngon ng ra 'phags/ nam mkha'i spyod yul la gnas nas/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
grangasamed pa btang bas/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dad/ yu'a 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad du mthong ba sbyin ng ra byed cing/ mun
na@#// pa se'akhar byed/ 'dam rdzab dang/ rtog pa thams cad skams bsha' byed/ pad+ma rnams kyang kha bye bar byed/ rtswa dang/ shing gal ba dang/ sman dang/
nagasatshal thams cad kyang skya bar byed/ sman thams cad yongs su smin par byed/ las kyi gnas thams cad ni gnas par byed la/ chu klung dang/ mtshe'u dang/ mtshabran
thams cad la'ang dus gcig dusnang ba thob par 'gyur lang gnas las kyang mi g.yo nang/ 'jam dpal te ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i
chos dang ldan pa'i phyi'i/ lhan gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de rtagatu 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegasapa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyang srid pa'i rgya mtsholas mngon par 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi nam mkha'i spyod lu'a'a gnas nas/ ye shesakyi bdawe byed pa khrag khrig grangs med pa btang
rgyu sa phyogasang nugeb jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du snang ba sbyin pa mdzad cing/ sems can thams cad kyi mngag pa'i mun pa mun nag dang/ ra'ab dad/ yid
tog rnams rnam par sel bar mdzad/ nyonamos pa'i 'dam rdzob dang rtog pa thams cad skams pa'i mdzad/ yu'ang po nasaganyid kyisagapa'i sems can gyi khams nisad pa/
mdzad/ sems can thams cad kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad ni skyabar mdzad/ sems can thams cad kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad n yongs su smin pa mdzad/ dag pa'i
rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad nirag tu 'jog par mdzad de/ dusagacig tudi'i mdzad pa thams cad 'byung yang gnas nias kyang mi g.yo zhing/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/
rnam par mi rtog ste/ bon kyang m 'dus pa'i chesadad ldan pa 'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtag par de'i mdzod nga de lta bu de 'byung de// 'jamadapal de ltar de bzhin gshegs
pa'i lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa rasems can yongs susmin par na dzad pa 'i gnas rnams kyang/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin 'das 'a byungad/ 'jam
dpal dag ba'i bshes gnyan gyis zin nga 'i byang chub sems dang ban chos rab tu rnam par 'byed cing/ dpyod pa lamakhris par 'gyur te/ de chos rnams la 'di ltar dpyad do//
migani gzugs kyi dmigs pa'i rgyu ma yin/ gzugs kyang mig gi dmigs pa'i rgyu ma yin la/ dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen nyid kyis kyang rnam da ngashes pa 'byung ste/ rnam ra ra/
shes pa de yang mig las kyang ma byung/ gzugs las kyang ma byung zhing/ rnam nga Tashes pa de ni byung nasazhig la/ zhu zhing mi gnas pa'o// rna pha dang/ sna dang [7 ]lcedad/
lus kyang dang zhin no// yid kyang chos kyi skyon ma yin zhing/ chos kyang yid kyi rgyun ma yin la/ dmigs pa'i rgya can gyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/
rnam pa shes pa de ni yid las kyang m byung/ chos rnams las kyang ma byung zhing/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa de ni byung nas zhig la zhu zhing mi gnas pa'o// de bzhin dudage ba'i rtsa ba
yang byang chub kyi rkyenam yin/ byang chub kyang dug ba'i rtsa ba'i rkyen ma yin mod kyi/ dag ba'i rtsa ba de yang byang chub kyi skyes dmigs pa las/ samasaskye ba rnams kyis sta
dedag kyang skyes nas zhig cing zhu lami gnas pa'o// de 'asams gang gis dag ba'i rtsa ba mngon pas dus byas pa dang/ sems gang gis byung chub tu yongasasu bsngos pa de gnyis n/
phan tshun mi sbyor ro// dper na me ni gan gnas kyang ma 'ong/ gang du yang mi 'gro ste/ 'on kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'bar ro// 'jamadang 'a de bzhin du byang chub sems dad 'i shes rab kyi
'ba' yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong/ gang duyang mi 'gro sta/ 'on kyang dag pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'barten nas byang chub sems dang ri shes rab kyi me ltar te/ shes pa de lta bu dad ldan pa de ni
myur du bla na med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// 'jam dang lo de ltar na dag pa'i gshes gnyen rnams ni yon tan rgya mtsho nadamad pa yin no// 'jam dpalarigs
xxx
dang bcas pa rnams la rtag par nyin gcig bzhin du zha'abras gabargya dang ldan r dang/ lha'i na babra'adag pulal/ de ltar 'bul ba bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi byamasnyad dag tu du la zhangad
bzhin gshags pa de dag yongasasumya ngan las 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa de de'i phyir yang/ phyogs banu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khamasar der yang
mchod rten 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar las byas pa/ nor bu rinapocha glag gisngonams spras pa/ nor bu rin po che bod thams cad bsdus pa'i stags bus yos su bskor ba/ nor bu dang ma
tig dang/ rin po che'i 'brong bas mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bskyong ba/ dril bu g.yor ka'i dra bababla rubrasapa can shakyA pagyasnyad sbyar na/
phyugs ra/ nor bu rin po che dbangagi rgyal de 'a dra bas khebs par byas nga/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyad dag byas te/ mchod rtenade dag la stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i tshad tsam gyi lha'i na bza' dag dang/ gdugs kyi sprinadagadang/ rgyalamtshan gyi sprin dag dang/ ba dan gyi sprinadag dang/ ma rtog gi sprin dag dang/ sdos kyi sprin dag dang//
nor bu'in po che da pa nga ge rgyal po'i sprin dag dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sprin dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtogal nyin gcig bzhin de ltamachod cing bskal
pag 'i krungagi bya ma snyad dag tu mchod la/ sems can gzhan dapag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang machod pa de nyid la 'god pa bas/ 'jam dang la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo gzhon dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang/ ye shes bsam gyisami khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'athanamos par byed na/ 'di nyid de bas
bsod nams ches grangs mad par bskyod do// 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos nga rtsi byang chub sems dapa' ni pa rol tu phyin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med
pa dag yongs su rdzogs par byed de// sa bya ba khrag khrig 'bumaphral dpag tumar/ grangs med ra dag gnon to// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phragadang ga tu mad/ grangasamad pa
dag pa'i sil bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par de 'o pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bumadrag dang gtumad/ grangs med pa dga' ng rashes so// rgyal gyi dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag
rnam par 'jig par byed de// phrag dog dang/ ser sna'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag snyol bar byed do// srid pa'i chu klung dpag tu med/ grangasamad pa dag skams par ]
byed do// skye ba'i rgya mtsho dang gtumad/ grangs med pa dag las rgal bar byed de// bdud kyi zhags pa dang ga dumad/ grangs med pa dag gcodad// nyi zla rnams dang/ brgya byin dang/
tshangs nga dad/ 'jig rten skyong b rnams kyi gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te 'dug go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nasasangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang
yidags dad/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes nga 'isems can rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang phrad par 'gyur ro// rgya/

mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// chos thams cad yang dag ra ra 'du ba zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i tid de 'dzan

kyang 'thob bo// rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyad 'thob bo// rin po che 'byung bzhes khuba'i tid de 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i dang nga 'dzin kyang 'thob pa/

pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// ma mkha'amadzod ces bya ba'i ting de 'dzin kyang bathob bo// 'jig rtan thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob

ba dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob te// yul la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin kyang kha thob bo// cher bskyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'theb po//
rnam dang dad sems la dbud byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'a thob bo// sang ga bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting de

'dzin kyang 'thob bo// mtha' yas 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// ragatugayo ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang ba thob bo// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i

ting de 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rdo rilta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rdo rje lte ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//

bka'adzin ces bya ba'i ting de 'dzin kyang 'thob de// lhun po sgronam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// lhun nge rgyamtshan zhes bya ba'i ting du 'dzin kyang 'a thong// rinapo ma'i na dzod ces

bya ba'i ting nge 'a dzan kyang 'thob bo// sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// sems can thamasacad kyi sams 'a dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//

spyod pa thams cad kyi yul las nges par byang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po// sbyor ba zab cing gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// snatshogs snang ba'i spobs pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge ba dzin kyang 'thob de// bltor mi mthong ba zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i tod de 'dzin kyang 'a thob bo// rnam par rol
0 pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// mngon par shesapa thams cad las nges par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin kyang 'thob ba// bdud gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob ba// gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// gzugs thams cad kyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin kyang 'thob pa// lus

rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin kyang ba klob de// spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang ba thob po// shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'a thob bo//
mngon sum du byang chub snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// so so yang dag par rig pa'in pa mi bstan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// yon tan gyi ma pa thams cad la

khajug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// chos thams cad 'dul bar rnam par des pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// rab tu zhi b rnam par desar 'i cho 'phrul nas bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// dang 'a bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin kyang 'thob bo// zab cing brtan pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i dus rlabs nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob ste// de dag
la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag 'thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi sku dang/ kha dog mtha' yas pa yongos su 'grub pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// lengashes
@#// dad ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'gebag/ sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thobade// mi zad pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo//
mthub yas 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob ba// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'agazungs kyang 'thob bo// pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo// rigs pa mi dang 'i sgor
brtag pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang ba thob bo// so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par ngesapa la 'jug pa zhes bya pa'i gzungs kyi bab// sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabasad nas
bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'a bong de// sangs rgyas kyi sku dad/ kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob sta/ de dag la sogs pa gzungs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
phrag grangasamed pa dag kyang 'a thob de// chos thams cad la spyod pa'i khyad par nyid kyang 'thob te// chos thams cad la gzhan la lag ma las pa shas ra ya nga ba thob bo// chos thams cad la
som nyi gcod pa nyid kyang 'thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa stong phrag grasamad pa dag kyang 'thob bo// sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa' bye bragalamakhas pa yang 'thob bo// 'jam
dang 'dapar na/ ri'i rgyal po der ba ni'i thams cad zil gyisamanananas/ lhamam/ lhan na/ ldang de'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du ches kyi rnam krangs 'di 'a mos pa'i byang chub mas
0 dang 'a yang/ sems can thamasacad kyi dag ba'i rtsa ba thamasacad brel gyis mnan nas lhamam/ lhan na/ lhang deb// danas ba jam dang ba gzhon nu gyur pas//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sams dang 'a sa gang dag lamos pas yon tan gyi khyad
par 'di dag dang/ gzhan dag kyang 'thob pa'i ches kyi bye brag gzhan dag kyang yodadam/ daskad ces smras pa dad/ byang chub sems dang ba sgrib pa thamasacad rnam par sa' ngas//
'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang dag mos na/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dug dang/ gzhan dang gtu med pa dag kyang 'thob
pa'i chos lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhen/ chos thams cad gnyenango mdang dang/ ma sa pa dang/ ma 'gags pa dang/ brjod du med nga ra mos pa dang/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
skad cig skad cig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang/ spyod lam la 'jug pa'i gnas 'dzam bu'i glingagi rdul phra rab kyi rdul las kyang lhag pa dag la lhun gyis grub cing rnamarab mi rtog
par 'jug par mos pa dang/ song gi bran bzangasakyi bu'i rtogs pa brjed ngas/ sems can yongs su smin par byas pa de/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi rgyal
snyad nas/ mdon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mdzad par mos pa dad/ maram mdzad kyis lung bstan pa nas bzung ste/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i bar der
kyi/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang yin pa de thams cad sangs rgyas kyiyu lagyi mthas klas pa'i bskal pa nas/ mngon nga' rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan/
pa yin par mos pa dang/ shAkya thub pas bstan pas soms can yongs su sminang ra byas pa gangayon pad sangasargyus kyi yul gyi mthas klasang 'a bsal panas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya
thub pa mngon par rdzogs pa la sangs rgyas nas mdzad pa yin par mos pa ste/ 'jamadapal lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gang dag la mos pas yin tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang/
gzhan dang ga tu med pa dag kyang 'thob pa yin no// 'jam dang 'ad/rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyad kyi dgra bcom pa mngon/
par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/ rnam par tharang brgyad la bsam gtan pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan ng dang/ lha'i gos dag phyin te/ de ltar na byin pa bskal
pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu byin ng bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mogazhan gang zhig gis rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyi ma gcig zas byin na/ den de
[2e8/] bas bsod nams ches grang mdangs spyad de/ 'jamadang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams na yang gatsug 'a ga khang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i
gsar las byas pa/ nor bu rin po che glog gi 'phra bas smras pa// nor bu'in po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stags bus yongs su bskor ba// de'i bu dang/ mu tig dang/ nor bu/
rin po tshab 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba danang sgrung ba/ dril bu g.yaka'i dra ba'i bar bris// tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po 'byug pas byug

pa nor burin po che dbag rgyal pos khengs bar byas pa/rgya mtsho na gnas pa'irinapo che rnam pa 'dag pa/bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i nor bu rin po tsho'i 'bam bos dkrig ba/nol nango sa ga la ba zhes ts+tsha ba'i spang leb brus pa/
nor bu rin po che sang ga rgyal mtshan gyi rtsa mo 'alas byas pa'i sgo khang dang/ rta babs dang/ skar khung gis brgyan pa/ dar gyi lhalde mang pas bris pa/ phyogs bcu'i ba jig rten gyi kham pa ba
khams thams cad kyi rdul snyad dag byas te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas stong phrag grangs med pa dag dang/ rad sangs rgyas de dag la nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zasar brgya dang ldan pa dang/
lha'i gos dag kyang byin zhing/ de ltar byin pa bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas
@#// zhe 'am/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po zhi bam/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bam/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i sgra thosan/ bdin de bas ches bsod nams
grangs med par spyang na/ gang gis da bzhin gshags pa 'i skur mor bris pa 'am/ gzugs su byas pa mthong ba ltaci smos/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pas skyid
(de[;]gang gisamar me phul ba 'am bdug pa 'am/ srasasam/ ma rtogadag gam/ rol mo'i sgra 'am/ mchod pa sna tshogs ga nyan dag byed pa lta ci smos pa/ 'di nyid de
bas chen bsod nams grangs med par skyod do// gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyi'i/ nyi ma gcig bslab pa gcig bsrung ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas mas bsod nams gra dag/
mad par skyod de// 'jam dang la dwags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang 'a la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chubs mos dang 'a dang bcas pa// nyan thos dang bcas pa// phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thamasacad kyi rdul phra rab snyada rnams 'dus nyin gcug bzhin du lha'i gras re brgya dang ldan pa dang/ lha'i na bza' dag kyang 'bul la// de ltar 'bul ba bskal
pa gang+ga'i klung gi bya ma snyad dag tu 'bul zhing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'dasanas kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de de'i phyir/ mchod rtan tshad gling zhi
[zc]pa tsama rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar las byas pa/ nor bu rin po cha klog gi sgron mas smras pa/
nor bu rin po che'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stags bus yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ ro ma'i 'phrang bas mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan
dang / ba dan bsgang// drag bu g.yar ka' dra ba'i bya bres pa/ tsanangan sbrul gyi snyipa'i khyug pas byugs pa/ de'i bu rin po tshe dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bsag.yog sapa/ phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rtanagyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyad dag byas te/ mchod rtenade dag lo nyin gcig bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshodatsamAgyi lha'i gos dag dang/ gdugs kyi sprin
dag dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dag dad/ ba dan gyi sprin dag dang/ me tog gi sprin dag dang/ sros kyi sprin dag dang/ nor bu rin pa ma'i sprin dag dang/ rol mo'i sgra'i sprin dag dad
rgyu na gyi sprin dag dang/ sad ge 'i rgyu mtshan gyi rtse mo'i zla ba'i sprin dag dad lha'i sil snyan dang/ phag rdob pa dang/ glu dbyangs kyi sgra'i sprina rnams kyis gtor mngon par
gto'ol/ chos kyi rnamagag 'di 'amos pas/ 'jamadang 'jigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing tha na dud 'gro'i skyo gnas su song ba'i samasacan gcig la zan kham gcig byin na/ bde nyid/
de bas ches bsod nams grangasamadapa' spyod do// 'jam dpal mad snga 'di 'amosapa'i byang chub sems dang 'gang la la zhig gisamado sde 'di las ji skad smos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/
sa rnams la mchod pa byed pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'di nyid la mos pa gzhan gang zhig gis mdo 'di nyid la mos pa'i byang chub sems dang/ 'gazhan zhig mthong nas/ byang
chub sems dpa' 'di ni mdo 'di nyid la mos pa'o snyam sta/ dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba chen po rnyed la/ de sems dang bas da'/ngas te/ de la thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te//
ci nus ci lcogs su de la yongs su gzung ba byas na/ 'di nyid de bas ches sangs rgyas kyi yingashes thob par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams grangs med par skyid// 'jam dpal de lta bas
na sangs rgyas kyi shes 'dod nga 'i byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyin/ 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag kyang rgalate
'go bar bya'o/ 'a jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhigagis bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyad pa las/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'/
gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa'o snyam du mos bar byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par spyod do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dang 'a gang la la zhig
gis sangs rgyas phyogs banu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad dag la lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang/ lhin bawa' dag nyin gcig bzhin du 'bul zhing de
lta'adu 'a ba bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag tu 'bul ba pas/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dang ba gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshagasar ba yon tan dang/ yongashes bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bde mosapa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa
lags so legs so// khyod nilha dang pa cas ra 'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bya ba'i 'os yin no zhes bsam pa thag pa nas 'gas so zhes bya ba byil/ khyod de bzhin gshags pa thams/
cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas rnams su zhugs la/ chos kyi 'khor lo skagacig ces byas na/ rnamadapal byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bas ches bsonganams grangs med par 'apalata
bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba bde'i sbyin pa 'gu khyungaba'i bsod namasaljam des brgya re'i cha yang nye ba'am bsgra/ stong gi cha dang/ 'bum gyi ma dad/ bya ba'i cha dad
[n, ]@#// bye ba brgya'i cha dar/ bye ba stong gi ched bye ba 'bum gyi cha dang/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi mdang/ grangs dang/ cha dad/ bgrang ba dad/ dpa dad/
zla dang/ rgyar yang ma bzododo// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas de skad ces smras nas/ byang chub
sems dpa' 'jamadar/la gzhon nus gyur pa dad/ byang chub sems dang bde dag dang/ nyan thosanan po de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri bar bcas pa'o
'jig rten la'angs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshags pa'i yon tanadang/ ye shes bsam gyisami khyab pa'i yul
la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba thegapa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA nagargyu dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+ra ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
la phab pa'o/// @#// mdo sde snyan gyi gong rgyan zhes bya ba theg ra chen po'i mdo// lekolas 'das pa/ rgya mtsho mching
rnamasu/ de'i bar mad na rdo rje brtanang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// da' ba med na yangs par yongs su dag pa'i gsang gragasapa'i mngon mtshan rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i dri

chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam lta/ da na rdul gyi 'og gnas bstan pa zhes bya ba 'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gas gtu gnas so// de'i par medan snang bas lhang nga zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching/
rnam sto/ de na rnam pa tha dad pa'i las kyis snyoms par brgyan pa zhes byapa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gsarab tu gnasaso// de'i ba medan rgyaskadazhi ba zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho
mching rnam// de na rab tu 'phyang ba'i mngon duba'i ngon pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas ste/ de lta bu lasogasar 'arjed du mad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi

zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam rnams kyi phyi rol gyi khor rer yug gi mtshamasan/ 'od ' dro skyug pa sbyin rgyal mtshan zhes bya pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho
mchang rnam sto/ de na zla 6 thams cad kyi dmigs pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'gas rab tu gnasar/ byang chub kyi dkyil thamasecad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor gyi sgra ma lus pa'i gzhi'o// der thamasacad kyi 'og man/ legasamig bris pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongs su dag pa'i 'khor rnams te/ de na rdo rje'ab phyogs thams cad du rnamapar snang mdzad ces bya ba de bzhin gshags pa'o// de'i gangasadas/
rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rtanagyi khams rnams las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs kyi dbus rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi 'dzin/
rtan gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ pad dpal gyi de'u'i kha dog ces bya ba'i ba jig rten gyi khamAte/ da na brtson 'grusatshan ro shin tu blo gros zhes bya ba de ba zhin gshegs pa 'o//
da'i grong mi mjed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ rdo rjesu ba'i mtshams bra sa ra zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de na shing sa la'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan zhes
sgyu bya ba de bzhinagshegs pa 'o// de'i gong du sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdunagyi mchog tu phruba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams las 'das pa'i bajig rten gyi khams kyi 'gyu/
kyi sde ba na/ rgya mtsho mching rnam dag pa bris pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rtan khams te/ de na bril gyis ma mnan rab shin tu gong du ba phags pa'i gzi brjid cas bya ba de bzhin gshags/
pa'o/ yang rin po che 'byung gnas snod kyis btsugs pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam/ de'i bar med rin po che thams cad snang ba bod rnamar ga lhangang zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho
mching rnam ste/ de na grags pa drim med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i par med na tshad med pa'i ni ngo tsha rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho
mching rnam ste/ de na mtshan nyidanamamakha ba rnamapa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi shugs rab tu gnas so// de'i ngang tshud na rnam par snang mdzad kyi dpa' bu ra nas/
bya ba'i dri chu'i mtsho mchang rnamaste/ da na thogs pa mdopa kun snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'gas rab tu gnasaso// da'i bar mad na tsan dan gyi sdod pa'i ka
sa zhes bya ba dri chu'i rgya mtsho mched rnams/ dan 'khyil ba mtha' mas phyogasasu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs 'ab tu gnas so// de'i bar mad na gsa' rin
po tsha'i rgyal po dpa' babyung ba zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mchinganam sa/ danargyal mtshan gyi rtsa mo nang 'khyil ba rgyu ba nasabya ba'i 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi rigasarab tu gnas so//
de'i mtshungs pa'i 'dab chags na/ kun tu rdo rje'i me tog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnamasta/ don bsam dumadapa'i rnam pa'i tsha ston r zhes bya ba'i 'jig rtan gyi khams
kyi rigs ratu gnas so// de'i bar mdan bsam pa'i na bu'i rgyal po 'khor las 'og bris pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching+ga rnam ste/ de na chags pa med pa'i rnam par shes
par byed pa sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'abar mdan rin po che'i se mo do 'og tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho/
dmaching rnam ste/ de na rnam pa'i blo gros dag ba mtha' med kyigazi brjid ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i pa mdan mu tig/
sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis snyoms par brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de nas ngs rgyas kyi yul smon lam 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi rig
'tsha rab tu gnas te/ de lta bu la sogs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mchang nam ste/ thams cad
kyi phyi rol kha 'khor yug gi mtshams na/ 'dzam bu'i chun pa che'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam/ de na kun tu sgra rgyal mtshan zhes byang ni 'jig rten
gyi khams kyi rigs mngon par gong du 'phags pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo mar gzhan dang gzhan par 'o jug pa'i sgra ma lus pa ni gzhi'o// der thams cad kyi 'og ma ni ma dag ka/
kyisaza' da' phranas bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ sangs rgyas kyi+i nang gi mchog tu dra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasamatha' gcig tu yongs su dag pa ni 'kher rnams
te da na rtsal sbyin zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i// da gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams las 'das pa'i rdo rje'i rgyal
mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'a jig rtenagyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ pad+ma rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam
pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongasasudag pa ni 'khoranams te/ de na yon tanathams cad kyi mchog sems kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshags pa'o// de'i gong
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams las 'das pa'i mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na/ stobs bsu rgyan zhes
bya ba'i 'jig rtan gyi khams te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tuphra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu nyon mongs pa dad/ rnamapar dag pa'i 'khor rnams te/ de na
dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi rgyal po shin tu 'byung zhes bya ba de bzhin gshags pa'o// de'i gong 'jig rten gyi khamasakyi rigs kyi stangan/ rdu'i nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyalamtshan zhes bya ba'i
'jig rten gyi khams te/ de na rnam pa'i blo gros langs pa spyanabazangs zhes bya ba de bzhinagshegs pa'o// yang rin po che rjesasu 'gro bar brgyan padri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam/ de'i
ba mad na 'od zer gyi mdzod lhun po rten zhes bya ba'i drinu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ den stug po yangs pa'i sbyan babyung ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i
@#// bar mdananamanga' bris pa'i rgyan byin gyi rlabs kyi spyod yul zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ da na dri ma med pa'i rnamapa'i chami sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten

gyi khams rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rin po che stug po'i pad+mo'i yal ga 'phyang ba zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching nam ste/ de nalus kyi rgyanarab tu dam pa'i mar ma zhes bya ba'i 'a sde
rten gyi khams kyi rigs 'gatugs so// de'i bsamad narin po che thamasacad kyi rgyan yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de ni ma'i 'od bar gyi dra ba'i 'byung

gnas zhes bya ba'i la jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bumadanamang po byo bda' dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na rin po che ka sa ra phyin gyi rlabs kyis gnas zhes bya ba'i
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas// de'i ba' mad na shin tu yid rnab spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mchir rnam ste/ de nadam pa'i lus rgya mtsho mching rnam rgyan zhes bya ba'i
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar mdanabris pa bzhi'i khu brtsogs pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnamaste/ de na kun tu rnam par dag pa nam mkha'i snying
po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gsaratu gnas so// de'i bsamadan yangs pa dag pa'i gzi brjid lhang nge zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ den in+dani la'i dbyibs
skar mda' snang nga zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rtags 'ang tu gnas aso// de'i bar mad na 'dodarag byed pa'i chos dar/ mu tig 'thor rnam rar lcang de zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho
mching rnamaste/ de na sgra kun tu de'i skad ces byang ki'ajig rtan gyi khams kyi gas rab tu gnas te/ de lta bu la sogs pa rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
mchogatuphra ba'i rdul dang mnyamapa'i dri chu'i rgya mtshomachinganams thams cad kyi phyi 'il leb ler yug gi mtshams na/ in+danIradatu mthong ba zhes byaba'i dri chu'i rgya mtshomami rnams
de na phyogs kun tu rgyas pa dbyer med pa zhes bya ba'i 'dzib rten gyi khams kyi 'gasarab tu gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos 'byung ba'i nga'o'i sgram lus pa'i gzhi'o//
der thams cad kyi 'og mni dag pa mchogag snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasamatha' gcig tu
yongs su dag pa ni 'khor rnams te/ don yon tan rab tu dgu pa blo gros zhes bya ba de bzhin gshags pa'o// de'i gong sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams kyi khams rnams las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi snyigs kyi dbusajo rdza'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi shog dang mnyam pa na/ dbyibs kyi rgyan ces
dbyara'i 'jig rten gyi khamasate/den bedalhag par gong du 'phags ras snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshags pa'o// de'i gong mi mjed kyi ba jig rten gyi khamasakyi
'og dang mnyam pan/ rlu brtsags pa'i kun tu 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rtenagyi khams te/ da na lhunapa ma ma zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o// dbegong la jig rtan gyi
khams kyi rigs kyi stangan/ ma tog rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho mching rnam zhes bya ba'i ba jig rten gyi khams te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten
gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongs su dag pa ni 'khor rnams te/ dan sprul mi 'dapa shin tu sbyin gyi bdag po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// yang skad rdo rje 'dus pa'i sgra na lus pa/
dri chu'i rgya mtshomaching rnamada' bar mnan po che'i phur ma byas pa shin tu gong du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtshemaching rnamaste/ da lan tsha'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba zhes bya ba'i
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab gnas so// dab bamadu nAm tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi snyoms par brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i mtshon tshing rnamasta/ dan snang ba thamasacad ston m

zhes bya pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nags rab tu kha nas so// de'i bar med na ni po che'i gtsobasprin can zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching nam sta/ de ga ni po che thamasacad kyi 'ogagi rgan

[p/ ]snang ba rnam par lhung ngo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na'an po ma'i stong lu ka sa pa'i kha dogargyan ces bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtshomaming rnamaste/ de la
legs par btsugs pa gzi brjid stan gyi gong rgyan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rtanagyi khams kyi rtogasa'ab tu gnas so// de'i bar mda' po tshagatso'i gos rab tu brgyan pa'i tshogs rgyan zhes bya
ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtshomachi rnamaste/ de nargya mtsho mching rnam gyi snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnasaso/ de'i bamed na rinapo che'i sdong po yal ga btsugs pa
zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho mching rnamaste/ de nan po che'i 'od 'phro'i sprin lar tu gsar zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar mad
na bdod pa'i bo ga yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i drichu'i rgya mtshomang rnamaste/ de na chags med pa'i rdo rje kun tu sasu spyod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigasa'ab tu gnas aso//
de'i ba'amadan kun tu pad+mo lhab lhub ces bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtshom rnam ste/ de namatha' med pa'i 'gram rgya mtsho mnyidanam 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i jag rten gyi khamasakyi'igs rab tu gnas
so[;]de'i ba med na rin po che dmar 'i yan lag lhab lhub ces bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na zhing gi khog dmigs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'gasarab tu
gnas pa de lta bu l sogs pa brjod du mad nga 'isangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchogatu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa dri tshu'irgya mtsho mching rnam thamasacad kyi phyi 'ol kha ra khor yug gi/

mtshams na/ mi rigs pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ de na pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rnamapar phya ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs ba/
du gnas te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i sgra ma lus pa'i gzhi'o// deb thams cad kyi 'og ma ni shin tu dri'isnying re zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de zhatshad
med pas bod sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs ra'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i rigs kyi dbus rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa na//
bsam du med pa'i rgyan gyi tshul gyi sgo mo zhes bya ba'i 'a jig rten gyi khams te/ da na mi dka' ba'i yid kyis tshangs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshags pa 'o// de'i gong mi mjed kyi 'jig rten
ba gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pa// phyogs kyi snang ba me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de nas ngag gi spyana'od 'a spro sprin zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o//
de'i gong 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs kyi stang na/ rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi sgra zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te de na chu'i lha 'o da 'gro nal zhes bya ba de bzhin gshags pa'o// yang

lha'i grong khyer nor bu'i mar bu'i rgyan gyi dri chu'i rgya mtshomanyid rnam sta/ de'i bar med na snyad bge 'khor le rnam par 'tshol ba zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mchinganam sta/ de na brjod du med/
pa'i phyogs kyi gnas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// da'i bar med na rin po ma'i rdul lam rnamarar bris pa zhes su ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtshomanyid
rnam ste/ de na 'khyil pa du mar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar med na rgyan thams cad snyomasapar thar pa'i 'og ces bya ba'idrinu'i
rgya mtsho mching rnamasta/ dan napa ma'i 'od rnam par sbyang ba nas bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so/ de'i bar med 'dzin pa tshadrab rnam pa'i cha 'dusapa zhes bya
ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste de na tshul gyi mtshams kyi mthu zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnasaso// de'i bang mdun rin po che'i rgyalamtshan gyi rtse mo'i rgyan ces
bya ba chu'irgya mtsho mchang rnam sto dona'ajig rten gyi khams rnamar shes par byed pa// rgya mtshomaming rnamamalus pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigasa'ab du gnas so/
de'i ba med na nyi ma le khang po ngasas sprul bar snang ba zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnamaste/ danadabang po'i dra ba kun tu 'thor ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de be bar mad nasil khrel thamasacad kyi skad bsgrags pa'i sgra yid du kho nga ba zhes bya pa dri chu'i rgya mtsho mnying rnam ste/ de na 'a khyil ba/
klu/ thams cad kyi 'og tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lo gsarab tu gnas so// de'i bar medan rgya mtshos smras pas rnam pas bris pa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mchi rnams/
de na bod kyi sprin stug po dri ma med par 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas so// de'i bar mid na rin po che'i marama'i boda'agro sems rab mngon du 'gran
rtsa zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam sta/ de sangs rgyas kyi smonalam sna tshog sakyi dbyibs byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'gas rang du gnas pa// de lta bu
la sogs pa brjod du med pa'i ya nga brjodod mad pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam sta/ thams cad kyi phyi rol kho ra khor yug
gi mtshams na/ sa ma do'i gos kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i dichu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam sta/ denalags pa'i gos kun tu ston pa sprul pa zhes byaba'i 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi rigasa mngon pa
gad du 'phags pa 'das pa da/ ma 'ongasad/ dang/ daltar gyi sas rgyas thamasaMcad rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgra ma lus pa'i gzhi'o// der thams cad kyi 'og ma ni dbang po bkas

0 khakhyil ba'i snyingapa zhes bya ba'i dri chu+i rgya mtsho mching rnaman+ta/ da narab tu grol bar dga' byed ces bya ba'i 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi nang ga mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongs su dag pa ni 'khor rnams/ de nas d pa'i ngashas pas mi 'tham pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de'i gong sangs rgyas kyi zhing banu'i
mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyamar 'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams las 'dasapa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasakyi rigs kyi dbus rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi bajig rten gyi khams kyi 'og dang mnyam pan/
rin po che'i dbal dra ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcul mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyamapa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' gcig tu yongasasu dag pa'i 'khor
rnams te/ de natshamad pali slog gi gtso/ drang srong chen po zhes bya ba de ba zhin gshegs pa'o// de'i gong sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
rnams las 'das pa'i mi mjedupa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'ag dang mnyamapan/ rin po cha'i stan pad+mo seng ge zhes bya ba'i 'jig rtan gyi khamasakyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra
bab rdul dang mnyamanga' jig rtan gyi khams kun tunyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par dag pa ni 'khe rnams te/ de na dri ma med pa'i drag shul thes pa thog pa med pa nas khyi ba de bzhin/
gshegs pa'o// de la gangasangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams las 'das page'ajig rten gyi khams kyi

rigs kyi gong na/rin bzhi'i gru bod kyi kha dog ces bya ba jig rten gyi khamAgyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyenu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasamathub gcig tu yongasasu dag pa ni
'khaM 'khor rnams te/ den chos kyi khams yongs su rgyas pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'o// kya rgyal ba'i bu rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i mchog tu

phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dri chu'argya mtsho mching rnam sto/ de dag lasangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rab tu gnas
sa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs de dag thams cad kyang drachu rgya mtsho mching rnam de dga rnams la/ byang chub sems dang ba thams cad kyi lus rnam par shesapar byed pa bar na'
snang ba rgyal mtshan nor bu'i rgyal pos rab tu brgyan pa rgyan pad+mor rab tu gnas pa ni/ 'a jig rten gyi khams yogs bar med kyi mtshams gzhan dang gzhan pa'i rgyan rnams dang/ gzhan dang
gzhan pa'i ni po che'i kha dog gi snang ba rab tu btang ba'i rnams dang/ gzhan dang gzhan pa'i 'od zer gyi 'od dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tugayogs pa'i rnams dang/ gzhan dang gzhan
pas brgyan pa [â€œ]rgyunagyisaMha/ dkabado nanang bskal pa 'a grangs kyi tshul bshad ng 'a rnams dang/ gzhan dang gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi babyung bar 'jug pa ba rnams
dad [0f10 ]gzhan dang gzhan pa'i rgya mtsho mching rnam sgrog pa' rnams dang/ gzhan dang gzhan pa'i sems can gyi lus yongasasu rgyas pa'i rnams dad/ gzhan dang gzhan pa 'i phyogs
su 'jug pa tha mi dad pa'i rnam sa dang/ gzhan dang gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlangs dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rang nas
kyang 'jig rten gyi mtshams rab tu btang ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi dra ba dang/ rgyana'ang tu gnas pa thams cad kyis ma rtog 'og gi snying po brgyan gyi brgyan bajig rten gyi khams rgya mtshomanying
rnam thams cad ji snyadapa 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyi tshul gyisakun tu rgyas so// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs gcig nas ji bzhin pa de bzhin du'ajig rten gyi khams kyi rigs
thams cad kyis 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi mtshams kyi sgo thams cad kyis brgyan sna tshogs gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba sna tshogs kyisam tog 'og gi snying po rgyan gyi brgyan
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho mching rnam thams cad ji snyed pa kun tu rgyas so// de nas yang kun tu bzang po khyad chu sems dang/ sa lhag pa'i tshad du 'a jag rten gyi khams ]
kyi rigs mtha' dang dbus med pa 'jig rtan gyi khyen gyi tshul gyi chad pa de nyid snang byed pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/
da'i tshonAtshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rtan khams kyi rgya mtsho ni// chos kyi khams dad thami dad/ yas pa yangs par bris pa ni// nam mkha'i 'og tu gnas pa 'o//
ma 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho der// zhing gi rigs ni bsam med pa// rnam par gnas pa tha dad med// gzhan dang gzhan pa'i rnam sprul pa'o// rnamachan 'dus pa dris pa ni// sna tshog
! kha doga'agatugs// zhing gi rigs rang chud pani// 'jig rtenakhams kyi rgya mtsho ru'o// sna tshogs lus kyis sgra ma lus// sangasaMrgyas rnam sprul thams cad las// nang gi rigs
rnams snang ba ni// las kyis shin tu rnam bris pa'o// lhun po rgya mtsho dra ba yang// 'khor 'a 'khyil ba dkyil 'khor tu// yal bcu rdulo yangs pad+mo'i dbyibs// de dag
gis ni de dag bskor// tshul khrims rgyal mtshan brtsigs pa dang// bsgyur ba rdo rje'i gnas pa rnams// bsam du med pa'i khyon rnams kyis// da dag 'gasa rnams bskor ba'o/
'od kyi dra ba bsam med kyis// snang rgya mtsho btang bas ni// zhing gi rogis rnam 'bar ba yang// thams cad pad+mo rab tu gnas// de de yang nirigs las su// 'od zer dra bas
0/ bsamamed pa// 'od zer zhing du gyur nas su// rgya bo phyogs kyi rgya mtsho ru// thams cad zhing gi rigs rnamAgyi//dmigs pa thams cad sgo mo ru// thums cad tshul gyi 'jug pa yod//
zad pa med pa'i tshul ni snang// bsam du med pa'i zhing rnams su// bad pa med pa'i rigs rnams 'byung// sna tshog sargyan gyi bshad pa ni// drang srong chen po'i byin rlabasas// zhing
gi rigs ni de dag tu// 'jig rten khams ni bsam med de// gong bar 'gyur ba skya ba dang// kun tu 'byung dang mi 'byung ngo// jibazhinashin tu'am rnams// 'byung ba dang ni lhung ba ma/
deltar de bzhin zhing 'gasasu// 'jig rten khams rnams 'byung ba'o// ji ltar shing rnams snying po ru// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur// de ltar de bzhin ningarigs su// gon
bdunasamasacan 'byung bgo/ ji bzhin yang ni bye brag gis// 'bras bu snang ba sna tshogs par// deltar lasakyad bye brag gis// sems can nams kyi zhar byung ngo// ji ltar
bsam rgyu'arin chen no// kha dog kun gyi snang ba ste// sems can bsam pa rnam dag phyir// da bzhin zhing rnams mthong nga// ji bzhin klu yi rgyal pos sbyin// nam mkha'i 'og
tu ston byed pa// de ltar sangs rgyas smon lam gyis// sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'byung ba'o// sgyu ma byed pa'i sngags kyis su// rnam pa snatshogs bzhin ston pa// de bzhin sams/
can las kyis su// bsam mad zhing rnams 'gyur ba'o// ji bzhin bris byas kyi ni gzugs// ri mo mkhan gyi sa'i ma bras// de ltar 'di dag thams cad zhi/
sems kyis shin tu bri bar brus// sems can rnams kyi gon 'dun lus// ji bzhani masakyis brtags pa la// de bzhin zhing rnams gon 'dunapag/ thams cad las kyis khris
ba gzhan dang gzhan pa'i gzugs sun// ji ltar snang ba 'dren pa rnams// ji bzhin sems can bsam pa la// de bzhin zhing rnams mthong ba 'o// pad+ma'i drub phyi rol dang//
sems can zhing rnams mtshams su ste// gzhan r 'i dbyibs dang kha dog rnams// sa par snang ba dri med pa'o// pad+ma dri ba de dag la'ang// zhing gi dra ba 'du tu gnas// rgyan
sna tshogs su chud pa ni// sems can gon 'dun rnams kyi gnas// kha cig zhing gi de dag 'og/ kun tu nyon mongs pa du gnas// sems can rnams ninyon mongs pas//
de dag tu ni chos nyid snang// bsam du med pa'i zhing rigasa rnams// kun tunyon mongs rnam dag kyang// sems can bsam pa 'byung ba ru// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu gnas//
khacig zhing 'og mang po ni// rnam par dag dang nyon mongs mang// las kyi rgya mtsho sun 'byung// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sprul// khacig zhing gis log btang ba// .]
la mad cing ni rin chen gyi// rnam par bris pa dri med dag/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang yongs sbyangs so// zhing gi rigs ni gcig tu yang// bskal pas bsreg pa bsam med pa/ na
mongs rnams la ston pas// zhing gi dkyil 'khor rab tus// rlung gi phung posmon lam gyis// chu'i phung rab tu gnas pani// zhing rnams mang po byung bar 'gyur// sems can
rnams kyi las bsags pas// stoshig zhing du gzhan gzhan po// snang ba zhing gi chos nyid ni// de dag rnams ni 'byung min zhing// de dag rnams kyang ldog med do// mang po zhing
rnams 'byung ba ni// thams cad sems kyi skad cig tu// sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabasakyisani// shin tu dag pa drimad stes// sachen pos zhing rnams ni// kha cig byung pa sra ba'i
rnams// snang ba med cing bod med rnams// sdig pa'i las kyi gnas rnams so// kha cig ning ni rdo rje yi// kun du nyon mongs 'jigs pam// bad pa chung zhing sdug bsngal mang
bsod nams chung ba rnams kyi gnas// kha cig zhing rnams lcags kyi ste// zangs dang 'a kha'i bar gnas pa rnams// sdig pa'i las kyis khyab pani// nyam nga rje ya'i rnams so//
khajig rtand ra dmyal ba ste// sems can rnams nimagon med sdug bsngal ba// mun pa rgyud du thob pa ni// 'od lnga'i rgya mtsho 'bar ba'o// de bzhin byel song 'gro ba yang//
bdag gi lus ni thag thug pa// rang gi lus kyis nyes pas na// sdug bsngal tshor ba'i tshor ba 'o// snang ba gshin rje'i 'jig rten du// skom dang brubs/
nyon mongs pa/ ma yi ri la 'dzegs pa rnams// sdug bsngal tshor ba tshor ba'o// kha cig rin chen bdun rnams te// kha cig gnas ni rnam par bris// dag ba'i las kyis byung
la6 ba rnams// rnam par dra bar khang pa brgyan// kha rtseg lha dang mi rnamagayang// mtho ras 'jig rten du mi ltos// dag nga'i bsod nams 'bras bus ldan// dag ba'ibad ba chung
lci ba'i nyag ma gcig gi rtse mor ni// bye ba zhing ni bsam med pa// sna tshog sa rnam par bris pa'i dbyibs// dadag yang 'dres pa med// bdag bdag kun gyi las kyis su//
samasacan khamasan bsam med pa// sna tshogs 'du shes zin pa rnams// bde dang sdug bsngal myong ba'o// kha cig zhung ni mtha' mad snang// sems can thams cad gnas kyi
gnas// rdo rje ut+pala'abyung ba'i rnams// bris pa dag pa dri med pa// zhing na khacig bod zer gyi// 'od kyi dkyil 'kho rnams 'i gnas// gsar dang tsan dan las ni
byung 'od 'phro'i sprin dang mtshungs pa go/ nyi ma dkyil khor gyi nizhing// dri yi gas kyis g.yogs pa dang// gzhan n pad+mo'i gcig gisani// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
05 kyis rgyas// la lar mtshan nyid kha dog snang// zhing rnams rin chen brtsigs pas ni// dbang po ba pAbs red btang ba/ 'od zer drabs 'tsho ba'i// rdo rje pad+mo kha cig ni/
zhing rnams sog 'a gnas pa ste// gzhan ninar bu brnyan mar snang/ ltangashag zhing ni rnam dag pa// me tog 'khyi bar byung ba rnams/ lo shi zhing rnam bsam med pa//
sangs rgyas sprulapas kun tu g.yogs// byang chub sams dpa'i lad dang mnyam// kha cig ma rtag shing rnams kyis// sa 'o ga'i dkyi'i 'khor rnam par bris// bu sprinani
kun tu 'bab// dkyil 'khor zhingag rnam dag pa'o// rdordza pad+mo'i zhing rnams ni// legasala'i pad+mo lhang nga ste/ sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma las// zhing gi dra ba bsam med pa'o//
nor bu'i cod pan brus pa'i rnams// byang chub sems dpas brgyan pa ste// kha cig bstanapar byung ba ni/ rang du btang bas sprul 'od de// sna tshog satsan dan phyi ma rnams//
smin mtshams snga yalhang de 'ad// sangs rgyas thams cad bod zer gyis// zhing gel byung ba zer ba'o// kha cig rgyan gyis snang ba'i rnams// zhingan drimad snang ba ste// kha cagi
rgyan ni thams cad kyis// rnam par bras par brgyan pa le/ kha cig zhing bcu rnams kyi ni// rgyan gyis suni brgyan pa ste// gzhan nang stong phrag du ma'i rnams// rgyan la rab tu
gnas pa go/ zhing gi rgyan ni bya bas su// kha cig zhing ni rnam par bris// sna tshogs rgyan gyi dbyibs pa rnams// bris par snang ba mthong ba 'o// brjod du/
med pa'i zhing rnams na// rgyan nagacig du snang ba ste// gzhan dang gzhan pa'i 'od btang ba// byung de sangs rgyas smon lam gyis// smon lam rgya mtsho mching rnams gyis// kha cig
zhing rnams rnam par sbyangs// de dag thams cad rgyan du ni// zhing gi rgya mtshosnang ba 'o// kun tu bzang po smon lam gyis// zhing gang yongasasu sbyang sapa na// dus gsum nang
rnams de dag ga/ rgyun na thamasacad snang ba'i// rgya'ababa'i bu ga ltos shigal// zhing girigs rnam sprul pa// gang zhing ni ma 'ongs rnams// rmi lam 'dra bar snang ba 'o// ji
snyad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// 'das pa'i zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams// zhing gcig tu ni ltos shig dang/ [0f8b]gnyan ma snang ba shin tu sprul// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
zhing gi rnam sprul ji sAd pa// zhing gi rigs su snang ba ni// thams cad nang du chud par 'dug pa'i// ltasoshig rdul gyi thog ma ru// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam spangs pa// chud par snang/
ba de dag la/[â€ ]/mtshan ma med pa brnyanama' snang// kha cig rgya mtsho mching rnam dbyibs// zhing gi rigs rnam mang po ltos// dbyabs na lhun po ri yi rnams// 'jig rten khams ni
bsamamad pa'o// kha cig nang ni shin tu brgyas// dbang po'i dra ba shin tu gnas// zhing gi dbyibs su shin tu bris// thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ni rgyas na bu' 'khor
gnas pa'i zhing// gzhan ni pad+mon gnas pa ste// chab rgyad du mar bris ba'i rnams// kha dog sna tshogs shin tu dre med pa'i// stan gyi dbyibs su kha cig dang/ glo ba mkhar
gyi bsus// dga' ru'i dbyibs pa khacag na// tshangs pa' lus su shin tu gnas// lha yi dbang po gtsug gi dbyibs// zla ba kham pa la gnas pa'i rnams// nor
slobebs pa na// nyi ma'i dkyila 'khor dun gnas pa'o// dra chu mtshon 'khyol ba rnams// 'jig rten khams shin tu gnas// 'od zer dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbyibs
pA ni sangs rgyas mngon pa la sbyangs// 'khor lo bad bar byed pa'i dbyibs// 'jig rten khamasakyi dkyil 'khor rnams// smin mtshams spyad usIs dbyibs// 'di ni
rab bas kyi tshul rnams so// sangs rgyas phyag gi dbyibs rnams dang// gzhan na rdo rje gnas pa skyo// 'od 'aphro ri ya dbyabs gnas pa// byang chub sems dpas rgyas pa'o//
zhing rnams rnams na sang gi dbyibs// nor bu'i go chag gnas pa yang// du ma'i gzugs kyi dbyibs rnams te// thams cad lus su gnas pa'o// zhing gi rigs ni gcig/
su la zhing gi rigs ni bod mdar// byin gyi rlabs kyi rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas smanar sa khyud pa'o// kha cig zhing ni bskal nga' mnyam// gzhan ni bskal
babcu pa ste// kha cig zhing na rdul dang mtshungs// bskalang bye bas bsgrugs pa'o// kha cig bskal pa gcig pa ni// zhing gi rgyud pa snang ba yang// gzhal du med dad grangs med pa//
rnamakha' ldog pa bsam med pa'o// kha cig zhing rnam sas ngas rgyas med// kha cig zhing du sangs rgyas bcas// sangs rgyas gcig pa'i zhing rnams dang// gzhan ni sangs rgyas mang
la 'o// sar rgyas mi ba tshugs zhing du na// 'jig rten khams ni ga zhan du yang// sangs rgyas sprul pa 'ongs nas su// rnan pas sprul pa ston pa le// 'da' ba'i tsho shi 'phos dpal/
sangs rgyas byang chub rnam par sad// bdudakyi snga ni bsnya' nas su// chos kyi 'khor 'o bso ra/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin ngag/ sna tshogs gzugs su ston ba ste/
'jig rten kun tu thami dad// chos kyi 'khor 'khaskor ba 'o// sangs rgyas zhing de'i na// rgyal ba gcig tu byung nas su// lo ni spyi bstod phrag tu// mchog gi tshesan bshad ba'o//
sdod ma yin gyi sems can la// sangs rgyas lta ni mi ster te// de nyid gcig tu kun tu yang// sangs rgyas bsam pas mthong ba 'o// sangs rgyas zhing ni'i na/ sangs rgyas bye ba
bsam med pa// de ru rgyal ba byung ba stsa/ gang zhing sangs rgyas mang ba na'o// rgyal ba'i 'i de nu ni// sprul mang po mthebazhing ni// chos kyi khamasazhi rgyas nas su// sems can rgya mtsho/
kho dum par mdzad// kha cig ning ni snang medal// mun pa dang ni 'jigs tsha ba// spu gri khadolag sdug bsnga'aTarag/ gtum po mgrong nas 'jig pa'o// kha cig zhing du lha la 'ad//
ga zhun dag tu ni lang pa 'ad// lar ni nyi zla'i 'od// zhing gi dra babasam med pa'o// kha cig zhing du rang gi 'od// shing ba snang bas dri mar da/ gang na sdug bsngalam
mthong ba// sems can rnams kyi bsod nams byung/ de mi snang bar yod pa dang// kha cig zhangan nor bu'i 'od// ma mar snang ba gzhan du ni// sems can rnams kyi las
kyis byung// kha cig zhing du sangs rgyas 'od// byang chusam sadang b rnams kyis rgyas/ rablo' 'od ze bod kyi zhing// 'od khaphra'i snang ba mdzes pa'o// ma rtog snang ba'i
zhir rnams dang// dri chu yisani snang ba'i bus/ dri dang pog gi 'od 'phro snang ba'i// sna tshogs snyan 'am gyis ni sbyangs pa'i// kha cig nang gi sprin gyi red// nor bu ga
chas snang bar byas// sangs rgyas cani rlabs kyis snang ba ni// sgra yid 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan no// nor bu'i rtsod pa ka'idasnang dang// rdo rje gsar gyi bod 'gro'atshan/ yongs su
04@#// dag pa'i sgra skad ni// gang na sdug bsngal med pa na'o// thams cad rgyan gyi snangab dang// kha cig zhed du nor bu'i 'od// byang chub dkyil 'od kha cig tu//
'khor rnams kyis ni snang bar byas// sangs rgyas sprul gyi snang ba dang// sangs rgyas sprin gyisa mngon nga la g.yogs// kun tu bod kyi snang ba ni// chos kyi khams dang mnyam pa 'i
ad la la'i zhing na gtum chen dang// skrag po byed pa'i sgra sgrog pa// rtsub pa zhe gcod skad rnams dang// yid du mi 'ong 'jigs che ba'i// dmyal dang po' song rigs kyi
dang gangashin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal gang// kun tunyon mongs zhing du ni// mya ngan spyos su rgya mtsho tha'// kha cig tu ni mgu byed sgra// yid du bong bas ston ra' byed//
dag pa'i las kyi 'bras bu'i sgra// sgrog pa zhing gi dkyil 'khor du// brgya byin lha yi dbang po'i sgra// tshangs pa'i sgradabyangs gzhan du ste// 'jig rten kun gyi sgyu yang ni// kha cig
zhing duthosar 'o// zhing rnams sgrani sprin gyi ste// rin chen gyis ni 'od 'phro mtsho// nor bu'i shing ni mdzod kyi sgra// sil khrel sgra ni rgyas pa'o// 'od zer 'khyil ba'i sgra ma lus//
sangs rgyas sprul pami zad pa// byang chub sems dapa'i sgra ma lus// bod zer sgra yi dbyangs snyan no// chos kyi 'khor lo rnams kyi sgra// kha cig nang du bsam med de// smon
largya mtshosgram lus// spyod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'o// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mtshan gyi dkyil la ser sgrog pa ste// ring rnams 'byung ba de dag gi/ sgra yi skad
ni zad med pa 'o// sangasas kun gyi stobs sgra dang// sa dang pha rol phyin par song// chos kyi 'ar bzhin sgra ma bus// kha cig zhing du thos nga 'o// kun tu bzang po 'i se nalan gyi//
sgra nams bya ba'i zhing du sta// bskal pa'i byin rlabs kyi zer ba'o// malus skrunubatang pa mi zad pa'o// kha ci zhing gi lam dag nga 'a/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam sprul gyi/
cha 'us sgra ni des shes nga// chos kyi khams ni byas nas su// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs rnam par gzhag pa'i sgrom lus zhes bya ba bskyar ba dgu po rdzogs se
karigasakyi bu rnams 'das pa'i dusan/ sngon yod pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mchog tu phrab 'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa rnams kyi pha rol gyi yang pharel na/ phyogs kun tu
mig dri ma med pa rab tu snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtshomaching rnam gyi dbusan/ dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi g.yams rnams yod pa gyur pa de'i dus de'atshon/ dpal
gyi 'jigarten gyi khams de yang/ nor bu'i pad+mo dra ba'i rgya mtsho ma ching rnam 'bab tu gnas// ri rab kyi mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rtanagyikhamasa rnam ra' dag ba dang/
kun tu snyoms pa ni 'khor rnams te/ kun tu zlum po dang/ mtha' mad nga 'i rgyan gyis rog brgyan dang/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi sdong du 'a 'khor lo'i ra ba sum
bas bskor ba dang/ rin po che thamasacad kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyis kun tu goyogs pa dang/ rnam par dag pa'i 'od dri ma med pa snang ba/ rab lta bu'i grong khyer dang/ khang pa'i rgyan/
ta zas dang/ skom dad/ gos gang longs spyod yid du 'ong ba dang// nga tshogs su bag rab brgyan par gde mang dpa' sgra'i 'jig rtenagyi khams da'i dbusan//

zla rnam par dag pas snang ba zhes bya ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam ste/ nga na ma rtog gi 'od 'phro dang mnyam pa'i rgyanargyal mtshan nas bya ba me tog chen po 'i ni rab mngon pas gang du 'dzags
pa rin po che'i lha lde bcun/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan te/ dre'i thog da na/ nor bu me tog rgyas pa ma 'a ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba stug po 'atsal chen ro ste/ dri'i
kyi rgyalamtshan stong phrag dang ga dumed pa'i rnams bsgrungs pa'i rgyan dang/ dar ga dud pa'i ma rtog gi khang bu brtsegasapa'i 'phrang ba rnams kyis shin tu rnam par rgya la dad/ dpag tu
med pa'i nal bu'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i 'phred ba rnams shin tu rnam pa la bsgrungs pa dang/ dang gtumad pa la donapo che'i sa deng rgyal mtshan rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa dang/
dpag tu na do nga 'i rin po che pun+dari ka'i 'phrang bas bskor ba dang/ dang gtumad pa'i dri thams cad kyi mes bu pad+mo'i dra bas rab tu brgyanang dan/ dang bag tu mad pa'i sil khrol gyi sa'i
spyi'i yid du 'ong ba rnams dang/ dpag tu med/ dri dang/ phog gi 'od 'phro'i sprin rnams kyis snang bar rgyu so/ sems can gonabadun gyi gnas rnams rin po cha'i grong khyer bag
phyi 'bum brgya stong drag bcus bskor ba ni/ bo 'di nor bu'i yal ga'i dkyil 'khor sdug ro 'i tsha da cher de'i shar na 'od 'phro snang ba zhes bya ba grong bye chen po ste/
mi'i rgyal po 'khab rin po ma dag pa'i grong khyer bye ba ther 'bum bcu stong phrag bcus bskor ba ni zhingadang srid dudang gatshad stong phrag bdun// rin ngag ni'i phyir ra ba bdun rnams po/
che sna tshogs kyis tshugs pa'i khung bus bsgrangs ra sa kun tu bskor ba'o// nipo ma'obs bdun dri chus yangs su gang ba/ rin po chu sna tshogs kyi u dra la dad pad+mo dang/
ku mud dad/ martog pan ka nye bar mdzes par byas pa rnams kyis kun tu bcas so// rin po tsha sna tshogs kyi ta'i 'phrangab bdun/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi mdzad ba tu btang bas
bskor ba'o/ rinapo che thams cad kyi lhab lhab pa la khang bu brtsegs kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// stong du gsal gyi dra ba dang/ sdong rgyan gyi dra ba rnam sa dang ma Nig gi dra ba rnams dang/
in+danI'a'i dra ba rnams dang/ rdo rje pad+mo'i dra ba rnams dang/ log na nor bu'i sdong po me tog gi dra ba rnams dang/ sgra ma lus par yid du 'ong ba'i sil khrol

thamasacad kyi dra ba'i sprin gyis kun tu g.yogs pa/ dri sna tshogs kyi 'phrang ba brgyas zhibargyayo/ de'i 'khor ba na sgo mo byi ba ther 'bum brgya stong phrag bcu rnams sa// sga ma de dag thams cad/
kyang rin pa mi thams cad kyi sa bris pa rnams// sgo mo dedag rnams kyi mdunan/ pha bdagi rgyalamtshan badun bdun te/ rgyan thams cad kyis kun tu g.yogs
pas nye bar mdzes pa 'o// tshal gseng bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnams kyis kun tu bskor ba ste/ kun dga' ra ba de dag thams cad rnams kyang/ dri sna tshogs kyi nor bu'i sdong po sa/
kun tu du rab tu btang ba'i rnams dang/ bya thams cad 'dus pa'i skad yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ma lus pa rnams so// yang 'od baphra'i sgram lus pa grong khyer chen po dar/ gang bdag ma
skyes pa'i rnams de dag thams cad las rnam par smin pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul so sor bar d pas/ nam mkha' mnyam pa'i 'gro zhing lha mi mnyam pa'i rgyu ste/ yid kyi yul gyi 'dengs spyod do/
po'i g.yas na sdopo'i ma tog gis rnam par bris pa zhes bya ba lha'i grong khyer ro// de'i g.yasan yongs su thug pa zhes bya ba klu chen po'i grong khyera'i// da'i g.yas na rdo rje'i dpal bas

ba00 pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer 'o// du'i bar mad na shin tugazhalamad khang zhes bya ba dri za'i grong khya'o// 8'i ba med na kha kher 'a dang la zhes bya ba lham yin gyi
grong khyer//da'i ba 'amed na' na po ches bris pa legs pil ba zhes bya ba gsar gyi grong khyer ro// de'i bamadana'ags par rnam par bras pa rgyan ces bya ba tshangs pa'i grong khyer te/ de
'bu 'asogs pa grong khyer bye ba ther 'bum brgya stong phrag bcu rnams kyis bskor ba'o// grong khyer chen po ra'i la'ang rgyan du masta/ grong khyer byeb ther 'bum brgyustong phrag bcu rnams
kyis bskor ba'i bar du'o// yang nor bu rgyas pa yal ga'i dkyil 'khor tshal stug pa chen po de'i dbus naM/ rin po che'i me tog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub kyi dkyil te/ rin po
tshe thams cad kyi stag pa yangs pa'i yal ga'i dkyil 'khor bsgrungs pa// gzugs snatshog sakyi dbyibasas/ nor bu'i me tog gi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa dang/ rin po che thams cad/
kyi kha dog gi mar ma dang/ 'phrengab stug pa yangs pa'i sprin dang/ rin pa cha'i 'od 'phros zhing gi stong ku du g.yogs pani/ rnam par dga' ba'i bod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin snga
ba dang/ phyogs bcur 'od zer yangs pa'i dra ba rnam par 'ar ba dang/ rgyan thams cad kyis rin pa ma sna tshogs kyi mdzod bcags pa dang/ sil khrol thams cad kyi skad rjes su

ga[....]khams pa'ong 'a 'dakyil 'khor zhes bya ba pa d+harman po mngon pa'i gong du byung ba ni//bsgrags pa'i sgra dang/ ra bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i sku byung ba dang/ phyogs bcus rnam pa 'a bris pa'i ma tog gi 'od khyud pa'o// de'i
]]mdun na ma rtog ka sa pa'i 'od 'phro'i dkyil ba/nga dpag tshad bya ba phrag brgya/ drilen bu rdo rje'i rgya mtsho mching rnam par
byung ba dang/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi dpal gyis shin tu rnam par bris pa 'i sdong po dang/ dpag tu mdar 'i rin po ches rnam par bris ra'i 'a mdang/ mtha' med ra'i rin po cha'i 'od
'phra dra'i ke sa ra'i dkyil lam gyi rgyan dang/ kha dag mtha' med pa'i dang la nga droTi nang bu bsgrungs pa// pad+mo'idakyil 'kher brjod du med pa'i bye ba ther 'bum brgya stong phrag
bcu rnams kyis bskor bas/ phyogs bcur yangs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu btang ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba'i skad ka sa de thams cad las sgra ma lus pa'o// yang sgra dang la/
gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rirang banu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung ba'o// de dag las bskal pa dang po de bzhin gshegs pa gang/ ri ba/
bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rnams kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni/
[c/]yon tan thams cad kyi ra lhun po dpal gyi sprin zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ gang gas de phyogs kun tu mig dri ma med nga snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtsho mching rnam yongs
su sbyangs pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i bu rnams sgra dang la gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na le brgyan de bzhin gshegs pa yod par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ de'i bar du nor bu'i sdong po ya 'ga'i
dkyil 'khor sdug pa'i tshal chen po de rgyan thams cad pa'i rgyan gyis rab brgyan pa ni 'di lta ste/ bsam du med pa'i rin po che'i 'od 'phro sprinarang tu btangaba'i snying po gnas pa'i 'agyur te/
sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrum chu sa par rab tu btang ba dang/ sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i gsung gi rgya mtsho mchang rnam gyi sgra ma lus par rang du btang ba dang/ phyogs
bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba rnam par 'tsher ba'i snying pos/ khang pa dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ khang bu brtsags pa thams cad snang bar byas pa dang/ rin po che'i ma rtog gi bod kyi
dkyil 'khor gyi sprin byung ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dag pa'i rgya yangs pa'i sgramalus pa dang/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'kho
la'ob tu btang ba'i sgra ma lus pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lamadang/ spyod pa dang/ 'byung ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgram lus pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad
[n. ]@#// kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gdon mi za ba'i tshig sna tshogs kyis sgrog pa'i sgra ma lus pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i phyi'i/ sngon gyi mtsha nam rnams te/ gang
rgyan de dag rnams 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes/ 'jig rten gyi khams der/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis rig ga/ de dag rnams kyi sngon gyi
mtshan ms grangs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam ra ra yongs su smin pa'i rnams dang/ sangs rgyas blta bas mos pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi dkyil du mngon du byung ba rnams
kyi phyir/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi/ lhun po dpalagyi sprin de bzhin gshegs pa de pad+ma rin po de'i byung ba/ de bzhin nyid dang/ mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi khams/
tshe kyisargyas ra'i sku sta/ sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi zhing skya bar mched pa dad/ byang chub kyi dkyil thams cad du bzhugs M pa'i sku dang/ mtha' dang dbung chad pa'i gzugs kyi sku shin tu
rnam par dag pa dang/ 'jig rtan gyi khams thams cad du shin tu gongadu 'phags nga 'i zil gyis mnan pa dang/ mtshan nyid rin pa chu thams cad rgyas pa dang/ sems kun gyi gnas
thams cad du snying baphyin ng dang/ 'gro ba thams cad lta bar mngon du bya ba dang/ kha dog mtha' med pa 'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rab tu gtong ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad bod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis rgyu ba dang/ kha dog mtha' mad nga 'i lad zer gyi dra ba rab tu gtad 'o// ji bzhin du yang rnam par dag par snang ba'i dri chu'i rgya mtsho mching rnam
la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog gi 'od 'phro'i rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan gsar du 'bar ba'i rgyan bkyi spyi bor nor bu'i me tog tu rgyas pa'i yal ga'i dkyil stug po'i lachan po na/ sangs rgyas kyi
gdan la bzhugs// dbazhin du thams cad dang ldan pa'i sgra dpal gyi 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi ni rab bye ba stong phrag drug cu brgyad kyi rab spyi bo na bzhugs par snang ngo// de bzhin du
kun tu mig dri ma med par snang ba'i 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho mching rnam thams cad na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i mchog tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyamapa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs
'jig rten gyi dbams thams cad kyi rta na gling bzhi thamasacad na/ byang chub kyi dkyilan bzhugs rar yang dag par snang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das yon ngan thams cad kyi ri lhun
pa dpa la gyi sprin da bzhin gshegs pas/ smin/ rnams kyi mdzod su nas/ dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bskyod pa'i sgra zhes bya ba/ 'od bar sangs rgyus kyi zhing bcu'i
mchog tuphral dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer 'khor rnams 'a du btang nas 'jig rtan khams thams car rgyas te/ gdul ba thams cad rnams la skul bar byed do// bcom ldan
'das yon tan thams cad kyi lhunapo dpal gyi sbyin dbazhin gshegs pa des/ 'od zer de rab tu btang ma thag tu/ de nas de nyid kyi skad cig skad cig par sems/
can thams cad rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tsha ba rnams nye bar zhi'o// sgrib pa thams cad kyi dra ba bsal ba/ sangs rgyas blta bar ngaHsgrib pa'i ri rnams gtor to// sems can
thams cad kyi rtog pa rnams rnam par sbyang sas// dag ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i rgya mtsho mching rnam rnams byung ngo// mos pa u0f7adkyil 'khor rgya che ba'i rnams yongs su spungasaso// dngom pa
mdang thams cad dang/ ngan song dad/ 'gro ba ngan pa dang/ g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa rnams dad bral la// lus dang sems 'as byung ba rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi nas/
sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba'i drag shul rnam par 'apal te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nga ra 'byung ba so sor red do// de dag 'od zer de rnams kyis bskul pa dang// mnyam par 'dzeg
rtan gyi dbang po thams cad 'khor brgya stong du ma rnams dad/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der nye bar deng ngo// de la kya rgyal ba'i bu rnams 'od 'phro'i snang ba grong khyer chen po da na/ blta ba'i
dga' ba shin tu yid rna ba'i blo gros zhes bya pa rgyal po yod pa/ grong khyer bye ba ther 'bum brgya stong phrag bcu'i dpon po ste/ bsod nams kyi dpal la sogs pa bud med stong phrag sumacu
0 (rtsa bdun yod pa'o// gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa bu lnga brgya yod pa'o// yang gzi brjid chen po rgyal bu gzhon nu de la/ blta bar mdzes pa la sogs pa bud med stong phragayasu yod
nga 'o da nas gzi brjid chen pa rgyal bu gzhon nus/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa mthong nas/ sngon gyi dag pa'i rtsa ba byung bas tshes bcu rnams skyes so// bcu gang zhe na/
'di lta sa sangs rgyas thams cad ro nAtan gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes s/ yang 'di lta sta/ sgo mo kun sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'og tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i
gzungs skyes so/ yang 'di lta ste/ tshul yangs pa'i sbyin snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyas so// yang 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba'i rgyan chen pa/
zhes bya ba byams pa skyas sa/ yang 'di lta ste// kun tu skad kyisprin rgya che ba zhes bya ba snying rje chen po skyes so// yang 'di lta ste/ mtha' dang dbung med pa'i bsamapa'i yon tan
yang dag par gong du 'phags pa'i drag shul ces bya ba dga' ba chen po skyes pa 'o// yang 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ji bzhin pa bzhin du drag shul zhes bya ba btang snyomasachen po
skyas so// yang 'di lta ste/ 'og gi tshul langs pa rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi snying po zhes bya ba mngon par shes pa chen po byung ngo// yang 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i rgya mtsho mching rnam
stobs kyi drag shul gyis rnam par spel ba zhes bya ba smon lamachan pa'i tshul gyi sgam smyos so// yang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ya shes kyi snang
ba la 'jug pa'i drag shul zhes bya ba so sor yang dag par shes pa'i ye shes chen po'i sgo ma phra mo skyes so// da nas gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba rgyal bu gzhonan chasangan po'o/
snang ba radanas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi bla bu kyi 'khor gyi mdun ma thams cad ji snyed pa 'tshigs su bcad pa 'a de dag smras so/ nyi ma'i sprin stong phrag rnams// nam mkhar shar
ba ji bzhi n pa// sa ngas rgyas kyi ni snang ba ni// byang chub dkyil du dri med pa'o// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag nas/ 'jig rten 'drenang gang du byung// sangs rgyus byung ba
yang dag skyes// kun tu rgyal la snang ba'o// ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer gyis// sangs rgyas sprin rnams bsam mdang// gnas kun tu ni snang ba ni// dbazhin gzigs
pa snyoms zhugs pa'o// 'od 'phro'i sprin ni rab btang bas// 'od zer sprin las zad mod pa'i// snang bar byed pa'i 'jig rten 'dir// ltos shig sangs rgyus rnams la la/ ltas
shig sangs rgyas sku las su// 'od zer dra bas dri da pa// sems can kun dang mnyam sku rnams// rgyas phyogs dang mtshams rnams so// yid du chud pa'i sangs rgyas gsung
'gro ba kun tu gsung ba ni// sems can kun gyi dbyangs kyi yan lag tu// sangs rgyas bsngags par zer ba'o// sangs rgyas 'od kyi sa reg nas su// sems can thams cad bde ba gyur
