zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga 'das mi
can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgyal bo zhes bya bar shesaso// 'jam dpal sasargyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar gyi phyags mas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu
brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'angs pa na/ rin chen sgo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs/
pa 'jig rten slob dpon nas bya bar shes so// 'jam dang la shar gyi dugasuman sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing/
'das pan/ rin po che'i rtsa mo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de nang bsems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa skad rgyal zhes bya bas so// 'jam dpal shar
gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nasasangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dis ba na/ rin chen ma te shin tu rgyas pa zhes
bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ da na nga 'dasems can rnams kyis da bzhin gshegs pa sa dang mnyam ba zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogasachar sangs rgyas kyi
zhing brjod du med pasum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ shin tu mdzes zhes bya ba'i 'a jag rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can
rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gabregasapa zhes bya bar ngashas sa// 'jam dbal shar gyi phug sa char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med ngo sum cu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab
kyi rdul nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na tsan dan gyi sde zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yodod da/ da na nga 'dusems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas snang

nga zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dang 'a shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi nang
'dasapa na/ zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzagaT pa'i sas
rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal de lta bu'i rnam grangs su gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa'i tsha/ nga
nga mya// sems can rnams kyi ming tha dad pa dang shes pa ni brjod du mad pa'i bskal par smras kyang shar gyi phyogs cha'isangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/
de bzhin du phyogs thams cud kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du nga la sems can gyis ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang sangs rgyas
kyi zhing tha dad pa'i mtha' bdu par mi rig go 'jamadang la sems can dag pa'i rtsa ba chung ba rnams kyis nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med ba thosanamyos par 'gyura'i// 'jam dpal
byang chub sems dang 'a gang theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa dang/ theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dag ba'i bshes gnyen rab tu mgu bar byas pa de dag kyang 'jam
dpal nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thos nas the tsom skya bar 'gyur na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dad/ de ma yin pa'i byis paso
sa'i skya bo rnams lta ci smos// 'jam dang la ngas mngon pags pas 'das pa'i dus// bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa
de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ yon tan rab tu bskyodapa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas/
[. ]brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du phyung ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga ni bram tho'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha'
las de'ang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgyad cus yongs su bskor bar gyur to// byang chub sems dang 'a de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg
pa dpag tu med pa'i bar la yang dag par zhugs pa nas/ theg ba brjod du med pa'i bar layang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de'i rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa 'chad de/ nga'ang bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ bcamo/
ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa brtson 'grus mtha' las de la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas ngas de'isangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa rjes nas bdag
gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bas kyang shin tu rgya che ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ bdag gis dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya che na
yangs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bsngos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'a grus mtha' yas des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang/ sangs
[S7sg]@#// rgyas kyi zhing tshad mad pa yongs su dag par lung bstan mod kyi/ 'on kyang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi
zhing dang ga tu mad pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus ma btang bar gyur nas/ de ltar ngas de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams la bstan bkur/
byas te/ de'i dag ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs nga ra sa/
rgyas so/// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// brjod kyis mi lang 'khor ba na// bsam gyis mi khyab 'das/
pa'i dus// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya bkyadaphyin// denang yis brtson 'grus btsums// brtson 'grusamatha'as zhes bya ba// gang zag mtshungs pa med pa byung// sa mas
rgyu can bye ba rnam par 'dul// lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams la ston// sangs rgyas chos la dbang byed cing// stobs rnams kyi yang pha rol phyin// mi 'jigs pa la shin tu gnas//
so so yang dag rig lam bas// gnas dang gnas min dbang 2 nga thob// las dang yingashes rtogs par rig las rnams yang dag 'dzin pa dang// rnam pa ra smin 8 tha tse
mad khams rnams du mar shes pa dang// rnam par 'dren pa shin tu ldan/ sems can rnams kyi dad pa rnams// ma lus yang dag rab tumakhyen// sems can rnams
kyi dbang de yi// rim pa bzhin du yang dag mkhyen// dbang po mchog dang tha ma rnams// ma lus par yang rab tu mkhyen// bsam gtan yishasa rnam thar dang// tingang
'dzin gyi pha rol phyin// snyoms par 'jug dang tshad med la// rkang gnyis dam pa shin tu bslabs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin/ des ni mi mkhyen gang la nga med//
thams cad ma khyen cing byaman chud gzigs// gzigs pa la yang sgrib pa med// de bzhin gshegs pa de la ngas// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya che ba// bsal pachen po bdag
la gsungs// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang// ma lus yang dag rab tumakhyen// gang rnams khyed kyis mi mkhyen pa// de 'dra'i chos ni yang ma mchis// sangs rgyas zhing
gi skyon rnams dang/ yon tan thams cad rab tu mkhyen// sangs rgyas bstan pa rgya che ba// rkang gnyis gtso bos bshad du gsol// sems can rnams kyi smin pa dang// ji
ltar mi rnams 'tshang rgya ba// nyon mongs gang gis nyon mongs pas// mi mkhas 'khor bar rab tu 'khor// mi rnams gang gis nyon mongs pa// nyon mongs de dag khyod kyis
mkhyen// de yi ma dang bsam pa rnams// 'dren pa khyed kyis rnam par mkhyen// ji ltar ting 'dzin 'byung ba dang// byung nasaji ltar gnas pa dang//
ji ltar de las ldang ba rnams// ston pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa/ ji skad ting nge 'dzin rnams dang// zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong rnamA//
rnam pa thams cad shin tu mkhyen// ji ltar chos la 'dogs pa dang// gang gis rkyen gyis bshad pa yang// de yang ston pas bamakhyen te// de la thatsom mi mnga' khyod// khyed
kyi bskal pa byer spyad pas// ye shes 'di las nges par 'byung// ston pas stobs kyi mju yang brnyes// drang srong chen po stobs dang ldan// bskal pa stong phrag bye ba yi// bdag dang
parol rnams kyi yang// stod pa dpag tu ma mchis shing// bsamagyis mi khyab thams cad mkhyen// gang du byang chub ci 'dra ba// skye ba thams cad du yang 'jug/ de dag ma lus 'dun
pa yis// ji lta bu yang rab tu mkhyen// gang du ci 'dus skya ba dang// gang du rigs kyang ci 'dra ba// jiltar kun tu spyod pa rnams// de dag 'dren pas rab tu ma khyen/ tha ma'i tshes
rnams ci 'dra ba// 'dren pas 'khor ba de rnams kyang// 'gro ba gang du skye ba ni// da bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen// mi 'dra ba ya ya shas kyis// sngonand rnam par lung bstan pa
[6 ]ma khas pa khyod kyis de mkhyen pa// de ba the tsom mi mnga' khyod// tshul khrims gang dang tshig gang// mi'adra'i spyod pa spyad pa dang/ yashes gang la zhugs pa dang// de dag 'du/
pas rab tu mkhyen// gang dang gang gi las kyisasu// skye ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur// rnam smin ci 'dra 'thob pa yang// de ni mgon pos rab tu mkhyen// gang du gnas pa de dag
gi rgyud du mchi bar nges pa yang// de yang mi lus khyod kyis mkhyen// de slad yid gnyis mi mnga' khyed// gang gi las kyisab mas gang spyas// yang khyed kyis rnam par
mkhyen// soms de'i rgyu ni gang lags pa// de yang 'dren nga sa kan tu mkhyen// sngon chad gnas pa mkhyen pa ni/ khyod dang 'dra ba yongam mchis// sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnamA
dang / 'dren pa khyed ni de dang 'du// srog chags so so'i dge ba rnams// rjes su dran pas ragatumakhyen// de slad sangs rgyas chos rnams la// 'dren pa 'i ya shes thogs mi mnga'
gang dang gang gi las kyis su// ji lta bu yi rgyud du mchis// de yang thams cad mkhyen pa samakhyen// de slad rgyal las lhagamamachis// 'dren pas chos rnams thams cad la//
khyed na tho tsam yong mi mnga'// sems can kun gyi spyod yul dang// sangs rgyas spyan gyis rab tu gzigs// skye ba dang ni 'chi 'pho mkhyen/ khyod 'dra bde yong mi gda'// lha
[. ]@#// bcas 'jig rten thams cad na// thub pa khyod las lhag mamachis// zag pa zad pa'i ng rab tu mkhyen// ma lus pa yang rtogs par 'gyur// nyon mongs
thams cad yongs su spangs// khyod kyis bag chags kun kyang bcom// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs dang// spyod pa rnams kyang 'dren pas mkhyen// gang la nyon mongs spyod yul dang//
nyon mongs 'di dag gar 'byung mkhyen// nyon mongs dag la spyod byas na// bag chags rjes su 'jug pa rnams// de dag kun kyang khyed mkhyen te/ de las khyod na pha rol phyin//
bdag dad pha rol rnams kyi yang// nyon mongs gang gis sbyong ba la// 'am de rnams kyang 'bu tu mkhyen// de slad khyod na lam la mkhas// 'jig rten kun magon rnam 'dren////
mtha' las brtson 'grus da bsko nas// bskal bya khrag khrig mtha' yas par// 'gro ba gnyis su de skye sas// 'di nas lha ris ngaskya tshe// rtag par lha yi dbang por 'gyur/ bya ba
mtha' yas lha rnams la// rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob par bstan// lha yi gnas nas shi 'phas te// mi yi dbang po rgyal por gyur// sems can khrag khrig mtha' yas pa// rgyal
ba'i ye shes 'thob par bstan// de dag nga yi chos thos nas// bsti stang mtshungs medaskyas nas su// sems ni thams cad nyer bzhag ste// dri med sems kyis de dag nyan// sems can du
ba mtha' yas pa// byang chub mchog la nges par gyur// nga yi tshig thos rtogs pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub nges par gyur/ sangs rgyas bya ba ma 'a yas pa// sangs rgyas nyid gi
rgya bshad kyang// bskal pa khrag khrig mgo 'a yas su// rgya ma bshad pa ma zad de// sangs rgyas yon tan gang brjod dang// drang srong chen pos zhing bsngags pa// thams cad rang bzhin
stong par bshad/ da dag ma skyes mi 'gag bstan// gang 'dir sangs rgyas bsngags pa dang// sangs rgyas yon tan gang bstan dang// bde bar gshegs pa sa zhing brjed pa/
gangagis bshad pa 'dad dang 'dra// chos rnams zhi bar bde bshegs bshad// zhi ba'i rang bzhin dan red// gang la bshad pa de yang stong// 'di la mgon mad 'gro ba
myos/ de nas bram rba'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas kyis// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa brtson 'grus mtha' mas latshigs su bcad
pad dag gis mngon ng la bskyod nas/ bdamed kyi dbang bo las gyur te/ dpyin man budayod kyi lus su mi skye bar gyur to// 'jam dang/la de ltabasan byang chub
sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang bar 'dod cing/ blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod//
byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgrub pa'i stong pa nyid sgrib pa med pa la bslab par bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gyol/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ga yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu
rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rang du 'khrags/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu khur 'ur/ kun tu rang tu'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab
tu chem chem/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lha phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtha/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/
dbus dam 'a na mthub ma/ mtha' dar khan dbus ma dro bar gyur to// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug 'dun pa med par thug pa rnams la sa sems rnam par grol 'a/ dag

slong dad/ dge slong ma dang/ dag bstan dang/ dag bsnyan ma tshad mad pa phrag brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul mad cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ byang chub sa ma sa dpa' bye ba khrug
khrig dang ga tu med pa ni mi skyo pa'i chos la bzod pa thob nga ra gyur to// srog chags stong phrag mang po dpag tu ma da pa rnams dad/ lha dang mi'i bcas pa'i skye dgu sngon ma bskyed pa rnams ni
blon med ra lang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po
de dag dar/ dag slong de dag dad/ myu dad/ mi dad/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg pa chen pa ba mad rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhanapa dzan mi tra dang/ u ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu man gyi 'atsa
ba ban+d+hA yo shas skas zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas/ slad kyis gtan la phab pa////rgya gar skad du Ar+ya
g+ha na byu hanA mam hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyan stug po bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo/skabam pa dang po// bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das tshe thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba/ 'dod pa dang/
gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa dang/ 'dushes med pa'i sems can rnams las 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sdug pa na/ stobs rnams dong/ mnga' rnams dang//
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing rjes su spyod pa// byang chub sems dad 'a sems dang ba chen po rnal 'byor dam pa'i rnal 'byor can 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mur 'dug byed pa thams cad kyi gzhung rnam par 'joms pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po blo gros chen po dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dang 'tshan pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang/ byang chub sa mas dang 'a sems dang 'chen po spyan ras
gzigag kyi dbang po dang/ byang chub sems dang 'bams dang 'tshanapo mthu chen bar s pa dang/ byang chung sems dba'asams dang 'a can pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a so mas dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snyed pa dang/ byang chub sams dang 'a sems dang 2
chen po rnamapar grol ba'i zla ba dad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin dang/ de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu snga ba bye ma snyad kyi
byang chub sems dpa' sems dbabachen po khams gsum pa'i yul las yongs su 'das pa/ sems dang/ yid dang/ rnam par shes pa dad kun gzhi'i spyod yul las
yongs su 'das pa/ ye shes dang yid kyi lus yongs su gnas par gyur la// sgyu ma lta bu dang/ dpa' bar 'gro ba dang/ chos kyi sprin gyi sa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/
sangs rgyas du ma'i phyag gis dbang bskur bas dadang bskur ba/ khams gsum pa'i yul las shin tu 'das pa'i gzhal mad khang gi pad+mo tsha po lta 'khod pa rnams dang thabs cig tu
bzhugs te/ de nam 'dug dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu ba mad de// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcamang
yang dag par rdzogs pa de sangs rgyas mthong ba'i chos la bde bar spyod pa/ bdag gis so so rang gi'aphags pa'i yang shas kyis mkhyen pa'i spyod yul btsun par dbyangs 'byin ng//
sna tshogs kyi ba zugs du ma ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs ti bzhungs nas kyang/ pho brang 'ja' dang glog gi 'od can rgyan dang/ lhab lhub du mas brgyan pa nas mngon par byung
ste zla ba dri ma med pa'isAng po zhes bya ba'i khang stangs su gshegs so// gshags nas kyang stug po'i 'i brgyan/ sang ga gdan dam pa la byang chub sems dang 'a dang thabs cig
tu bzhugs so// bzhugs nas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs ba'i gzigs te/ gtsug gi'in chen 'od kyi rgyanacas bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs tshan pa bad zer stong phrag
brgya'i 'khor can smin mtshams nas phyung sta/ 'dabar gyi tshogs de byung bas/ sangasargyus kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gcig dang 'dra bar
yongs su snang bar gyur to// mchog tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rang bzhin phra banyid kyang yongs su snang ngo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyug po 'ad sangs
rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi rang bzhin rdu pa gyi phra ba nyid las 'das te gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po ni 'od dang/ gza' dang/ zla ba spangs pa ste/ 'dus ma byas kyi rang
ba zhin nyid kyis shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du mi snang gi/ gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ nam mkha' dang/ ma brtags par 'grog pa/ lta bu s byang chub sems dad/2
sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ gangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na spyod pa byang chub sems dad 'a sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gzigs
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub dang mthu byung ba de dag gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcu
byang chubs mas dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam por dgod pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa la bka' stsal
ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ stug po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni/ 'dod pa dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs mad pa dang/
'dushes med pa'i sems can du gtogs pa'i gzugs srad pa dang/ ma rig pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu yashes kyi mas rnam pas bsags te gnas gyur pa'i phyir/ ya
shas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ yid bzhin gyi ting du 'dzin dang/ yid bzhin gyi lus stobs dang/ mngon nga ra shes pa dad rdzu'aphrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang pos brgyan pa//
gsang med pa/ ring du gnasar/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ nor bu dang/ glog dang/ 'ja' dang/ byu rudang/ ba bla dang ldeng res dang/ mtshal dang/ 'og ma se 'i 'bu
dad king shu ka dang/ in+d+ra go pa dang/ gsar dad/ tsam ma ka dang/ pad+ma dang/ dung dang/ rma bya'i mgu' dang/ mdongs bu ma long gi nang na 'dug pa'i gzugs brnyan lta
bu thob rnam/ sa nang sar zag pa med pas sbyangs pa shi rgya ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir smon lam gyi mthar phyin pa bcu'i sngo bas 'dus thob pa'i khyad par can dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing
phyug por 'ong ngo// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a sams dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa stan las langs
[r/ ]@#// te[0f10 ]bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas// bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'bogs su thal mo spyar bas
phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la/dadag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gang ga
tshu cig zhu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du/ skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o// btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang/ ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa
de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas/ sems mgu bar bya'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smyos shig/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi ches thams cad rnam par dgod pa ji lta ba
bzhin du ston pa'i byang chub sems dang 'asams dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phyi ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasasangs
rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa dang/ 'dushes med pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
dag kyang de yin namu / rtse 'gas/ rigs kyi busangs rgyas kyi zhing phyug po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa dang/ 'du shes med pa'i sems/
na las 'das te gnas pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang yodad// rigs kyi bu 'di nas pha rol shin tu'ang pha rol sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das/
pa'i stong gi phyag sa man/ tshangasku nga 'i dbyangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag nga 'a rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang/ de bzhin du sA la'i dang nga po'i rgyal pa'i rgyal
po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ skar ma'i rgyal po da bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dud/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das dgra bcom pa yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi phare'o shin tu'ang pha rol tu 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong drug brgya mang po byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi tshogs
gyis brgyan pa/ shin tu yang sashang tshe nga dag yod de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag khyod 'khor gyi tshogs de dang de dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams la bdag
gi so so'ang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi rtogs pa'i spyod pa gyi gtam dad/ mthong da'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i chos tshig dang/ rnam da ba rtog pa'i spyod yul dang/ yi ga dang la
byag ba da ba zhin nyid dad/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dad/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa/ phyin ma'i mtha'i mur gtugs pa ston/ de na rnam par bkod pa yang dag/
pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston te/ de ni gang rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston bu khyod kyis 'di'i pha rolan/ 'jig rten gzhan dang ngas rgya sa dag la da dam zhes smras pa da'i lam
du ngas 'di smras so// rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyun dang/ byang chub samasurang 'a la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir/
de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dri gar sams par ma phrad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dar 'chen po shugs 'dzin 'di'ang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
zhing gi rgyan dad sangs rgyas kyi sgra'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ spyi gtsug tshad ma dar la ltad mo blta ba'adod pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya ba stong phrag brgyar song ba nas/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+ga'i gum sad du rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog gis rgyan du song yang/ byang chub sams dpa' sams nang la chen po shugs 'dzin 'di de bzhin gshags pa gcig tsam gyi sangs
rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan nam/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ram/ spyi gtsug bltar tshad med pa'i ng ma mthong ste/ desam mthong ba dang/ der nor du gyur nas//
00 sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ spyi gtsug bltabatsad med nga/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par rjes su dran zhing/ mi mdzad kyi 'jig rtan gyi khams 'ad
nyid du phyin nas mnyan du yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/ nyes pa la nyes par bshags nas/ sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam par shas
te mngon par bstod na// bdag gisaso sorar ga 'phags pa'i bar shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul la mngon par mos shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po nyid du songs gnas
par gyur te// de nas byed chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chalo rje nyid ro ga dang sa'i mtshan nyid mkhasapa phra ba dang/ dmigs su phebs pa dang/ rnamapa
gdon mi za ba'i gtam zlos pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bam ldan 'das gang na bde
logs su thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig cig bcom ldan 'dasakyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan nga 'i slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rje'i snying po khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang/ ngas ci dang ci 'dod bu de
dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas/ sems mgu bar byas/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smos shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phyi nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba dang/
'tshang rgyu bar bgyi ba zhes nga 'i don ci zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das danadam pa 'phags pa'i ba la chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs ston pa 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byang
ba'i spyod pa'i sa la spyod pa dang/ gzugs dang/ mtshan nyid dad/ yang dag par bsdu ba'i lta ba'i ltung ba rnams dod/ chur 'jug gzhan gyi smra ba la mngon par chags pa 'i blo'o
spyod yul la spyod pa rnams dang/ rdul dang gcas pa dang/ dbang bo dang/ phyogs dang/ dus dang/ nam mkha' dad/ bdag dang/ yide dang/ dbang po dang/ den
bar 'du ba lta bar lhung ba rnams kyi blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ marig pa dang/ srid pa dang/ las dang/ mi ga dang//
gzugs dang/ snang ba dang/ de las skye ba'i yid la byed pa dang/ gsum 'du ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa can dang/ rgyu dang/ de ma dag pa dang/ dbang dang/ dmigs pa'i rten las
byung ba'i rnam pa gnyis pa la chags par spyod pa dang/ yod pa dang/ mad par smra ba'i rtog pa can dang/ chos 'di pa'i phung po dang gang zag stong pa nyid du lta bar snang ba rnams kyi'ang blo rnam/
par bzlog pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol// chos kyi dbang pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan nu lags 2/ rnam shes lnga yi rgyu la sogs//
mnga' bdag dam pa ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas bya dang shes bya dang/ ji ltar gdong gi 'tshang rgya zhing// shes bya rnam pa lnga pa rnams// thugs suchud pa sangasargyus te// chaso/
rnams thams cad mkhyen pas na// mya ngan 'da' dang mnyam gshegs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// dga'o dge'o rdo rje'i snying po sa bcu la dbang ba/ rnam par rtog
ba'i spyod yul las 'das pa// mkhas pa chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi rigs grags par byed ng/ dge'o rnal 'byor dam pa 'dabang ba sangs rgyas dang/ 'tshang rgya bar yongs su
dri ba 'di lan khyod 'ba' zhig ltad mo byung ba ma yin gyi/ sgyu ma byed pa bzang nga phyogs dang/ rgyal ba'i bu gzhan dag kyang don 'di la ltad mo 'byung zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi dngos po 'dri ste/
0 @#// de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don 'di ci zhig/ mi gzugs dbazhin gshegs pa 'am/ 'on tu gzugs las gzhan zhig de bzhin gshags pa 'am
[Ã ]de bzhin du phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched kyi 'du byed las kyang ste/ nang dang phyi'i mnyam pa nyid kyang mi mthong zhing/ byas pa'i rgyu dang/ 'jig pa'i chos can gyi phyir phud
( po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa med de/ rdul phra mo med pa thugs su chud pa'i phyi/ shes rab dang/ ye shes dang/ teng nga'adzin gyi spyod yu'ati/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i shugs
kyis/ yang dag par rjes su ma gzigs shing/ phung bo rnams ma skyes pa'i phyi/ de bzhin gshags pa ni chos kyi sku lan pas na rtag pa nyid do snyam me// kyi rgyal ba'i bu chos/
kyi shin tu dbyings phya ba lamakhas pa dga'i// kyi rgyal ba'i bu de bas na dag bar shin tu nyen rta yid la gyis shigadad/ ngas khyed la bshad de// bcom ldan 'das dga'o nas nas//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan ba rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka'/ lang/ rigs kyi bu rdo rje lta bu'i snying bu ting nga
'dzin la dbang ba/ rdo rje'i snying po phung po rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/ dung nga las gzhan na'ang mad da/ phung po la gnas ba'ang ma yin/ phung po'ang gnas ma yin//
00 skye ba dang/ 'jig pa'i ng gnas pa ma yin shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/ shes pa'i ng ma yin/ don kyang ma len/ dbang po rnams kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po
dang khams dang/ skye mched dang/ yul rnams ni mno bsam med pa'i phyin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di rnams las nang ngam phyir yang ma blta'o// gzugs nibaskyod
pamad rung sems mad pa ste/ 'byung bamed pa'i chos can mthun 'jig pa snudang/ shing dang/ bong rdo dad 'dra ba/ shan tu phra ba'i rdul gyi tshogs dbu ba dang 'dra ba'o// tshor ba ni gnyis
tshogs pa las chu'i chu bur dang 'dra bar skya'o// 'du shes na bum pa da/ snam bu dang/ rtsod nga na lasogs pa'i rgyu la sa byung ba ste/ de'ang gnyis las skyes pa smig rgyu dang 'dra ba ste/
dpa' zhu dpyid kyis mngon par gdungs pa'i sa la nyi ma'i 'od zer nga ba pa gyen du la ngas pa rnams chu'i rlabs lta bur rab cing/ ri dgas dang bya skom gyis nyon cing/ chu tshor ba rnams
chu'i rmongs par bya bas rmongs par byed de// de bzhin du 'du shes kyang de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i gzugs su 'jug pa/ yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa las/
skyes pa/ dpyod pa pa rnams kyis brjod pa las legs shin tu mi dmigs ba/ bong bu'i rwa dang/ mo gsham gyi bu brjod pa ltar ming tsam du zad nga/ rmi lam gyi gabrugA
@#// brjed ba ltar blta'o// dpang rmi lam na gzugs kyi 'du shes mthong ba brad pa'i tshe/ gzugs la sogs pa dang/ bud med bzang mo'ang dmigs su/
mad do// de bzhin du mi shes pas log pa na bud med dang skyos pa la sogs pa mthong ba'ang mngon par sadas rgyas na ma dmigs so// 'du byed rnams ni chu shing gi snying po lta
sbyabu ste/ btsal na lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid las byung ba gzugs med pa rnams rnala'abyor can gyi spyod pa pa rnams kyis mi red do// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu malta bu de'i bdag
nyid med pa sta/ sgyur byed pa 'am de'i slob mas nan tan du rtswa dang/ shing dang/ bong rdo tsam la brten te gzugs kyi yan lag du ma las mngon rar bsgrubs pa'i sgyu ma'i gzugs
! glang po che dang/ rta dod/ shing rta dang/ mi dang/ rgyanam brtags pa'i gzugs kyi phyogs gcig n ngo mtshar du bstan pa lta bu dang/ gzhan yang mkhas pa rnams ma yin gyi/
byis ba'i 'gro ba rnams la'adridab de bzhinan/ rnam par shes pa'i ng rnam pa gzhan du 'dug la// rnam pa gzhan du shin tu brtags shing shin ta rtag skye/ de'ang bdag nyid
kyis bdag la 'dzin pa gnyis su shes nas/ sgyu mas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs gcig po'i ngomatshar dang 'dra bar phyi'i ldeg go/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa/ brtan pa/
[s, ]thar thug ma 'jig rab sta/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi yul yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bsgrags pa// mya ngan las
'das pa'i dbyis dad/ nam mkha' lta bur mi 'jig pa sta/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrachos kyi dbyingasakyi tshogs gis 'das pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ 'byung ba'i sangs rgyus
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnamag byung yang rung/ ma byung yang rung/ chos rnam kyi chos nyid/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyingu
dung/ chos skyon med pa nyid de 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'o// rdo rje'i snying po skyon med pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang 'byung ba'i nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i// rdo rje'i snying po skyon
med pan nyes pa thams cad dang bral bar ma brad kyi/ ting nge 'dzin la'ang 'jug go/ skyon med par 'da' ba ni/ byang chung sem/dbas sbyang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de nyid du mos te/ sems can la lta ba med par gyur cing/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas/ lcags bsregs pa'i dang 'dra bar mya ngan las
khada' bar gyur te/ de sems can gyi dgos pa la brtson 'grus btang zhing/ snying rje chen po dang/ pha'o tu phyin pa rnams dang bral bas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdungo rnam pa'i chad par
byed cing/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyus mur 'dug byed pa'i lam du 'gro// ting de 'dzin gyi 'dam bu glang po chen po 'dra bar rnam par thogs te//
rnam bshes pa'i yul rab tu zhum pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi skye mched thams cad kyis kun nas mi gnas shing/ rdzogs par mi byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon du mi bya shing/
ma rig pa dang/ nya par mi bsgrub par gnas par bya'o// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi ches kyi sku'i rjesasu zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid shesapas/ chas kyi 'khor lo bskol
ba'i sangs rgyas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi yul la nye bar spyod pa// sprul ba'i yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba'i sbyor bag sa brgyad nga las
'das pa// chos kyi sprin gyi sa' shis par rab tu byas pa/ sangos rgyas kyi che ba nyid myong nas/ de bzhin gshags pa'i bdag gi so sad zhig ra// 'phags pa'i
yang shas kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi sar zhugs te thams cad du 'gro ba/ ma g.yos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa lhun gyis grub pa/ rtag pa/ ther zug pa/ brtan pa/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing phyug po na gnas par 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang bo sa la dbang ba rnams la 'phrul pa'i 'jug pa ston pa'i 'gyur te gnas gyur pa/ mar pa zhin gyi phashes dang/ ting nge
0 'dzin can stobs dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang la spyod pa ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra bar ma zhugs pa'i chu'i zla ba lta bur 'gro ste/ blta ba'i
don yod pa ma'i bdag po thams cad kyi tshogs kyi 'khor du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bur 'dod ba'i gabrugs dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po bstan pa'i phyir/
sems can gyi bsam ba bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po thams cad dang/ dbang sgyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' semaMs dpa' chen po'i nor bu rin
ba ba sId go la so kha sa pa 'i gnas dag tu ba da ba rnams myong bar byas te/ sa'i rim pa rnams bstan nas/ zhing nas zhing du phun sum bde ba rnams rab tu ston cing/ phyi ma'i
mthar thug par sku grub pa'i sngags 'chad ltar mi snang zhing/ khang khyimargya lha ltar de na gnas bzhin du mi snang ba'i gzugs su khyim na 'dug pa lta// de dag sprul pa 'i 'od ze
dang/ 'phrul pa sa sprul pa la spyod cing 'gro'o// song nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku nub stsa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhan nas gnas par 'gyur ro
de nas bcomoldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungasaso// dbang de phung po sprul yin te// srod dang ma rig las kyang min// bag chags kyis bcings/
mi bzad pa// yul dang dbang po'i rgyu las byung// rnam dpyod tshog/sa ni 'dod chags rnams// zhags pa sams skyong da yin na// khro ba ma lci mnyam
pa sta na sdang dug gi rangs po yin// thub spyod rnal 'byor ba brang can gyi// 'di dag rtag tu rnam gzhigs te/ phung po rnams ni dor ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor can gyis rnal
'byor spyod// gzugs ni 'byung ba'i tshogs yin te/ phung po'i lhag ma gzugs med nga// ji bzhin bar snang gi mi dang// grib ma sdong dum 'ad sogasar da// mkha' la
rlung gzugs mi snang dang/ bya yi rjes rnams ji bzhin ni// mkhas pas sa sa rdzong 'gopa// yang dag nyid dang yang dag mtha'// tshig gi spyod yul 'das nga ni// sangs
u0f09 rgyas dngos po ma snang ste// sangs rgyas sgrus ni mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas te// rnam rtog rtog dang bral bas na// de ni bstan du mi nus pa 'i// rgyu dang 'bras
du ma da pas/ yod dang med kyis rnam par sna ngas// rdzob phyi mar brtags ba la// gsaragi yod par mi snang ste// sbyangs pa'i las kyi khyad par gyis// gsan na snang bar 'gyur
ba yin// gzugs rnams rdul du rnam gzhigs te// mkhas pas phung po lhag ma dang/ khams dang skya mchod tshogs rnams dang/ rnam par shas dang dbang po dag/ gcig
dang tha dad dngos por yang// rdul phran rnam par rab sbyangs na// dngos der sangs rgyas yod pa min// sangs rgyas med pa'i ng ma yin te// rnala'abyor mna rnams sangs rgyas/
mthong// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// gangan sdug bsngald na bde// de nyid la ni snang ba yin// sangs rgyas ma da ces mi bya ste// sangs rgyas mnyam par gzhag pa
yod rgyu yi sangs rgyas dge ba can// rtsa ba mkhas pa nyid kyang ste/ 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal ba dang// yang dag rdzogasapa'i sangs rgyas dang// 'di dag sangs rgyas
ltar gsungs// sprul pa'i rgyal ba lhag ma rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa 'i snying po yid/ mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// de bas sangs rgyas yod pas/
rnal 'byor can gyis thub pa mthong// khams rnams gsum po 'dus pa dang// rnam pa dumar sangs rgyas zhing// de bzhin gshags kyi lha rdzas zhing// rgyalasras bzang
bos kun tu gang// den thub chanas das rgyas bzhugs// mtshan gyis kun nas yongs su rgyas// rnal 'byor rnal la mnyam par gzhag/ chos dang bcas su rnam par mdzes//
de bzhin phan tshun bsam gtan mdzad// shes rab maNashas shes byed la// stug po de na rnam par spyod// stag pa de yi sems can su// sangs rgyas gzugs can de dag
kun[;]skad cig 'jig pa shin tu 'das/ ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mos// dga' ldan s babs 'phrul pa gang// rtog pa can rnams kun gyis
mtheng// stug po nas gshegs glang po ste// sangs rgyas gzugs ni sug na bzhugs// snatshogs rnamamang gzugs tshul te// sems can bsam bzhin zhugs pa'i sa//
wA de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam gzhag pa// chu yi bla ba bzhin du snang// sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu ni/ tshon gyi 'byor las rnam par mdzes// de bzhin sangs rgyas stug zhing na/
mnyam par bzhag nas rnam pas mdzes// thams cad chos la gzugs brnyan ltar// gcig dang tha dadasngangs rang ste// dgos par kun la 'jug pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa thams
chad mkhyen// rdul las ma yin dus las min// dbang po las min gces 'a sa man/ rkyen gyis ma yin 'jig rtan dang// sangs rgyas ldan pa ra rnam mdzes pa// rgyu yi tshul
dus ngasargyas ni// 'bras bu rnams la rnam par mdzes/ 'jig rten sku la 'khod bya ste// rgya mtsho ri dang shing dag dang// de la 'gro ba sna tshogs bcas// mnyam par bzhag
pas shin tu rabyas// bya ba thams cad nang du// gza' zla la sogs mdzes pa'i rnams// phyir yang phyag gis mthil bkod de/ yungs 'bur 'gro ba kun 'dzud pa// sa
0 rgyas thub pa'i rnal 'byor mnga'// thub chen thub pa'i dam pa'o// 'jig rten rnams la byed pa med// sangs rgyas 'phrul gyis sprul pa ste// 'byung ba gsum po 'di dag kun//
sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par sprul// rab rib mingags myobs ma dengs pa'i/ rtog pa can rnams 'phyan pa yin// bdag dang bdag med lta ba'i rnams// yod dang med pa 'i
bas bcom// 'on tan thams cad 'jig pa dang/ cung zad 'jig pas smra ba rnams// 'di la mad dmacur zar ram/ bdag dang bdag med ga la yod/ sangs rgyas/
tshogs 'byung kun na// rnam 'byor mkhan po rnam par mdzes// dri za'i grong 'du bya ba rnams// ji ltar snyang ba 'jig rten na// rmi 'bam rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// ri dgas
rnams la smig rgyu bzhin// de bzhin 'jig rtan sna tshogs dag/ gdug la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang// rlung ldan sogasapa'i thag pa bzhin// sangs rgyus rnal
'byor mkhyen nga 'i mchog/ mi 'du 'khrul da'akher bskor ba ste// rgya mtsho skya ba'adzani dang 'dra// phyug po'i ris kyi shesakyi rgyan las byung zhes bya ba'i 'a 'u ste dang po'o/
skad nas 'jam dpalo gzhan nus gyur nga stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa ga chag la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i gangs rgyas gang na ba de 'khogs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams med palta bgyid pa rnams dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang/ 'a ga pa spong ba rnam dang/ mar med pa la
ga zhol ba rnamA dad dam dad pa la snying ring ba rnams dang tshangs pa 'khums pa rnams dad/ ba lang 'gums pa 'gums pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/ bcom
ldan 'das sems can de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal sbyin pa gnyis can pa'i
mas can rnams la kho rang sdug bsngal las yig su 'grel bar 'gyur te/ de 'di ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang/ zang zing gi sbyin pa'o// chos kyi sbyin pas skye ba dran par 'gyur
kyi ri zang zing gi sbyin pas ni sems can thams cad la phan btags par 'gyur// zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal yongs su sbyong nga// chos kyi
sbyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang/ byal song gi skya gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'dzeg rten gyi 'khyer de'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grolato/ 'jam dang 'a sbyin ng gnyis
ga 'di byin na/ sbyin pa thams cad 'dus bar 'gyur ro// 'jam 'apal gzhan yang sbyin pa lngas sbyin ng dang/ nyapa'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur te/ lta gangazhi na/
'di lta ste/ bzhon pa sbyin pa dang/ gdugs sprin pa dang/ dar sbyin dang/ gos sbyin pa dang/ chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal cha dang/ stan dad/ nad kyi rkyen
sman dang/ yo byad sbyin pa rnams kyis/ sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur// 'jam dpa' la/da sems can 'al mtshams med pa lnga byadapa dag gam/ dam
pa'i chos skyong ba dgagam/ 'phags pa spong ba dag gam/ mnar med pa dag la gzhol ba dag gam/ bka la pa ra gnas pa dag gam/ sems can gang la lar dkon mchog
gsum la snying ring ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dad/ dge 'dun la gnod par byed pa 'am/ tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag gam/ chung ngun lug gsod pa dag kyang rung//
phyag da' ba'ang rung/ sma can yang rung ste/ 'jam dang 'a sus shin tu rgyas pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos stug po'i rgyan rin chen 'di thos pa dang/ 'dri ba dang/ 'dri'i 'jug pa
dang 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang/ chung ngu na yi ge gcig kyang rung ste/ brjod pa dang/ su'ang chos de
[s g]bya// 'a mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang/ nang pa ra langs nas ngo phrad par byed cing blta ba dang/ sngar smra ba sbyin pa ra byed pa dang/ lag pas 'ag nga ra byed pa'i sams
can de dag thams cad 'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba dang/ byel song gi spyi gnas dang/ gshan rdza'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur
'jam dpa 'dra su'i phyogs gang na chos smra ba de 'dug gam/ de'i dur ram/ ro 'am/ re bamang zhig yod la/ de'i nga mthong na'ang mtshams mang pa'i las lnga rnams
byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dzamadang la rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yi dgas la dang ga tshad brgya stong du mar rgyas pa yod de/ yi dgas deng dag gi las kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i tshor ba yod
do/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can su mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di slong ba de dag kyang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpalasu'ang mdo sde rin po che 'di ma grwa byas te/
ma tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ mar ma dang/ spros dang/ 'phrangab dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ chos gos dang/ gdugs dad/ rgyal mtshan dad/ lha'i ba dan gyis mchod
pa dang/ chos smra ba de'ang mchod par bya ste/ ci ste chos smra ba de mtshams med pa lnga byed na'ang/ 'on kyang de'i sams 'khrugs par mi bya'o// chung du na bul sang gi skye gnas su
gtogs pa'i dgas dang/ bya gang ba las ches smra ba de shi ba'i ro bam pa dur khrod na 'dug pa bi sha rjes kyang/ de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chug kyang 'thob par 'gyur// ri dgas dang bya gzhan po de dag thams cad phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du 'thob par 'gyur te/ de la nam
nur dang/ the tsom dang/ yid gnyis mi bya'o// saMms can gang la 'a sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sngon byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba/ sngon gyi byang chub sems
dpa'i sa bon las ma nyam pa de dag thams cad du mi tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ mdo sde chan pa rin po che 'di thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang mchodar chen de semachod par 'gyur ro//
mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan stug po rin po che las sbyin pa'i le'u sta gnyis pa'o/// mtha' yas yul can shin tu phra// bsam gtanamakhyen pa/
skyes bu'i mchog/ dbang po 'das pa mngon sum pa// chags dang dbang po rnam par spras// bsam gtanabasam pa bsam gtan pa'i// de ni dgos pa'i tshul yin te// thub
pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams// kun gyi snying la gnas pa yin// yod dam med kyi phyogs dang bral// sangs rgyas phyogs ni dri ma med// blo dang shes bya khral ba ste// tshod
dang dbang de sbyangs pa yin// sems shes rnams kyi yul ma yin/ de ni grol ba rnams kyi yul// mtshan rnam pa kun kyang snang ba ste// dbazhin gshegasani
mtshan med pa// drags can rnams kyi dregs chod mdzad// mnyam par gzhag cing gos pa med// g.yo ba ma yin g.yo mad min// chags med lam la gnas pa ste// lha
yul byung ba'i lha rnams dang// driza lha min mi 'am ni// thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis// bstod kyang rtag tu yong mi g.yo// de la ngomatshar srid pa med/ 'gro ba
gang na'ong g.yo ba med// sngon las dag pa'i rnal 'byor gyi// de ni pha rol yin pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas 'phrul pa'i spyod pa yis// bya ba tsam gyi lha rnams kyis// mthong
yang de dang 'di na mad// ji bzhin nyi zla de dang 'dra// rnal 'byor yul du gnas pa ni// drags pa mad mdzad 'gro bas mthong// rnam pa tha dad mur 'dug rnams// gang la gang
gis dbang 'gyur ba// de la de lta'i chos ston to// rnal 'byor bskyod pa'i 'od zer gyis/ rnal 'byor tshes can rnams bya zhing// rgyal ba'i tshul dang gsum pa dag/ rgyal po'ag
rgyal po'i 'khor rnams dang// rgyal po'i yul gyi bya ba dang// dka' thub tshal dang zhing rnams kyi// phun sum tshogs pa de las byung// lha rdzas rnams dang nam ma kha' dang//
rin chen 'byung khung rnam dag pa// lha yi lha yi mthu yis na// phyogs dang yul na 'bab pa yin// 'byung ba gsum gyi thabs rnams gang// rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas
rnams kyisaM// gang rnams byed gzhug bya ba dag/ sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub 'bras bu// de ni ma do 'dzin 'gro ba yi// dgos dang dka' thub can rig dang// gad mo rtsa ba'i
sbyor ba dang// gar mkhan rnams la rtag tu'o// dga' ldan gnos babs 'jig rten gyis// mthong ba bud med 'gro dang bcas// 'phrog cing sbyin dang 'brel ba dang/ rtsed
nga na can dang 'dag na gzhul// dam pa rnams kyis kun tu mthong// skyug po nas ni da ma sprul// yul 'di thub pa de yis te// thams cad na yang shin tu snang/ 'ab
rib can gyi rab rib bzhin// ri dgas rnams kyi smig rgyu 'dra/ 'jig rten rnams kyi sgyu ma la/ ji ltar gzhan du mthong ba dang// rmi lam na yang gzhan du ba'i/
rmi lam bzhin du byas pas mthong/ khyad par rang du mthong ba na// rnal 'byor can rnams M lag 'a nga bzhin// lha yi lha yi yul yin te// de yi sras kyi dus kun tu//
mi sbyin du 'ad tshangs pa dang// sa nan tand sanan 'da'// sa nana gzhon nu ser skya dang// natso laso gas rnams bsams kyang// de la yul la rnam par bslad// de dag rnal
'byor gyis ma mthong// thug pa gang dag 'byung ba dang// khyung dang da lta gang 'khed pa// de dag yul na gang yang min// lta ba'i bag chags g.yogs pa'i
gyin a dan sa' ni rnam spyod pa'i// rdo rje'i snying po de la bstan// lha yi lhas ni byas pa yi// sdug pa'i zhing na yod pa las// 'di dag rdo rje'i snying pa de// mnyam par bzhag
la shin tu bstan// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor lul// ji ltar gang gis sbyor pa dag/ dbyibs dang mdag dang khyad par dag/ bzo bor gyur pas byas pas na/ gces dang rdul
phran dag gi ste// brtags pa'i dngos po yodang min// skye ba dag ni chos tsam ste// ldog par 'gyur ba chos tsam mo// kun tu phra ba'i khadag nyid kyi// yon tan dag tu dngos yod brtags/
mar mkhazhin du gsal byed pa// rgyu rnams dgos pa sgrub pa dag/ mtshan nyid snga nas mi rnyed de// 'jig dang bral bas mi gnas pa'o// 'das pa 'das pa'i dngos por lang/ yod pa
ma yi 'byung ba mad// rkyen du bya rnams mad par yang// brtag pa'i dngos po gang yang med// rgyan rnams 'jus ta byas pa la// dngos po yod pa ma yin te// rkyen rnams gang gi rgyun
du 'gyur/ yod dang med pa'i dngos mi snang/ med pa'i ng snang ba yod ma yin// phra ba'i bdag gis rnam par brtags// phung po rdza ma ras lasogs// ri dgas skom gdungasasmigargyu bzhi/
0 rmi lamadri za 'dra ba ste// gtsug lag nor ba dug ded bcas/ rab tu smra ba sum brgya yis// 'jug pa dag dang phyir ldog dag/ mya ngan 'da' ba gang yang med/
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam pa la bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston ng/ sa'i dbang po lag pa'i 'phrang ba tshad med pa/ lus drang med pa// dpung rgyan dang/ rtsod pan
dang Dagatsug gi rin pa che dang/ sa mo des shin tu chas pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gabral nas/ pus mo g.ya sa nga 'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ theg pa gsum
dang 'jig rtan dang mi 'ga' sha/ lta ba'i chos la bdag gis so rang gi 'phags pa'i yaM shas kyis rig pa'i spyod yul bde ba la gnas pa/ rdo rjesnyingang ri dbang po rnal 'byor
chen po' rnal 'byor can// rnal 'byor gyi mkhan po/ sa dang sa'i mtshams thams cad mi 'gal bar ston pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rdo rje dbang po khyed skye bu thams cad dang//
rgyal po'i 'khor dag tu/ rtsod ngan can dag la chos ston pa yin te/ de'i phyi'i rgyal ba'i sus khyod la gsol ba gdab kyis/ bdag giso so rang gi 'phags nga 'i ye shes kyis rig
pa'i sdud yul la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa lta ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par spyod pa'i gnas ston cig/ des bdag dang cod pan
can 'di dag gis khadag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyod yul/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'i sko'i bde ba nan tan gyis rab tu thob sta/ yid bzhin gyi lus rnam pa bcu la
dbang sgyur zhing/ stobs dang/ mngon ng zhes pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang gi gzhal med khang gis gnas rgyun te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas spangs te/
sna tshogs kyi lus yid duzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ta/ rgyal ba'i tshog sakyi 'khor thams cad dang/ stug po stug pa na spyod pa rnams la ches sna tshogs ston par
'gyur ro// rdo rje snying pos smras pa/ rgyal po skyes shig/ dgabo dga'o// cod pan can la khyed nga ra du// chos la 'jug pa bdag mdang/ stug po' rgyanan rab ston pa//
sems kyi 'ad bzhin mtshan nyid dag/ rnam rtog spyod yul yun shesan// rnam rtog don las phyir ldog pa// 'gro ba rnamartog mazlong nas te/ 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong
nas kyang// ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi ngo ba nyid bstanagyis// rgyal po nga la de nyon cig/ dpyod kyi smig rgyu ji bzhin la// de yi rnam par 'gro ba 'di/
mtshan gzhi mtshan ma rgyu rnams las// rnam nga 'a rtog pa rnamami rtag/ blo dad rtogs byas bskyod pa ste// rtags byas de la khyad gyur pa// gnyen por gyur pa gcig med/
[z/ ]pa nyi ma dang ni grib ltar gnas// sems med tsam po'ang yod pa min// tshad dang gzhal dang gnyis ka med// rnam par rtog pa sa na satsam ste/ rnam par rtog pa/
rnam mi rtog/ shes dang shes bya rnam rtog pa// sams tsam de ltar yin na ste// shes bya soms dad tsam pa ni// rtag tutsam 'angashes yod min// sems kyi chos kyi ngo bo
nyid[;]gang zag dag kyang g.yo ba rnams// gang tshesams la rnam brtags na// rtag dang brtags pas spangs pa yin// nga rgyud ngo rad nas dag par 'gyur// dag la bsam
gtan spyod yul te// bcu la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyis// dbang bskur rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal ba'i yul la chos rnams kyang// mi zad chos kyi skur 'gyurar//
nam mkha'i zad dad 'dra ba ste// sams dang rnam shes de bzhin te// mi 'jigs pa yang ma yin zhing// rtaganying zhi ba 'di la brten// 'dus ma byas ba'i mi shes te// stag
po'i zhing na rnam par mdzes// rnamashes 'byung gsum 'dasapa sta// sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin// de bzhin sangs rgyas bsamamed// skyug cing rgyal ba'i gnas
gyur pa/ ji ltar gyo mo rnams kyi rgyu// dzom chag par bstan pas bzhin// khyo mo rnams kyang rdul gyi sti// rdul kyang mchog phra'i de bzhin du// dngos po rnams kyi rkyen rnams
@#// kha rgyu rnams ji ltar snang ba bzhin// zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// rgyu nid bzhin lhag bcas pa'o// ji ltar shing las me 'byung ba// phyis
kyang ga nan du 'bar bar byed// ngobazhin pa shes byung ba'i ma// phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya/ gnas kyi las 'as 'phos 'gyur cing// sems dang rtog pas rnam sbas
pa chags pa med pa'i ya shasaro// skyug pa'i dbus na rnam par mdzes// bskyed med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// sa la gnas pa ma yin pa// lta ba thams cad
zad byed ra/'i/ bdag med nyid la skyabs susang// rgyud kyi rgyun rnams chad dra'i phyir// 'jig pa med cing 'byung med pas// lta ba thams cad klad byed pa// bdagamad
nyid la skyabs su song// zhir gyur zhi ba zhir ma byas// zhi bas zhi ba bden nyid du// lta ba thams cad rnam dag phyi'i// bdag med nyid la skyabs su song// sa rnams
sna tshogs byas pa ni// bdag med pa la bdag mad pas// ma rtag tha bas bcom pa dang// rnam par ston pa'i mdas kyang ste// bsreg pa tshig pa'i ma bzhin du// bdag nyid
mi 'gyur de nyid du// de bzhin lta bas rnam brtags te// bdag med bsam gtanarang gnas pa// lta ba'i chos la bder gnas kyi// so serang rig spyod yul la// thog ma
t+taM med nas nyes dri med// 'phags pa rnams kyi sa la gnas// 'phags gnas 'jig rten pas spangs te// 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'phags la gnas// sams kyi
sa las rab gyur te// stug po'i dkyil na rnam par mdzes// mi bdag mi bdag dbang po rnams// thams cad kyis kyang yang smras pa// rdo rje snying po skyabs dang mgon//
gang la skyabs su mchi bar bgyid// sangs rgyas yod min med pa min// phung po'i skya shang rnams bsregs te// dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom ste// stug po sangs rgyas
la gnas// shes bya dri med zhu ba la// sbyabasasu song zhig grogs po dag/ rtog dang tshad las bral bas ta/ blo dar rtogs bya'i gnas ma yin// sdug nga 'a dkya'i
bzhugs rnal 'bye'o can// de yang grogs po mgon skyabs so// rnal 'byor can rnams kun gyi zhing// zhing mchog bzang ba stug po'o// rnal 'byor 'byor pa nang
pos gang// sdug pa de la skyabs su song// sprosapa kun dang bral ba sta// lta ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs// ri mo'i thog thug lta bu dang// rmi lam mo gsham bu byed dang/
rmi lam bud med bzang mo ltar// thub pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mthong// dri za'i grong khyer spyod pa bzhin// skra phung mgal pa bskor ba ltar// smiga'i dgas srad mtshungs su/
yod dang med pa rnamapar spangs// sgyu ma'i lus gzugs sna tshogs dang// sprul pa'i sprul par de dag ni// 'jig rten spyod tshe mthong ba ste// sa dngas
la thub pa rnams// bsngor mdadu ma'i gzugs gyur pa// sgyu ma'i shing gi 'bras bu ltar// sprin dang du ba glog ltar yang// thub pas rnal 'byor rnam par mthong// rdzal
sogs pa'i bzo gzung ltar// 'gro ba bdag gi rnam rtog byung// yid dung yid kyi rnam shes dang// sa lnga'i ngo bo nyid rnams dang// 'jug pa'i rnam shes spyod pa na// bdag
mad mkha nyis brgyan pa ste/ bag chags thog ma med pa yi// sems kyi gnas ngan len byung yod// bod pa'i dba' rlabs 'dra bar ni// kun gzhi sa la gnas pa yin//
rlung gis ji ltar 'od nga la// phan tshun dag tu bskyod byas nas// dba' rlabs rnams la 'jig pa med// 'ad pa'i ng mad par ma 'gyur te// sa mad pagachags gnas can
rnams// 'jug pa'i yul la gnol ba dag/ sems rgyud rnams kyi 'jug pa ni// rnam par thar pa ma yin te// dus gcig tu yang de dag 'byung// bar bar du ni rims kyis
so[;]theg mamed nas sems 'jug pa// skar ma gabra' pa dkyil 'khor dang/ la ma me tog 'bras bu dang// ri dang sde dang tshal sogs la/ rtag tu dus gcig 'jug pa/
ba sta rims kyis kyang ni shes par byas// yang dag ma yin snga ma'i yul// mal la gnas bzhin mthong ba yin// lus kyi 'jug pa'i rnams kyis kyang// srog la rten
cing 'byung pa yin// rdzas dang grwas dang chos rnams la// tha dad rims kyis 'byung ba ste// mur zhing bca' dang bza' rnams la// tha dad sems kyin 'da' ba min//
ro dang dri ya rnam pa la// rims kyis tha dud 'byung ba yin// mas kyis kha drog khyad par gyi// sna tshogs 'du yang dus gcig tu// rgyal pa sam ni bsam mi khyab// rtag
turang bzhin red can no// de bzhin gshags po'i snying po ste// rdo ba rnams kyi gser bzhin gnas// yid ni kun gyi gzhi las byung// yid kyi rnam shes de nga zhin te// rnam
shis drug po rnam pa mang// sa yi khyad par byed pa po// bag chags samasu dang lhan cig tu// sa bon kun pa'i kun gzhi ni// kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag kyang// rtag
tu rang bzhin 'od can gyis// de ltar de bzhin pa shigs kyi rigs// nges dang ma nges dag ba yin// rtag tu gnas ltar 'byung ba ni// rgya mtsho rlabs dag ji bzhin du//
tham 'bring dang rab rnams su// de bzhin kun gzhis khyad par byed// sangs rgyas sa la rnam dag cing// gzhan du gyur nas rnam par mdzes// yang dag ji bzhin don ston la/
rdordzasung pas yang smas pa// mthong zhing thos te shes pas na// sachen bdag po khyed nyid kyi// spobs pa can la bstanubar gyis// khyad par du'i
khyad par bdag/ khams phun rnams kyi sa khams nangan// sa la 'khor lo 'khor rnams kyi// kun gzhi rnam par dag gyur na// sal rgyal por 'gyur ba yin/
'a dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba yin// 'khor lo 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro// dga' ldan la sogs gzhalamad du// mtsho ma rab kyi dbang por 'gyur//
dbang de'i gnas su dbang por ta// dbang sgyur gnas su de bzhin no// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang pa'i bdag/ gzugs khams bdag po'ang de bzhin te// gzugs
ma da 'du shesamad sams tsan// bsam gtan bde ba'i 'bras bur yang// yang dag mngon bya ma chags pas// yang dag mtho 'a mareg par// 'jigs med sang
ga'o sgra sgrig cing// dga' dang ye shes yang dag ldan// bsam gtan dbang gi bde bsangoms// de ni stug por smon pa yin// khams gsum spyod pa'izhes pa las/
chags med mnyam par gzhag pa ste// mthar gyis stug por zhugs nas su// rnam par sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sar/ chos kyi dbang po bdag gyur te// rten 'as
gzhan du gyur cing bdu// rtag pa brtan pa ni ba'i chos/ stag pa'i dkyil nasras dang bcas// chos kyi bdag po rnam nga ramadzes// 'jig pa med pa mi yi mchog/ ma ngan
'das nga 'jig pa min// mu 'dug rnams kyis ni brjod bzhin// mchog dang tha ma bar ma la// rgyal po bcu pa'i las rnams kyi// theg pa gsum du gyur pa sta/ lcag
pa tsholapa'i khyad par yang// rgyal po yang dag skye bar 'gyur// sa dang sar gnas pas so// 'jig na 'dus byas nyes par 'gyur// 'chi b rnams la de bzhin te// rgyal
ba'ajig pa mthar ma yin// dbazhin gshags pa dngashes sku// sam sacan zad cing mdu 'gyur pa// de ste mya ngan 'das 'jig na// sngon gyi mtha' yang 'jig pa dang//
mas can 'byung ba mad par 'gyur// sems can khams rnams bradagyur na// rgyal ba'i shes bya dngas po med// mya ngan 'da' me shes bya med// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
nyid kyang med// ma mar bsags pa'i dpa rnams dang// sa ben tshig pa'i dpa dag gis// rteg cun thar 'a na khas pa rnams// lus can rnams la thar pa ston// yog
dang mad pa'i rnam pa gyis// thar pa'i bde 'dus de dag ring// bsam gtan gnas pa thams cad de// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa dang// gzugs mad 'dushes//
mdab dang// mngon shes dbang dang stobs rnams dang// ma nyams nyams pa med pa yi// chos kyi mtshan la mkhas pa rnams// sa yi khams la
mkhas pa dag//mi yi dbang bo skyug par 'gro// yod dang med pa 'jig pas na// de dag 'khor las mi 'byung ste// phud pa gsum pa 'jig byed cing// rgyu dang dmigs pa'i
ny+tsarkyen rnams dad/ de ma thag dang dbang yang sta// sa rnams bdag med phyi'il dag/ mig dad gzugs dag gyur byas te// phrad pas gang rnams 'jug gyur pa// gzugs
rnams mngon byed yo shes dang// de dag thamasacad dazhig par 'gyur// phyi dang nang gis rnams ni// phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste// yod dang med pa'i lta ba las// de
zla sta grol nas 'jig nA ni// sems dang dmigs las bral ba'i phyig/ rnam par dmigs pas mi gnas te// mdun du rtog pa med gyur cing// de yi rang bzhin mi
gnasal// gang tshe dmigs pa spong ba la// rnam par rtog pa mi gnas shing// gang tshe gnyis las ma grol te// rtog med rtog pa spangs pa na// de tshe sams ni mnyam
par bzhag/ 'gro ba rnam rtag med pa mthong// gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste// bsam gyis mi khyab shes la gnas// rtan pa lasani gyur pa ste// ye shes gnas ngan len pa/
spangs// yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po ni// sna tshogs gzugs kyis brgyan pa ste// sa gsum rgyal porab byed cing// rgyal po lhug por rab tu 'gro// gzugs dang sam/
dad sems las byung// mi ldan pa dang 'dus ma byas// nang dang ru yis rnams kyang// tha dad rnam par rab mthong zhing// sa so rang yang gs mkhas// lta ba'i sa/
la rnam par gnas// rgyal po stug por 'dong ba ni// ya shesamakhas parnal 'byor can// ma tshanam ming dang de bzhin nyid/ namang ra rtog dang ya shes dang// yang dag
mtha' la gnas pa yis// so so rang rig spyod yul du// rgyal po dag dang rgyal pa'i du// rnal 'byor sems pa'i rnal 'byor can// rgyal po stug po' 'dong ba na//
sangs rgyas bstod pa'i zhing du// phrad pa gsum dang skyon ngas te/ badrug gi phyogs las 'phags gyur na// phyugs las nyams nga sa 'jig pa ni// rtog pa can
dad mnyam par 'gro// ma grub pa dad yang dpa yi// rgyal po 'gal bar shin tu 'gyur// rnam par rtog dang nyes pa'i mtshan// de dag rnam pa ltar 'gyur ro// phrad pa/
gsum pa sun 'byin pa// tshud zosabung ba jibazhin du// de bzhin 'jig rten sun 'byin pa/ yang dag ma yin rtag ngas// da 'a nyes pa rnam lnga ste// rtag pa bsung
ba'i mig can la// 'drachos mi 'dra chos skyon can// nor dang bzlog pa med pa dang// bdag gi phyogs las nyams pa'i go/ pha rol phyogs la brten
dang// lta ba de dag 'byung ba ni// thog ma'i mtha' 'jig byed pa'o// sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'// rgyal ba yodapa yin te// kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba dag//
wA 'byung ba dag kha rgyug pa'o// de dang de la 'am rgyud du// thugs rje'i dbang gis rgyal ba gshegs// sprul pa'i 'od zes lha rdzas kyis// blab lta bur rgyu nong 'kher// snga
ma'i las dang tshul mthun par// sa skyabs chos rnams ston pa mdzad// rgyud dang rgyud du bying rnams la// chos kyang bstan par mi 'gyur te// da sta mya ngan 'du'i 'jig na//
[%, ]rgyul bas yon tan ci zhig brnyes// dbang sgyuragasum po rnams dang yang// rnam par thar dang bod+hAn pa mthong// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gzhi bo dang// dran pa nyer gzhag stong pa
nyid tha dad yang dag shes bzhi dang// 'dri la lung bstan pa rnams dang// dmigs pa dang ni de ma thag/ rgyu dang dbang yang de bzhin te// gzugs med pa dang spyod pa dang//
dbang po stebs rnams bcas pa dang// mngon par shesadang dad rnams dang// rnam par shes dang de'i rgyu dang// 'dus byas ma byas mes rnams dang// byang chub yan lag gang khrag dang
rnam par thar dung skyes bu brgyad// sa rnams dgad shes pa dang// zil gyis gnon pa'i 'du mchad dang// ye shes mngon du chud pa bcu// sdug bsngal chos nyid shes pa dang//
sdug bsngal gyis su so sor rtog/ sdug bsngal nyid kyi rjes sung shis// 'dus pa rnams kyi chos shes dang/ 'dus pa 'a ni kun rtog dang// 'dus la rjes su 'grongashas dang
'gog pa dag la chos shes dang// 'gog pa drug la rtog pa dang// 'gag la rjes su 'grongashas dang// 'a ma' chas kyi shes pa dang// 'am 'aso sor rtog pa dang// lag
la rjes su 'gro ba shes// shes pa rnams dang slob pa bcu// brgyad pa mang na lan bdun dang// rigs las rigs dad lan cig 'ong// bar chad gcig po'i gang thag dang//
bar maramya ngan 'da' ba dang// gzhan skyes mya ngan 'da' bdad// mngon par 'du byed ma byas dang// stong ma'i rgyud kyang de bzhin te// rgyalang de dag thams cad kyang// yoshes spyod
yul yin par gsungs// rnal 'byor can yul sna tshogs te// ma mchog dang bar ma'i// byang chub sems MnApa' khyad par du// ma chag dad bcasar 'a de la sgom// 2ra sa/
rgyas nadabutshar te// nyan thos pa ni tha ma'o// bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa// lnga gsum bcu drug dag tu yang// sems kyi tshogs kyi 'gog pa ni// rnal 'byor can rnams shin tu byed//
gang 'das de ni 'gags pa yin// sams ni rang bzhin 'od snang can// zag pa gang yind sams min// sems dang lhan cig gnas pa'i ng med// ma
longs bani ma byin te// daltar byung ba gnas pa med// sams ni rkyen dang mi ldan par// 'di dang gzhan du'ad skya bamad// bsam gtan bzhin sems med de// 'byung ba'i rgyu la'ang/
wAganod pa med// 'byung ba'i rgyuni rnam shes te// yid dang rnam shes lnga pa'o// rang gi rnam rtog mi shes pas// dba' rlabs bzhin du'ang 'byung ba yin/ rtag dang rtag las maM
gro' ba// thub pa kun gyi kun gzhi'o/ yod dang mdalas lha rdzas dang// gzhan 'gyur 'jig pa ma yin zhing/ stug po dang ni smyug dkyil du// zla ba lta bur rab tu mdzes//
de ni mi 'jigs bdabar gnas// skyug pa'i dkyil nasras dang bcas// tha dad ma yin mtshan nyid mkhyen// ye shes ni gcig nyid du 'gyur// bsam yas rnal 'byor yul/
can te// rgyal po zla ba lta bur spyod// rgyal po phun sumatshogs pa 'di// rnala'abyor khyer ba thub rnams kyi// rtag par rgyal po de yi phyir// khyodakyi yid kyang rnal 'byor
shogo 'dod gnas rnam pa drug po dang// tshangs pa dag gi bcu gnyis dang// gzugs med shes med sems can du/ rgyal bo khyod ni dbang por gyis// stag pa'i 'dod/
pa 'i nga thob pa te// bzang po'i stug por smon pa'i pa'i// rgyal po la shes bcu bo rnams// bsgoms nasdug nga ra kAr 'gyur// ches dang rjes su 'gro bshus dang//
pa'i l soms dang kun rdzob dang/ sdug bsngal 'du ba'apishas ba dang// 'gog dang lam 'gas skyes pa dang// byung ba'i shas dang ma spyi dang// kheng bze bsgom pa de
bzhinatu// sha kun ta la'i rgyal rigs dang// ig pahA ku dang sa ma'i rigs/ yang dag ngan ston rgyu ba'i na chog[â€“ ]de rigs ni khyad par 'phags// da la rigs su khyod
rgyas shing/ zhum pa med par stag ga por song// lta pa'i chos la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor can gnas dri mad du// sbud pa bzhin du dbugs rgyu zhing// 'gro rgyu
lug dang 'dra ba ste// rdza 'brug bzhin du lus phyed kyi// 'gro zhing beng ba byed pa ni// thams cad 'us 'a yid yin te// sgyu ma'i dgas bzhin du gnas/ sgyu ma'i
shing ltar shin tu snang// chu bo'i nang gi ma bzhin du// sminum mig dang yan lag rnams// sgyur bsargyal po bzhin durtse/ sams dad sa mas las byung dang yid//
yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag/ chos rnams 'di dag dngos po med// sprin gyi tshul du 'byung ba ste// kun gzhi thams cad sa bon 'di// bag chags rnamos kyi yongs su
bkris// sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu dang// 'ja' dang glog rnams ji bzhin du// lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul// de lta'i gzugs su snang
ba yin// lu ma'i mtsho lta bur dag/ drimadangad pa'irgyal po bzhin// gsal ba gdon mi zapa'i rigs// sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhin du gnas// mtshan ma'i mthu las/
ming 'byung// mtshan ma rkyen las byung pa yin// mtshan ma ming dang 'brel ba ste// rkyena rnams kyis kyang rnam pa gnas// mtshan mo tshul dang dbyibs dag las/ rnam par
rtag pa shin tu 'byung// rnam par rtog pa skyod nga yi// rgyu brnand gnyis su gsungs// phyi rol mtshan ma samasu rnams dang// bag chags yid kyang de bzhin te// samA
dang lhan cig ldan pa ni// khang pa la ni gnas pa yin// yid dang dbang por ldan pa ni// rnam shes lnga yi rgyu yin te// rtag tu yang dag ye shes kyis// 'jig rtan rgyu
la rnam par lta// de ltar byed dang bya ba med// de bzhin nyid 'di rnam gzhan min// thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid// phan tshun stobasakyis 'byung ba ste// rnal 'bya'o can
rnams de ltar lta// de bzhin nyid du gsal bar mthong// rang bzhin yongs su grub pa ni// chos rnams chos nyid de yin te// brtags nga 'i dngos po rang bzhin du// chos
[s] rnams thams cad ma skyes pa// stong pa ngo bo nyid med du// yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa// sgyu ma rmi la ma rnams dang 'dra// dri bra'i grong khyer ltabu ste// sku rtogs
rnams dang smig rgyu ba zhan// du ba sprin stug lta bu ni// mtshan ma tshuladang dbyibs rnam sa kyis// ji ltar ming du 'jug pa la// tshig dang yi ge mang pa dang// mang rnamA
mang ba 'a yang sta/ kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ gzhan gyi dbang ni de las gzhan// yid dan dbang po 'dus pa las// sa ban kun nas bag chags dang/ tha
dad ma lan sems dang ba cas// rnam par shes pa kun tu 'byung// ga nan gyi dbang gi rang bzhin yang// phan tshun stobs kyi rgyu bas so// so so rang rig shin tu dra//
mthong ba'i chos 'ab gnas pa ste/ rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa 'di// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul la/ 'apags pa'i rang bzhin thugs chud pas// sangs rgyus rnamA
dad sangs rgyas sus// rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa ni// yang dag mtha' ru gzigs pa na// skyong bdatsas rnam dar gsungs// dzad s ra 'i 'dam yang non cesaso//
byas kyis gzedi yang bya ba med// phyin chad 'byung ba mdadazhas// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// g.yo ba thams cad shin tu 'byung/ bag chags ma lus bsregs
pas na// rnam par rtag pa mi 'byung zhing// bdag med shin tu mthong ba ni// chos dang gang zag bsgrags pa ste// sa bon rnams dang phral bosan// sam
kyi tshogs rnams mi'ajug ge/ thog ma med pa'i dus bsags pa'i// yid kyi gnas na lan rtog pa'i// lcosang thams cad mngon bsal bas// mya ngan 'das pa lcags
A bsregs bzhin// ji ltar b tu bsregs pa'i lugs// bsal bar gyur kyang 'jig pa med// de bzhin grol ba thams cad kyang// ma zad bzhin du bsil ba la// zag/
'i pa med pa'i chesadabyings su// bzhugs pa stug po'i dkya'i 'kher na// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras bcas// ting nge 'dzin gyi zas gnas pas// mnyamar 'a ga zhag la
mnyam gtanag cing// mthe pa'i chos la bde bar gnas// rgyal po rnal 'byor can gyi yul// rnal 'byor 'di yin brtsam pa gyis// de ste rgyal sras dge ba'i gnas//
stagapar 'gro bar 'dod na ste// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// zhing gi mchog ni stug po'o// de phyir rgyal ba dag bar rtsom// rgyal po rnams la'ang dag par
gyis[;]ming ni mtshan ma'i mthu las byung// mtshan ma rgyan las byung ba ste// mtshan ma las kyang rnam rtog 'byung// grub pa rnams ni ma gtogs da ra// rdza la sogs nga
[a ]dbang po'i yul/ lung ba yon tan ldan pa'i rnams// rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di// skya ba la ni rgyu yin no// khyad par byed pa rnam rtog ste// gnas kyang rnam pa/
shes ra ra byed// 'gro dang mi 'gro 'gro ba yi// gti mug rnams kyang shin tu skyo// ring po drung du kha dog dang// rtsub pa dag dang 'jam pa'i rnams// sgra dang dril sogs
pa'i yul// mngar dang kha dang tsha ba dang// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul/ ji sAd dge dang mi dag dang// 'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas// mya ngan 'da' ba dang shes
yul skad cig skad cig rab tu 'byung// byung zhing phyi'i lad log pa ste// de ni mgyogs pa'i shin tu 'gro// rnam par shes ra rgyu las byung// yid dang kun gzhi rab 'bral
las khab lang lta bur shin tu 'khor// kha gnyis sprul pa ji bzhin la// yid kyi spyodang de bzhin te// kun gzhi rnam shes yog par byed// gcig tu 'on kyang rab tu 'byung/
yid kyi rnam par shas dang bcas/ (rgyu mi dgos pa byas nus ldog/ bdag tu dgos pa'i ng shin tu byed// bdag gis bya ba'ang 'phel bar byed/ lus la drod spyad spyad pa ste/
sna tshogs rnam par rab tu spyad// zas dang skom dang longs spyod dang// gos dang spos sogs rnam spyod dang// mchong ba dag dang rgyug par yang// mi yi lus ni 'dzin pa yin// gar
[4]/ u@#// dang gad mo rtsad me dang// yid kyang rtag tu byed pa ste// sgra tshogs mag la ra bskor ba dang// dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang/ smig rgyu la lang de bzhin du//
rnam par rtog pa kun tu 'jug/ ba bab kun tu 'khor ba'i sems// bdag sams khang du mi chud pas// lus dang snod kyi rnam par yang// phyang mo nyug pa ltar gnas pa 'o//
nyam chung snyad de nang pa ste// rnam par rtog par rgyu med pa// bdag gis brtags pa'i dga' spyod// mthong nas gnas pa gzugs padan bzhin// rgyal po rnamangags sa bon ni//
lta ba'i yul du g.yo ba ste// bus pa'i tshog sa rnams myos par byed// 'phags pa ma yin sa yi bdag/ rgyalaro rnam shes gsum r yi 'jug par b tu bstan pa ste// 'di
rnams dang ni bral grub pa'i// 'ad bzhin yang dag nyid yin no// bya ba phrag zhing ji sAd rnams// shugs 'dzin gyi na mthong ab dang// 'phags pa mo'u 'gal bu yis kyang//
lus dang lus tsho'i mdzes pa rnams// de dag ni 'di dag 'phugs/ stug po'i zhing na'o sa yi bdag/ thams cad zhing na tsamadzes pa// de dag dpa 'am char mi rung// bad/
bayod ngang mngon dga' dang// 'og gi zhing rnams bye ba dag/ de dag de na gang bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas de dag stug la bstod// stag cas bya yod sngon ma gra' mod// rang byang 'phrul
pa de yin te/ zag pa med pa'i sangs rgyas sar// 'byung ba gsum las 'das te gnas// de ni bde ba nyer len med// khyod dang nga 'di sprod dang bral// ther zug mchog tu
rtag pa ste// brtan pa stug po 'dus ma byas// yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub tu// 'tshang rgya 'ob mna gnas mchog tu// sangs rgyas ma gyur 'dod khams su// sangs rgyas mdzad pa/
mi mjed du// de dag stug pa'i zhing gshaga gnas // sangs rgyas sprul ba bye ba yati// rtag tu rnal 'byor mnyam par gzhag/ sprul pa dag dang thabs cig rolo// thams cad zhir du zla
ba ltar// gang 'gas gang gis dbang 'gyur ba// de la de ltar 'byung ba ste// 'khrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis kyang// sa bcu pa yumado mchog dang// stong pas brgyan dad du ma yi// gang mang
rnam par sprul pa'i mare// da bgyi 'phreng ba las bshad dad// rnam ra ra snang ba'i mdo sde dang// sgyu ma drang/ 'a las 'gro ba sogs// mdo sde rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ phyug po rgyan nas
rnam pa'i khyung// skyug po rgyan gyi mdo sde 'di// mdo sde kun res 'bags pa yin// rgyal po 'di la rim gror yang// rgyal po rnams dang bcas pa sa gyis// gzugs med 'dod
dang gzugasa rnams dang// 'du shes mdang re bzhin te// gnas las 'das te sangs rgyas dbang// bzhugs so stag nga 'o dkyil 'khor na// pad+mo 'dranga'i gna' mad khang// gzug
mang rnam pa sna tshog sani// lha rdzasarmad kyi ye shes te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam dag gis// rnam grol rnal 'byor can rnams dang// don bcom ldan thabs
cig bzhugs// skyug pa'i dkyil brezhugs bsam gtan zhugs// sangs rgyas sa mchoga rnam bzhi la// du la bzhugs shing gazugs 'dzin pa// rnal 'byor mkhas pa nyid
ny+nyo tshul gyis// de yi mtha' ma ma 'jigs pas// gzugs rnams dang ni yul rnams kyi// thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas ba'i rnams// gzugs kyi rnam pa snatshogs kyang//
stug po'i dkyil na rnam bzhugs shang// thams cad rnal 'byor can gyis bstan// ba bla gser dang bla 'od tsam pa ka dang rma bya'i mgrin pa pad+mo'adra// de yi sa la bzhugs pa'i lha
yo yang lha'i gzugs ni rnam pa mdzes pa ste// de gzugs lha rgyal go ba ka dag glog dang 'dam bya ra 'od bzhin du// la 'asabal chung sku dang na bza' la ma rtsal sogs pa'i mal
bzhugs par// mthong ngo hum stong lta5nyin tu rnam par 'bar ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba la// thupa can la las rnal 'byor dbang la phyug dbusachu skyes se bzhugs par mthong//
thub pa'i thor tshugs tshogs ni lag gis 'gro yi mgo pe klad pa bzhin du ste// la lar gzugs ni rdo rje an nyil gyis spras pa'i cod pan brgyan par ro// la las la lab thub pa
de la 'khor 'di la me nya dung bcas par mthong// la las ji ltar nam mkha' rgyu ba'i lam la 'ja' zug bzhin du thub pa mthong// lha rdzas phyag ra can gyis sna tshogs chu la can
ra 'ab phyag turab gzhog cing// khams gsum chu srin gnas dang chu gnas de bzhin ba glang rmig rar yong bar mdzad// sbyin pa'i shugs kyis ma yi bdag pa'i gtsugagi red bana rnamA
kyis rab mched cing// la la dag na rgyal dang rgyal ba'i 'khor na dgos pa rnams la mkhas gyur cing// chad pas gcod nga 'a snang ngo sku ga nga 'i dbus nagazhan du rnam par snang ba ni//
jub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor shin tu byed pa rnams las// rad gi yul rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag rnal 'byor gyis stan cing// la 'dus
gnas dang lta ba yid dang bo rnams shin tu gzhan du gyur pa dang/ dbang dud yoshes rnam pa sna tshogs ting nge 'dzin dang yid bzhin sku mnga' bar// las yul la chags mad spyod
yul rig pa'i go la bya ba gcod par te// 'di dang gnanamad ngags med gyur pas tshags bya med phyir mya ngan 'das nga ra re// snom dang 'od 'phro mdangs ji ltar 'jig rten 'di na mo
bzhin shin tu mya ngan 'das// la las re'aphyin pa'i mchod sprin mchod bcug mchod sbyin byed pa dag tu ste// sbyin dang mchod dang thub pa dag kyang rnam pa tshul bzhina mdzad bar shin tu
mthong// bde ba yod ces bya ba'i zhing mchog de na skyas bu yod pa de dag ni// mngal nas skyes pa ma yin bde bar 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dag lta/
lha rdzas gsar ltar 'bar dung zla ba lta bu'i lus 'chang rnal 'byor can gyi bdag/ lha rdzas 'du bzang de dang gang yang mi nang rnal 'byor can gyi dbang po'i yul// de dag rgyalamar mi
bod rnal 'bya'o can gyi dbang po dag gi bar de la// gzhan du bdag cag nyid kyis bshams pa'i 'phyongs la spyod pa'i zhing gim de dag/ mtha' yas 'od kyi bde ba can n rgyal ba'i sras/
rnams lha rdzas 'od 'khor can// rnal 'byor yang dag nyid ches thung dang khyu mchog bsam gtan bdud rtsi myong byed dang// rnam pa tha dad sna tshogs rin po che dgu yol ga sbyangs pa'i nag
tshal shing// lha rdzas gsar phya'i khams la bsags pa'i zhing mchog de gnat+ta rnam pa la mdzes// gsa' dang rin chen sna tshog sam go pad+mos da ni mchog rab tu brgyan//
'din sangs rgyas zhing gi gtan yin dpa med de kun ming yad pad+ma skyes// thub pa de la dad cing bsam gtan mkhas la sas rgyas skyid la rab tu mos// bdag gi sa ston pa la ni
bdagabastanayid can pad+mo dag las skyes pa ste// sangs rgyas zhingag mchog na gnas pa'i mi ni bzang po'i mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan/ dang khyad bzang po'i ba cas ra sa rman du 'bar
00 ba'i lus can dpal gyi be 'u dad bcas// yod dang med pa'i rnam rtog rtog pa med pas drod deg go/ de ltar 'di dag rnam par bstananas rje rdzu khyu mchog mtha bong tsam du gyur//
sro ma rdul phran shin tu phra ba'i skra yi brgya cha'i gzugs su'ang de bzhin gyur// la 'ar bde gshigs rang rgyal nyan thes gzugs dang de bzhin sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang// gang dang
gang gsems kyi spyod pa ji bzhin de 'dra'i gzugs kyi khyad par dag/ rnal 'bya'i mkhas pa rdo rje zhes byas mtshan med gzugs kyi yul dag rnam par sbyangs// de skad bshad nas yang smras/
