gzungs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang// rnam thar tha dad yang dga' gi/ stobs dang 'jigs pa med pa dang// phung po khams rnams bgamed nga// 'di dag gzhan du gyur nas 'thob//
rtog pa'i sangs rgyasos yang ngo// chos rnams lnga yi rang bzhin dang/ rnamar shes ba brgyud rnams dang// bdag med gnyis re'ab rtogs nas// gnan du 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyu//
yid bzhin lus ni bcu po dag// sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro bas bskor// mi zad smon lam bcu po dang// lam gyi rnams kyis shin tu sprul// rmi lam ma lang ga shugs bton nam// chu
[s]@#/ yi zla ba bzhin du mthong// rnal 'byor lam la thub pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas s la zhugs pa dang// rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyis
mdun du byas// yod dam med pa'i phyogs bral ba// rdul phrana rnam bar 'jig rnams kyis// dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang// lha yi gnas nia'akhod pa'i tshogs// rabs la 'dod rgyu
zhing / nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'khed spyod kyang// jiltar snang bar ma gyur pa// de bzhin rgyal sras gtsas pa'i rnams// rnal 'byar med pas mi mthong ngo// rnam pa sna tshogru gzug
dang ldan// sa dang zhing rnams bya ba na// rgyal ba mchog la mngon par mos// smon lam dbang la gnas ba'i rnams// pad+mo'i khang par rab tu s+ya/ dbang dang bsam gtan sems
pa dag/ zhing dang zhing du mya ngan 'da'// ting nge 'dzin las skyo ba ston// lhun gyis grub par thams cad du// chur phyud zla ba 'dra par ta/ nyi ma lta bur khyad med pa// snang ba sem
can spyod yul du// yang dag mtha' la mi reg pa// ting nge 'dzin lasarab tu ldeg/ grul gnas pa'i bung ba dag/ gangs chen mtshol 'gro ba bzhin// ga nga durgyu 'gro de'i rgyug/
sta[;]dpag tshangashin tu mang bar yang// thugs rjes nyon mongs dma'apa'i lus// sdug bsngal can gzigs de bzhin du// de dag 'byung ba rab tu ston// phyir ldogang dag med po/
yang sta// 'jig pa dag kyang rnamamakhyen nas// zad pa'i dus su mi gnas pa// gzung dang 'dzin gyis 'phangs nga 'i rnams// gzung dang 'dzina' sprad pa rnams// gzung dang 'dzin
kyis bskyod pas na// mtshan ma'i gzhi med mtshan nyid med// 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis khyer pa'i rnams// yang dang yang zhing skye ba yin// chags med mtsho yi gter gyur la// gcig
lagacig 'du'i snga'u ltar yang// byed pa grub la gnas kyis mthong// 'druba'i gnas dang rten med pa'/ de bzhinargyal ba rgyal sras rnams// srong nga sa rnam ra ra dkrugs pa/
ya rnam rtog sdug bsngal gnas nga 'i rnams// sa yi gnas ni nyen mongs phyir// rab tu byung dang phyir ldeg dang// sbyin dang mchod pa ragakyang 'byung// 'di 'drarnal 'byor can
gyi chos// rnam pa smatshogs bsgom par gyiska'aphags pa rgyan stug po bam ba gnyis pa// kun tu bzang po ma yi bdag/
gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs gzugs// byang chub so/mas dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rdo rje snying po la smras ng// mthun pa dag 'a dbang byed dang// lha gnas 'khod ra gnan dag dang//
rin chen khang pa sna tshogs na// gang yang stug po'i dkyil 'khod nga 'i// rgyal sras rnal 'byor ldan pa dag/ gang gis phyug ces bya thas te// thos nas nan tan byang nga 'i rnams// gzhan yang
[r ]nga@#/ 'gyur la gzhol ba dag/ gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshul thos shing/ ting nge 'dzin de'i tshul song ba// skyug bor ring por mi thogs 'gro// sangs rgyas yang dag 'gro
lams// 'gro pa 'dzin dang shugs 'dzin dang// 'jam dbal rnam par 'phrul pa dang// mthu chen 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang// zla ba la sogs gzugs dbang rgyal// brogras shin
shA tu zhib dud// ltab rdo rje rnal 'byor rigs// du mamakha' yi bdag po dang// phyag na rdo rje blo can dang// rnal 'byor can dang rgyal sras rnams// gang yang byi ba'i zhing dag nas// chos/
mnyan phyi ni'angs pa'i rnams// sdugapo'i rgyun la gzhol ba dag/ rgyal ba ma 'ongs mthong nas kyang// khong nas sAng rdzasnying brtsa ste// rnal 'byor ldan can dbang po'i gtso// sna
tshogs gzugs la rab tu smas// rnal 'byor can gyi gtso la dris// 'jigs med rdo rje snying po la// rin chen khamasar sna tshogs dang// dbang sgyur khang du bzod po yang// ji lta'i
gangagis sna tshogs byas// sna tshogs gzugs can khyod kyis smos// dngos pa kun gyi snatshogs nyid// 'gro nga dag gi rab 'byung ba// rdzal sogasaM pa'i dngos po dag/ ji ltar chu 'jim
tha' zhar las// 'asasu bya ba thams cad bskyed// 'gro ba 'di dag de bzhin byas// rnga dang pa wang sgra la sogs// las su bskyod las dbyangs 'byin te// de bzhin 'jig rten
'di la'ang ci// bskyod pa'i 'a sa las kun 'byung ngam// rang bzhin gsum po ji bzhin du// dngos po gcig la kun tu gnas// sa rnams 'di ltar thams cad du// da da
dngos la rab tu gnas// de bzhin 'di dag kun kyang ni// dngos po gcig 'a rab gnas sam// gang phyir 'di ltar rgyanadag snang// khams gsum g.yo dang mi g.yor pas// dga'
ldan matsham bab gnas dang// dbang sgyur rnams kyis byas/samaci// mi 'am ci dag du ma dang// gya nom snang bas byas sam ci// 'og min thor tshugs can gyis sam// 'onatan
gzugs med rnams kyis kyang// lha rnams bdag po thams cad kyis// gcig tu 'dus te 'di byas sam// 'phru'ang 'i sprul pa dag gis sam// rgyal ba khyu ma chog gis mdzad dan//
'on tan rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams// zhing gzhan rnam par bzhugs ra sasam// rnal 'byor la mkhasarnal 'byor can// sangs rgyas zhing du bzhugs rnams kyis// sa rnams thams/
cad byas sam ci// gang la nor nga rab du gnas // gang 'di nor ba snang ba dag/ smig rgyu rnams la chu bzhin te// rdza ma'i phyogs la yon tan bzhin// 'gro ba gang gis phyogs la gnas//
yon tan mi 'bral yon tan can// yon tanamed dang yon tan gnas// ma yi phan tshun 'bral bas na// yon tan tshogs su rnam nga ' gnas // nor nga snatshogs de bzhin du// gang la'ang de bzhin gnas
g.yin nam// 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// sa rnams la ni gangasang ba// 'on tam tshangs pas phyung ba 'am// 'gro ba mthu bo che yig sam// khyu mchog gis
sam sngon byas sam// sar skya yis sa rang gis sam// gcesanga'i rkyen gyis byas samapa// rang bzhin gyis sam dbang pos sam// dus dang phyogs kyis bslad pa 'am// 'on tam ma
rig srad pas sam// lha yi drang srong tha tsamaza// lha yi tshogs kyang de bzhin te// grub dang dri za'i rgyal pa rnams// sa 'gan nga 'irnal 'byor can// 'on tam 'di dag mig 'phrul
lam// 'gro badri zu 'dra zhig gam// milam yin nam smigargyu 'am// sngon med rnal par rtog yin nam// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang// kha gnyis sprul bzhin gnas pa
kham[}]'on tam rang bzhin 'di mad ma// 'khrul 'khor ro langs bzhin gnas sam// mgal pa bskor ba 'dra ba 'am// 'on tam skra yi tshogs lta bu 'am// byed dang 'a sakyis ma
byas shing// dbang po ku bar s ma byas// mchod sbyin sbyin sreg mchod 'brasu sam// smrang gi gzhung gi lam gyis sam/ rgyunam sa shin tu phal chibs// nan tan rtag pa ma yin te//
tshe 'gro ba 'dzin pa med pa'i ng min// rgyu rnams kyi yang rgyu dag ste// 'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis gug/ las kyi bag chagasa rnams las byung// rnamang shis brgyad po'i skyes bu ni// kun g ni zhes
[//]kyang bya ba ste// des ni sna tshogs 'di dag kun// rdza ma'i 'khrul bakhor bzhin bsko// til bkram til mar jibazhin du// lan tshwa'i tsha dro nga lta bar// gzugs la mi rtog nyid
ji bzhin// skyes bu'adi yang de bzhin gnas// ji ltar gsung la sogs la dri// yon tan rnams la yon tan mtshan// nyi zla gnyis kyi 'od zer bzhin// de ltar skyes bu gnas pa
na dgos dad byed pa mad paste/ yod dang med kyi phyogs kyis spras// gcig dang tha dad med pa ste// mur 'dug phyugs kyis rnam par sbyangs// rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa med//
nam yang rnam par mi rtag ste/ grol ba'i so so rang rig pa// sangs rgyas sar skyes thub can gyis// gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste// snga mad sems dang sems byung gis// rnam
shes brgyad dang bral bas// nam yang rnam par mi rtag ste// de la gnas pa chu rlabs bzhin// phan tshun mtshan nyid tha mi dad// 'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste// de ldan pa rigs pa//
min ji ltar thub pa'i rnal 'byor dang// rdzu 'phrul can gyi rdzu 'phrul bzhin// mnyam par bzhag pas rab ta mthong// rnal 'byor 'gro ba gzhan gyis min// de bzhin 'jug pa'i rnam
shes rnams// dedag kun ga ni lhan ciga gnas // rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin// des ni 'di dag thams cad kyang// jiltar nor bu phug pa'i
nga'// rnams// skad la brgyus dang 'khor 'bazhin// las kyi rlung gis skor byed pa// ji ltar rdza mkhan 'khor lo dang// lag dar thalanar bskor ba yis// kun tu
bskor cing snod byed pa// yon tanasnatshog sa rnam par ldan// de bzhin rnam shes brgyad kyi mi// khams kyi gzugs mnyam lhan cig tu// san rnam par byed pa ste// phyi nang rgyu bzhi'agro ba
rnams/ gang la'ajig rten 'di dag kun// nam mkha'i skar tshogs ji bzhin du/ gnas shing rnam pa snatshogs rnams// rlung gi rta yis shin tu bskor// ji ltar mkha' la bya rnamA
kyi rjes ni snang ba ma yin te// bar snang yod pa ma yin na'ang// bya rnamar rgyu ba'i byed pa med// de bzhin rnam par shes ra bi mi// bdag yod ma yin gzhan med min// rnam dag ba'
snang 'dra ba dag/ dba' rlabs bzhin du rang tu 'gyungo// bag gas rnam pa'inyis pa yis// mi chags pad+ma zla ba bzhin// pado lan chu med min/ chu' zla gzugs med pa yang//
rgyu chusang zla ba yod pa ste// pad+mo'i 'dab ma de bzhin du// mig la bud mad ga zhon nu dag/ mig gis mthong bar mi 'gyur// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes// las rnams cig
car byed pa ste// 'gro ba dgagi lus la ni// khyapa gnasas bon can kun na// skyug pa'i sngon dang 'drab r yang// sa rnams yog par shin tu gnas// tshe dang rnam shes kun nas/
log dod kyang de bzhin stobs chen ba gyis// sna tshogs gzugs kyi lus can gyi// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs kyang rtsos// mkhan ji ltar sa snod// spyod pa jibazhin de lta 2
bklung sogs pa'i mthong nIr// bong bu'i rwa ni mad nga// ma mthong bar ni med pa med// ba glangarA nImad pa yang// phyin ci log tu dmigs pas med// phyin ci log gis mang
sams la// shin tu phra ba'i rdul bshig na// yod pa de dag med par 'gro// mad pa yod pa'i rgyu las te// med pa yod ces rtog pa ni// yod pa mad las bltas pas// phan
tshun ltos pa'i rgyulags// blo dang rtog par byamad de// khong du chud pa skye ba med// ma0/ ngan na 'khor la 'khor lo min// ji lta skra tshogs mthong ba bzhin// dri bra'i grong khyer sgyu ma
dag ci zhig mthong nas 'byung ba bzhin// blo yi 'byang brgya mad par// yod pa ma yin rnam rtog nga// rtog bya rnam par rtog pas bskyed// lus can rnams kyis yid skyas te// ming dad
'du shes 'brel ba dang// rang bzhin gnyis kyi ngagachogs kyis// mi sems ni rab tu 'byung// grub pa'i dan ni mi skya'o// thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags/ gnas ngan 'in
gyi lulalas byug/ rab tu spros pas bsgos yid las// sems kyi tshog sani 'byung bar 'gyur// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang// kun tu skya pa'i mi yi sems// rdza la
sogs pa'i gzugs kyi dbyings// snang ba gzhan yod ma yin te// 'di dag thams cad bla tsam bas// rtogs bya'i dngos po yod pa min// blo dang rtogs
bya'i dngos por ni// bdag nyid rab tu 'jug pa ste// byis pa rnams kyis mi rig pa// bag chagasa rnams kyis sems myos rnams// rnam pa brgyad dang rnam bdun dang// dus gcig
tu yang 'byung bar 'gyur// sngon mad bgachags ldan pas na// kun gzhi sa bon thams cad can// rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ji bzhin du// rlung gi rgyan gyis bskyod pa ltar// gab byed
rnying ni rab tu 'byung// rnam par rgyun kyang mi 'chadade// blo yi 'od pa de bzhin rtag/ yul dang rig pas bskul ba'i phyir// sna tshogs bdag rtog rnam shes kyis// pa dga' bdag
gas 'dzin par byed// ji ltar saM la rnam rtog med// 'gyur med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// dgos pa'i rnam par gyur pa ni// de 'dra kun gzhi rnam shes la'o// jiltar mi
zhig lag pa las// rang gi lus 'a mnyed pa dang// phyogs kyi glang po bdag lus la// bdag gis sna yis chu 'thor dang// ji ltar shad can la la dag/ bdag gi lus la sa so
'debs pa// de bzhin blo ni brtag ngan la// don gnyis tshul du 'jug pa'o// blo yi yul du bya ba 'di// khams gsum rnam par khyabang ra gnas/ phyi dang nang gi bya ba yang//
rnal 'byor mkhas pas mthong ba yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di kun gzigs// sa la ji snyed snang ba dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs dbyibs kyi gzugs// sa la rnam pa sna
tshegasaso// chos 'di yang dag bshad pa ngang// rdo rje snying po 'jigs da nga/ mi skya'i deb la dga' 'gyur te// bsamagyis mi khyabachos dbyings kyi// lha yi bsam gtan maM
g.yo ba// sangs rgyas spyod yul bzhugs pa dang// sdug po nas ni 'ongs pa'i gzugs/ mthong nas rnal 'byor ma gnas pa// thub pa de yis lha rdzas lus// rnal 'byor gtang
lta yang gnas sa// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med dang// 'du shes med pa'i gnas rnams kyi// mun ng 'tshogs nas phyir byung ste// skyug ba danas 'dir 'ongs so// sangs rgyas
rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas// sangs rgyas nang ni mchog rab nas// gzugs kyi rnam pa dum yi// sangs rgyas sku yang rnam byung nas// mi yi khams na rnam par 'phrul/// su
bla ru'adod pand 'i// stag pa yin ming byung nas// rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad kyang// phan tshun gcig la gcig bltas te// gcig ' gcig nirang smos pa// skyug pa dri med
bsod nams te// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed// rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas zhing gi dam pa phul// yu bus de yi sgra thos te/[0f38]/des nas bdag cag dga'
bam/ @#/ 8/ ba'i yi du// skyag po rnal 'byor can gnas gyi// brtan lam bdag cag thob par bya// 'og min tshangs pa thegatsugasacan// gtsang ma'i gnas kyis rnam spangs
pa zhing ga ngomatshar ltad mo dang/ sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i sras kyi yub// tshangasang sa da tsho gsol nas su// gtsang m gnas kyi 'jigasamad rnams// de dag thams cad semA
ba ni/ tshangs bas stug por 'gro mi 'gro// tshangs pa rnal 'byor chen po can// mun pas de dag bslad par gyur// thub pa mi shes thub ba gi/ ja ltar gnas ni thub par 'gyur//
tshangs pa de na kun tu soms// blo yis tshangs pa jib pa'i mchog/ 'dod dang gzugs kyi bdag po dag/ rgyu ba de na med pa ste// nam mkha'i khang pa gnas rnams dang// 'du shes
med pa'i ng da banAn te// mur 'dug gzhan la grags pa yi// rnal 'byor can rnams der mi 'gro// bdag gis bya ba byas sam ci// bsams te 'dir yang 'das pa gyur// bdag
'gro'am brtan zhing brtag pa yis// ther zug 'dus ma byas stug tu// gal te yang na thub pa de// rnal 'byor mnga' bra lha'i yang lha// mthu yis rnal 'byor mkhyen rnams kyi// pho brang
stug po dar 'gro 'am// thub pa de la phyag 'tshal la// de skad smras nas thor tshugs can// mthong ba shin tu 'bar ba yi// sangs rgyas lam na bzhugs pa rnams// gsungs shig gsung
ba shig thub pa'i rnams// khyed la ci 'tshal cu gyis shig/ sangs rgyas dbang po bka' stsal gsol// stug po ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur// gzugs yul 'di 'as phyir leg cig/
dar 'gror med pa gzugs can rnams// stug po da ni thub can yul// blun med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing// 'du shes med pas mi 'thob ste// da bzhin 'dod pa'i khams dbang gis//
mur 'dug gzhan la grags pas kyang// rnal 'byor rig lam stug mi 'thob/ tshongs pa nyid kyis de gsung gros// mchod sbyin gsol ba'i zhal na sa// de ni de nas phyir 'go sta//
tshangs pa'i gnas su lang sodang// de yi phyir na der 'gro ba// tshangs pa yis kyang mi 'thob pas// gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs can rnams// ded 'gro yod pa yang ma yin//
mi phyed dad pa 'di 'drard// skyug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba yang// rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/ de phyir ngo mtshar thab par gyur// sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul// rnal
'byor can gnas stug po de// 'di nigacig nas gcig tu thos// de nas byung bas rnam par bsnyad// sna tshogs tshig 'di thos pa ni// thub can rnadz+dzasnying po yi// rgyal sras khyado
kyis smra bar gyis// rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod// dbang sgyur rgyal ba de bzhin gyis// gzi brjid chen ng ma thogs shig/ mtshom rab dang dga' ldan dang// gtsang gnas
'jigs pa medu nga 'i rnams// thub pa'i bka' ni ma lus bar// sla ba ra su zhig nusapa yod// gzhan du khyod dang sangs rgyas rnams// thub can thub pa bsAmA
bdag/ sangs rgyas yul ni bsamam khyab// mchog gi gtso bo sangs rgyas kyi// rnal 'byo'i rnal 'byor mod pa la// su yis ji ltar bstan pa ra nus// mtshe ma rab dang shugs/
'dzin dang// dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gcig pa'i dbyangs su yang skyes te// gsungs shig gsungasashig rgyal ba'i sras// rnam par 'phrul dang 'jam dang la dang/
byams pa mi 'am ciyi bodag/ rnal 'byor can gzhan gang de ni// de dag smra ba sbos shig grogs// nam mkha' las kyang sgra byung ste// lha dang sngags 'chang rnams kyis kyang/ de
nag shin tu rnga brdungs pa// gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras// de dag de skad smra ba na// thor tshugs can gyi tshangs nga 'ongos// sa 'khod kun 'a smras pa ni// snyan gyi mchog
skul 'dug gnas te// nga mtshar lha rdzas 'di ci zhig/ thub pa rnams kyi tshogs 'khor na// rnal 'byor dbang po thams cad dang// slob mamakhas pa de dag kyang// khyu mchog thub la
dri bar 'dod// rgyal sras rdoN+Dadabangar la// skabs 'di ci zhig su zhig la// rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsungs pa yin// gu ru'i bu dang de la ba// 'khor lo 'khor ba ma ma 'tha' ste/
yang na g.yo ban shul// lha rdzas mi yi gtam brjodudam// nyi bu tshalag shwa ku la 'am// de bzhin gzhu stong bdog ma// 'on tam gnas srung ngol 'am// 'khor lo 'khor ba
gzhan dag la'ang// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med gtam// 'dushes med gnas pa la 'am// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnamashas sam// 'on te cung zad mad pa dag/ thub can
rang sangs rgyas dag la'am// nyan thos rgyal ba'i sras la 'am// sangs rgyas s la zhugs yaM// rgya'adapang rnams la gtam 'di 'am// 'di ci lha man lhasras sam// 'on te
skar ma'i de bzhin num// ji ltar gyur pa khyod kyis gsungs/ bdag cag slob ma phyogasasutan// du ma'i tshig ni thos nas kyang// rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad dag/ ban tshun
shin tu dpyod par byed/ du yi ting 'dzin 'gro seng rnams// rgyal ba'i sras rnams tshig thos pa// gtsug tor can las mngon du ste// slob mar bcas par nyan 'dod pa/ gtsang
gnas bdag po nyid kyang yin// thar zla blo gros mi zad dang// nam mkha'i dbang po 'gro ba 'dzin// mthu chen spyan rasag zigs dbang dang// rnal 'byor shes pa gzungs kyi dbang//
lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor dbang// gtsug nan chen blo gros shing// lag na rdo rje ni ba'i blo// 'ga'an chen blo chen dang// 'di dag rgyal sras gzhan dag kyang// bya ba'i zhing rnams kun
@#// nas 'os// rdo rje snying po blo can la// de dag kun gyis rnam bltas nas// pad+mo'i stan la 'khod nga 'i rnams// rgyal ba'i dus la gsol ba 'debs// blo
chen rab tu bshad par gyis// rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun par 'dod// 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs tshul// da ltar byung ba'i gang+gatshig kyang/ rgyu dang dad pa yis rab gsal bar// khyed kyi
zhal nas byung ba'i rnams// gdon mi za ba'i tshig 'di yang// khyod kyis rgyal ba de nal nas// thams cad ma lus blos pa ste// skyon med deng zhin gshegs nga 'i mkhyas/ tang
'dzin dbang sgyur rgyal po yis// thams cad blo gros rnam bltas nas// rdo rje snying po 'jigs med kyis// rnal 'byor can la tshig sa pa// rgyal ba'i gsung rab ma lus par/
a bar sus kyi nus pa mad// de yi byin rlabs mgatogs pa// sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras kyi// sangs rgyas kun l phyag 'tshal te// sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs
pa dag/ nor bu rin chen sna tshogs khang// dbang sgyur gnas babrad 'khod rnams la'ang// yang shas dad pas smra bar bya// sangs rgyas rigs byed tshul yin te/ nga las 'di dag
thams cad nyon// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes dag/ rgyal po rnams lag tama'adi min// mi bdag mchog rnams 'das pa la'ang// 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs kyi gtam// sdug
dkyil phun sum tshog sa rnams kyi// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sun sumatshogs// de bzhin gshegs pa ma shes phra// rtog med rtog pa sbyangs pa de//
sa so rang rig mkhas pa'i yul/ brjod pa dang ni rnam par bral// ngani smra bar dad pa med// bdag gis nga yi mthu thos pa// lha rdzas kyi ni pa shes dang// ting nge 'dzin gyi ma tog
gas[;]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa ni// phyug po'i dkyil du mnyam bzhag bas// thams cad phyogs lasa rnam grol zhing/ yod dang med pa'i phyogs sbyangs pa// yod
dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral// dngun Di lam ni dag ste// gzhan du 'gyur ba'i lha sras tshul// sangs rgyas 'jug par byed// dbu ma'i 'a ma po de nyid kyang// mtha' bzhi
rnam par sbyangs pa ste// rnam par rtog med dam gsamadapa/cug na gnas pa e ta mthong// thub can de nyid lam shes pa// bdag mad ye shesamakhas rnams kyis// bla ma'i
tshig 'di thos pa dang// rnal 'byor can n sa thams cad kyang// rkang pa gnyis mnyam btud nas// rdo rje zhus la smras pa ni// rnal 'byor can rnams nyan par brtson// skom pa
rnams nichu tsholabazhin// khyod kyi zhal nas btung 'dor// tshig gi sbrang rtsi bung ba bzhin/ ma 'byor dbang po yang dag gsungs// rgyal ba'i sras rnams shin tu nyon// rnal 'byor can
u@#// rnams rnal 'byor bo/ la shes dbang po 'phrul can rnams// zhing gi bdag po rgyal po rnams// rnal 'byor laman rtag byed pa// bde gshegs bka' ni nyan pa
ra khyod kyi zhal nas rnam byung ga/ rnam pa sna tshogs dka' ba'i sgra// khong du chudabyed mtshan bzung dang// tshangs pa'i yang dag gshags pa dang// dbang po'i don grags khyad
par du'o// sna tshogs thub pa de yi gsung/ sgra yi dor mkhas ba yi// de phyir bdag ni smra'am mos// brtag bya rtog pa rnam par sbyangs// bar snang ri mo ji bzhin dang//
grib ma sdong 'a sogs pa sbyangs// dusu snang na rmad du rung// de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i bka'// mkha' la bya rdzas jibazhin du// blta bar shin tu dkonang in// de
bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i bka'// de ni bsten par mi nus so// sa rnams gsum du mkhas pa yis// dpeyis kun tu rab bstan gyi// dpe dang bra ba'i de bzhin nyid// thub
pa'i zhal nas rnam par 'byung// de yi tshig la dpa mad de// rmi lam lta bur bdag la snang// rang ribamagal babaskor pa dang// sku yi tshogs dang de bzhin 'du/ ji ltar sgyu ma'i
grong khyer dang// rlung ni shin tu blta dka' dang// sgyu masmig rgyu 'dra ba ste// rnam rtog gnyis po rab tu spangs// 'on tam rnal 'byor sna tshogs pa// thub pa'i gsung ni de bzhin te//
bdag gis rnal 'byor can dbus su/ khashad par de phyir dad pa mad// 'di dag thum par mkhas ba lta// de bzhinanyid blo shas pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam yas
pa rtar phyir sgra bar dad ba med// 'on kyang brjod de thub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// de ring bdag las nyon cig rgyal srasa rnams// sna tshogs tshig gi don ldan thub pa'i bka'// dang med
sams dang yid 'asa rnam bar 'das/// dziltar bung bsam rtog re 'thus shing// lhag ma gzhan dag 'thung bar byed pa bzhin// snying khu thub pa'i mchog rnams kyis 'thung ti// de yi
'thungs lhag bdag gisade'ang bshad// de'i yid dang tshigags kyang// bstan par nus pa ma lan la// lha yi lha yi yul yin te// mkhasa rnams dag pa 'bal bar byed// mi yi gzug
su byas nas su// sangs rgyas zhus ni mtshan ldan pa// rtsed pan can dang gzhan la snang// gzhalamad khang gnas gzhan la yang// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang// mtshan bzang
rnam pa snatshogs su// sa lasna tshogs snang ba ni// mur 'dug 'dus pa'i dregs pas sol// dusa rnams bzhi po thams cad du// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus dus la// stag na bzhug
pas dus sprul te// rnam par bya ba rab tu mdzad// bzang dus de bzhin gsum pa dang// gnyis kyi 'olo dus ngan dang// de dag tu yang cad gos pa// sa la lus can rnams kyi ste//
ldan pa de dag thams cad mdzad// stug po'i dkyil na bzhugs shing ste// phyug po de ni dri med gnas// sbyor chen rnams kyi bde ba'i gzhi// ngan dang gnyis/
kyi pa phel mtshams// thub pa gabrugs ninam bzung nas// dri mad stug na rnal 'byor ldan// zla ba bzhi du 'gro la snang// sna tshogs 'gro ba gang shes kyis// sna tshogs gzug
su mdzad pa ni// gang la gang snang gang gis kyang// ji ltar gang la de bdo ba// de dag de la thams cad du// de phyir ma yasi mig la gnas// shes can yul can thub pa ni// rnal 'byor
mkhyenang ngashas pas snang// dbang po gzugs gzhan dag dang// 'jug 'dod kyi dang de bzhin gzhan// sar skya yi yang gzugs su ste// thub pa la lar mkha' bzhugs pa//
shes byed shes la yang dag snang// sa nad sa da da na la// sa nad gzhon nu med dag dang// sgra gcan mi ci tum pu ru/ igapa ga dang zla ba'i rigs// thams cad sa yi
rgyal re la// thams cad ser yang mchod pa ste// sku ni susu ci 'dod bzhin// la la mur 'dug spyod snul te// ston pa/ 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong// tshulakyis gtsug lag
kyi ston par yang// da pazhin 'gas par rab ston cing// rdo rje dadul dang gsor dag dang// zangs dang lcags kyi 'byung lung dang// ro nya zha nyi mu tig dang// pad+ma nA ga dang anan+tal//
ba cha chu dang shi' dag dang/ (asma garab mus ra// tshul dang brtag pa thams cad ldan// mkhan po bla masun 'gro dang// gangagis lus can susu jir// sal khad pa skye ba bzhi
de la do bdu thams cad du// thub pa'i rnal 'byor rab las byung/ lha yi bu mos mi bskyod de// de bzhin dri za'i bud med kyis// 'dod khams dbang ba'i khud med dang// de bzhin
klu yi bud med kyis// mi chilha min bumo dang// gnod spyin bu mos de bzhin no// dan 'dod nga 'i yul las rgyal// gzugs can rnams kyis yul de bzhin// nam mkha'
rnam shes mtha' yas nga// cung zad med pa'i ng de bzhin te// 'dunas yod min ma yin gyi// gnas na rnam parmos rad// kun tu la sogs 'di dag lam/ rnal
'byor can gyi 'ching ba'i dngos// ma ni mi dge gzhan dag kyang// srog chags rnams kyi sa yod pa// lus can rnams kyi lus kyi tshul// stag nags la stag na med//
zhing dodimad bsod nams te// stug po steng ngo shin tu mdzes// de bzhin thar pa thungashes la// zhing gi nang na zhing gi mchog/ sangasargyus rnams kyi zhing rab ste// skya ga po de ni yun
du brtag/ mnga'o rnams bcu po de dag dang// stobs dang mngon mkhyen ting nge 'dzin// yid kyi rgyu las byung pa'i skus// sangs rgyas deni rnam par mdzes// sa rnams Mbcu po kun
bsgoms te// rnam thar bdenang stong pa nyid// mtshan madasmon pa med pa dang// pha rol phyin drug de bzhin te// bsgom dang sbyin dang tshul khrims dang//
shes rab rnams kyis de sku 'thob// yan lag kha/zugs kun ma tog gi/ 'dus ma byas pas nags rgyas sku'o// rtog med rtog dang bral ba ste// bdag mad yid dang dbang po rnam/
zla shes rab dbang po sgor ldan zhing// mtshan gyis kun nas shin tu bsags// sbyin drar tshul khrims la sogs kyis// dkar po'ilas rnams byas pas na// sangs rgyas sku
yi gnas kyi mchog/ stug pa'i ris su 'thob bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshags pa'i lha rdzas gnas// nyi zla rnam par spangasapa ste/ rgyu skar skar phran snang ba dang// zla ba
dus dang ltad mo med// rnal 'byor can gyi 'od 'cham dang// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od kyis kyang// kun nas bzang po'i stug po de// nyi ma bzhin du kun nas snang/ dusakyi bri ba de
namad// nad rnams gang yang yod pa min// 'chin mad nga 'i gnas yin te// stug po de nizhing ga mchog/ thams cad gzugs ldan zhi ba'i gnas// dri mad mthong ba'i tshog
can gyi// sas rgyas zhing sdug bsod rnams te// lha rnams kun gyis na par bya// rnal 'byor can rnams khyad par du// sa dang sa la gnas pa dag/ sems can rang bzhin
dngos po rnams// gang phyir rab tu bstan pas na// yid dang sems dad kun gzhi'i tshul// rang bzhin gsum po de bzhin te// chos la bdag med rang bzhin can// gnas ni gzhan
du 'gyur bsta/ lus ni shin tugazhan gyur pas/ thub ba rnams ni de 'dod sta/ rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog/ stug po'i zhing rab dam rar ro// phyug por 'jug pa
zhes bya bas le'u gsum pa'o// lus ni rdzas dgu'i rang bzhin can// 'dus byas rdul phran tshogs yin te// yon tan tshogs kyis rnam sna tshogs/ 'byungad
'byunga gnas tshogs yin te/ khu chu khrag las kun byung ba// sngon med rnam par 'phal ba ste// stong gzugs 'og tu 'gro ba yin// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor thog ma med//
las kyi rnam pa brgyas kyang g.yogs// dug gi shing gi sa bzhin du// dpa' dang rdul gyis da bzhin du// mun bas kyang ni gsos pa ste/ lam rgyud dog par shin tu 'phyan// dus
kyis bskul cing rab tu skyo// yon tan las kyis gda' ba ni// phyugs dang mi yi mngal skyes pas// klu dang yi dgas sha za dang// 'bar ba lha yi nang du yang// skye 'am lha min
'jig rten nam// sngags 'a nga rags su de bzhin te// 'on tamo rnal 'byor can dbus su// bsam gtan zhig cing mngon skya ba// 'khor ba 'khor rigs dam par yang// bar/
bar du ni skyo bar 'gyur// skyes nas rig pa 'dzin pa ni// gang tshadabang po 'phel ba na// su yi gang gis gang las// lhan cig skyes pa rarang byung zhing// lhan
cig skyes pa'i las tshul gyis// lam dang lam du rab tu 'jug/ brtag mad rtog dang bral ba yi// gang tshe chos ni mngon rtogs na// thar pa rnams kyi thar gsum ste// yi ga yi ge/
med byas pa'i// 'byung ba thams cad rgyu yi tshogs// de ni 'od snang mchog yin/ yang dag spyanas blor sbyangs pa// stug po'i dkyil na rnam par gnas// bya ba'i zhing dang
mnyam lus kyis// sbrul pas khyab par byas shing gnas// da lta ni shes yod na ni// dog pa'i lam nas grol bar 'gyur// de lta'i skyasab skyes ni// khyab par shes zhes
rnam par spyod/ lha yi lhal lang dag gsungs// rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun byus shing// mngal gyi skyo bar 'byung ba ni// byas pa yin no mi rnams kyi// ma rig srad dang las
spyas min// nyon mongs las 'a sa shin tu byung// mtshan ma medasu mngon gyur cing// mtshan ma med las rab 'das te// yi gamad pa de byung nas// spros pathams cad rab bral
nang / stug po'i dkyil du rab tu 'gro// dmigs la sasams zhig 'gyur ba ni// rnal 'byor can gyi sgrarmongs ngar// rtse mo la sogs lha rdzas dang// mtho ris bud mad snyan/
rmongs kyis// gang tshe thub can m 'dug pa// de tshasams ni 'byung ba sta// lam 'as bskyad rtsas bya ba yi// ting 'dzin 'dod pa'i khams smyos pa// gzugs dang gzugs
mad 'gro ba na/ ting nge 'dzin ni rab tu skyo// sems can 'du shes med seng na/ ting nge 'dzin las bral bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas kyi// ting nge 'dzin la
dbang byed 'gyur// rgyal pa gang tshe thub dbad rgyur// gnyis dang bral bas byang ba yi// sems ni mngon par mi 'byung ngo// de bden de ni rnal 'byor te// bsam gtanang yi sa
bsam gtan yin// bsam gtan rtag tu bsam gtan bya// da sa stug dkyil 'donana'o// mngalagyi skya ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste la'u bzhi ba'o// kA rnam brgyad rnam
pa dgu yi sams// marig la jig rten rgyu yin te// 'di ni sems dang sems byung ma shu// gang gnas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o// de yi mthu yis 'jug pa ni// rnam shes rnams dang dbang
po rnams// ma ga la sogs rnam pa 'di// rtsa ba'i sams ni brtan gnas ba// yan lag bcu gnyis thams cad dang// 'bung ba rnams dang 'byunga gnas dang// yul dad dang nga po 'jig rten dang//
skad cig 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no// thub pa bltame lhas gsungs pa// rgyu dang 'bras bu spangs pas// tshangs pa'i 'jigatsun mthar thug gi 'gro ba dbang po bcas pa 'di// 'jig rten brtsal/
bsam sbyadad// bdag nyid rdza ma bzhin 'jig pa// nad dang phyi dag rtag par te// 'gro ba gnas dang g.yo ba dag/ lha yi lha yi yul yin te// sa la sus
kyang mi mthong ba// mur 'dug gugs pa gzhan dag ste// thub grags mtshan macan gyis so// pan tshunabacis pas bcings pa// srid pa sna tshogs rnam pas te// rnam shes/
myur du 'gro bas na// sems kyi rnam pa mi rtogs so// la stengamatha' na thug pa yi// mchod sbyin rnams kyis tshangs pa'i thabs// thob nas slad du ldog pani// sa ma ya ru rigs
sems pa// 'dod sbyor bkrag srog 'bras bu dang// gang yang zla ba'i 'bras bu dang// mar gzhug pa yi 'bras bu dang// gang gnanamanod sbyin 'bras bu dag/ phyugs bcings pa yi
'bras bu yang// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas ldog ge/ mosagrasum can gyi 'gro ba dag/ canyis mi rigi thor tshugs can// yon tan gsum gyi 'bru 'brel ba// chu skyes bzhin du snying po med/
'di yis thar pa mi rnyed pa/ skyug po de bzhin gshags pa'i gnas// da ni rnal 'byor gyis thob ste// phyug po rna' 'bu rig pa'i gnas// de bas tshud cig tshangs ba'i bdag/
rnala'abyer can rnams 'jug brtson par// 'di la bdag gnyen gang dag kyang// skye zhing 'chib yong med// mi chodagazhig tu med pa ni// lus can kun gyi rnam par shes// bag
tsa chags kyis ni ma gos pa// sngon med dus nas byung bas so// yang kyi gnas ngan lenabasags pa// smras pas kyang ngo ma mi 'dug/ ji ltar lha rdzas chu skyes dang// nam mkha'
la yang phyag dar dang// sbyin gyi dri mas nye zla la// de bzhin mi gos rnal 'byor can// mngal rab tu brtson par gyis// khamasacad sangs rgyas byin gyis brlab// rnal 'byor bde
gshegs lha yi rdzas// rnal 'byor can gyi tshul skyod pa// tshul khrims can gyi tshul 'thungs te/ yoshes can gyis shes 'thungs shing// mchog gis [ï¸½]shes 'thungs nas kyang/
'khor ba sa ni 'da' bar gyis// 'di la khams rnams gang yang med// phung po lnga dang rnam shasakyang// ming dang gzugs dag sgyur byas shing// lus can rnams kyi yid kyang
sbya dziltar ma ni shing dbang gis// 'bar te 'ba' thar rtog pa med// dbazhin phung po shing rta stong// ci phyi rnal 'bya'ajug mi bya// ri dgas sred dang dri ba yi// gnas dang
sgra tshogs snang ba ru// ridags byas ba lasogs mthong// yang dag ma yin baltasabasladangs// derazhin yul las byung ba'i sems// khab leng lta bur 'khor ba ste// gang yang
'di la dngos med pa// 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba yi// g.yo ba drob gshags par// bus pa rnams ni rtag tu rtog 'byung ba sems kyi tshogs las ni// ci phyir rnala'abyor 'jug
mi bya// ji tsam zhig lus yod dang// jitsamaduni blo 'byung ba// de bar rnal 'byor yishas la// ma bsha' bsam gtan rab tu gyis// thams cad sgyu ma
rmi lam ltar// 'byung ba gsum kun rab tu ltos// smig rgyu chu zla lta bu ni/ ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya// ji bzhin dri za'i grong khyer na// 'gro ba spyod pa rnam par snang/ de
bzhin lus la phung bo'i spyod// jiltar na'a'abyob 'jug mi bya// rmi lam dag na 'gro ba'i tshogs// ji ltar milam rmibs mthong// de bzhin phung ngo bo gnas yin na/ ci phyi
rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya// sa 'di sa la sogs pa'i tshogs/ 'dus pa rdul gyi phung pa yin// 'di sams soms byung tshogs yin ng ra// rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun ltos shig/
'byung ba chen po bzhi po nas// phan tshul kun nas 'dus pa ste// gdag nga la sogs ldan pa yin// ci phyir rnal[Ã©]byor 'jug mi bya/ 'di nirlunganang mkhrisang sa mos// robs su
lta bur gnas bsdu/ byed pa gang yang yodam yin// ci phyi'i rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya// dgu ba'i gong bu lta bu kun// 'gro ba gnas shing g.yo ba rnams// smig rgyu 'dra ba'i 'du shes
su rdordza la sogs pa shing du rtogs// tshor bachu bur lta bu ste// bde dang mi bder rtog pa yin// chu shing 'dra ba'i 'du byed rnams// zhigs pa rgyugs pa snying po med// rnam pa shis
[e] ]pa sgyu ma 'dra// de yi dngos gnas pa med// rtsa shing gnas ji bzhin te// rtse phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya// 'di ni rmi lam rnamamyos 'di// 'di ni sgyu ma byis pa 'dris// 'di dag
thams cad smig rgyu ste// de bzhin dri za'i grong khyer ro// gang rgyan 'di dag snang ba yi// khams gsum 'gro dang mi 'gro ba// 'di kun blo yas rtogs bya ba// 'jigs med rgyal ba'i
sras rnams kyi// nyes pa'i rgyun rtsa dad bcas// yi shes me yis rab bsregs na// lha rdzas bde ba yod pa ra 'gro// rnal 'byor can gnas stug por yang// 'jigs med 'di ni
mtshan ma med// mtshan ma brtsis pa'i ngo bo can// mtshan ma med pa rtag tu bde// mtshan ma mas kyi spyod yul la// sams kyi spyod yul bden pa yin// bden pa blo gros
spyod yul te// sems ni shes rab spyod yul te// mtshan mar gnas pa med pa'o// kye ma mtshan ma 'di kun yin// gnas gsum tshangs pa' grags pa ste// mtshan ma ming dang
yul rnams dang// sgra la sogs pakun brjod pa'o// dbang po kun gyi yul rnams ni// lus can rnams kyi 'ching ku'i rgyu// bcing bar bya dang bcings dang rgyu// gang 'grol gang gis
'grol ba dang// thar dang thar pa'i bde ba dang// mthong ba'i tshes la gnas pa dang// bdag med pa rushes nyid kyang// 'dod chags bcom par gyur pa na'o da nas mi bdag rin chen
'gatsug/ blo man byang chub sems dang 'a yis// rnal 'byor can kun dbang las// rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med lu// bya ba'i zhing rnams thams
cad dag/ rgyal sras khyod na brtsonapa ste// rgyal ba rnams la khyod tshadad// rnal 'byor can la nye bar ge nas// rnal 'byor ba rtsom gcad pa ste// dang rnams grub par bya ba'i
phyir/ brtag bya yan lag thams cad dag/ lus can rnams kyi lus skyes pa// tshul ni sgra yis brjod par mdzad// tshig tu brjod pa ra cir mi bgyi// gnas dang zung gisa rnam
par mdzod// mi zin nga yi rgyu rnams dang// bgab zungs nor gyis gzhom par gyis// phung po'i rgyu rnams bsal bar mdzod// yang dag 'gyur ba med pa dang// dag pa yis
tshe kyang mkhas pas sa/ ring po thogs thorapa thob// phung po'i rgyu rnams bsags nas su// chos min sa kyis tsho 'byung ste// 'di dang gzhan du'ang 'thob par gyur// shes
pas sdug bsngal rnams las 'grol// srid pa yis nA rtag tu btsangs// mi shi' las dang srad pa yis// lus can rgyu mngashin tu byas// gzugs dang snang ba yid
byed dad/ rnam shes yul la mngon gyurangs// myur phyir khong du ma chud pa// spyod yul du ni sems rgyu ba'i/ yad sngon 'gro ba chos rnams te// lus can kun gyi de bzhin no// yate
khab 'gro yod ni gces pa dag// yid du 'ong bas cir rma bshad// gang dang gang gis rdzas kyis su// mi rnam/stug por 'grub pa yi// des ni de yis dngos 'gyur ba/ sna tshog gzugs/
kyi nor bu bzhin// ji ltar nor bu sogs gzugs// tshon dang 'byor na rnam par mdzes// rnal 'byor can dbus khyod de bzhin// de bzhin gshegs gzugs sna tshogs kyi// dbang
sgyur pho brang dag ban// thams cad dag na snang ba na// rgyal ba'i sras kyi mdun du byas/ mya ngan 'da' dang mya ngan 'das// stug po mthar mchog pa shes te// chos kyi dbyangs dang rdza
'phrul yang// skyug de rnal 'byor can gyi gnas// da ni mtshon gyis mi chod de// da ni mis kyang mi tshig pa// mi chod pa dang mi phyadang// da ni yun ba gnas rtag pa'o// de ni chusaM
kyang mi gsher ro// rlung gis kyang ni mi skam mo// de ni rdza ltar 'jig pa dang// nan tan bya rjes byung baming// rtag pa brtan pa mi 'jig pa// skya can kun gyi rnam pa nas// rgyu yas
sun 'byung ma yin pa// 'dradang mi 'dra rnams kyis te/ dam bcas yan lag rnams kyi yang// mtha'am phyug pamed par 'gyur// dam bcas rab ye dam bca' dang/ rgyu yi khyad
par rgya dgo ste// de bas de largal du med// rtog pa can gyi spyod yul min// rnam bshas nga gzhan gyur na// de ni stug po spangs pa'o// rtogs can rnams kyi yulam yin// de bzhin
gshegs pa'i pho brang stag/ ma skyes sngon dang mtha' ma med// lhun gyis grub pa'i stobs bsubyung// rgyu med pa dang las skyes min// dbang po tshan pos byas
pa'i ng min// gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pa las// yang dag 'das te gnas pa yin// 'dod pa'i khams las 'das nas su// gzugs dang gzugs med 'dushas med//
myur ba'i rgyu 'dus rab 'das nas// sdug nga 'a zhing ri rnan bar mdzes// phyogs 'di mkha' las grub pa ste// rgyun rnams kyi spyod yul min/ yod dang med ra 'i phyogs dang bral//
kha gcig dad gzhan pa spangs pa'o// gnyis pa dang ni rang bzhin min// 'dod la dang lad dbang bo min// khyu mchog gi yang phyogs ma yim/ de bzhin rig can gsum gyi yang//
rdul gyi rkyen las byung yin// sgra rnams kyis kyang brjod du med/ ngo bo nyid kyis bskyad pa min// 'dod rgyal gyis kyang mi rnyed de// marig las rang srid pas min// mingashas las
kyang smos pa min// khur khyer khur gyi yul yin te// 'ad+d+hini sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul// lha rdzas de bzhin gshags kyis mkhyen// sa bcu dgachu rnam par sbyangs// rnal 'byor gyi ni sna
tshogs lul// den gyi dam pa ston pa'o// las cilasam gang zhes te/ byas pa rnams na misabar gyur/ las dang bsamina bshad pa na// rnal 'byor can rnams bden gyur pa//
[e/ ]sna tshogs snang bar rang ni mas te// lus can rnams kyi bdag nyer gnyis// phyi dang nang dang thams cad du// gzung dang 'dzin pa lta bur gnas// soms sasams ni mthong yin lang//
khong du mi rgyud byis pa rnams/// gnyis samang de lus can gyi// yin yang shes par ma gyur pa// bdag gi byed pa'i ng de bzhin byed// yul lta bur yang rab tu snang// rdza ma la
sogs gzugs su gnas// rdza 'dasogs pa'i ng yod pa min// 'di yi den la thub pa dag/ rnal 'byor nyam chung rnam par myos// rnal 'bye'i di yang mi rtag pa// bdag gi ma
rtog la ma gnas pas// sams 'di gnyis ka'i bdag nyid de// ma lang zla babazhin du gnas// ji ltar rab 'ba' ba can// skra tshogs ltosangacig ltos shig kya// phan tshun dag
tu ston mod kyi// bdag nyes dbang po zhan phyung gi/ 'din gung yang sgra tshogs med// rgyun dang nor bu dag kyang ngo// yod dang med pa'i dngos po ltar// dbang ngo ri nyas pas mthong
ba yin/ de bzhin rtog can dbang gas 'di// bdag gi blo ni ji ltar gnas// tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas thub par// rtogs pamadang/sa rab tu 'dzin// gang 'di mang po snang ba
dag sna tshogs tshangs la sogs pa'i mtshan// sna tshogs thams cad bdag gi sems// rdza lasogs nga 'i yon tanam tshan// nang du gyur pa'i gzugs rnams dad// mtho ris
gnas pa'i gnas rnams dang// gang gi phyi nang bya ba rnams// thamasacad sems las byung ba'o// rgyan stug rnal 'byor gang yin pa// de ni ga dud na yod pa
min/ /rnal 'byor can gyi bsod nams kyis// zhugs r 'di 'baslabang gyis// dbadasmyur lha rdzasag nas dag dang// yang na gzugs can rnams gnas dang// 'a shos mdu ba'i
gnas su 'am/ 'ogam yin ra'ab gnas su yang// cung zad med dang rnam shes dang// 'odushes yodapa ma yin dang// sna tshogs kyi ni gnas dag tu// 'dod chags kyi ni
phyogs bshig na// khyod na myur du bda' gnas dang// phyug po rnal 'byor can gnas su// rgyal ba'i sras kyi mdun dus te// stug po dang ni 'gro bar gyis// rnal 'byor de 'a/
sbyar par gyis// bdag gi gnyen gyis ci zhig bya// dradag gi gnyenani rtag tu 'ching// 'khor ba'i lam rgyud rgyu yang ni// dbang po rnams ni gso ba ste// bud med rnams 'byo
'khrul pas// khu chu khrag nam mi zhimang 'i// 'ji bar srin bu skyes gyur dra/// dgu 'am bcu zhig pa dang yong// khu nu smin nas mngon par skya/ dbang po rnams kyis
kun yog pa// srin bu g.yo ba ji bzhin te// rim pa de yi tshulagyi na/ ji srid sems can gnas bar du'o// lus can rnams kyi rgyu la ltos// tsha tshan de dag byung ba ste// wa
dar ma ni stong dag dang/ bu dang chung ma brgya dag kyang// thams cad gnas su rnyed pa ni// lus can spyi la gnas pa'o// rmi lam dag na bu med pa'i// mo gsham khu 'byung ji bzhin du//
bu red nga mi dga' ba dang// rmi lam mi tshe de nyid ldan// de ni shar gyur de nas de// rmi lam shes nas sad pa dang// rmi lam gyi ni bu sha tshad// gang lang skye ba yodad min// chu
bo ra ba tshal bu dang// grong khyer dag dang ni rnams dang// grong dang tshong dus phyugs las dang// dka' thub tshal du'i gnas rnams dang// 'gro ba dag gis rgyas pa'i yul// zhi
dang ba glang lug gis gang// 'jig rten gyi ni 'dod spyod kyang// de dang 'di dang gzhan du'ang snang// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dir rgyug pa// rmi lam rgyug nga 'i de bzhin te// gdeg
dad paskum la sogs pa yang// de dang 'dir yang snang ba yin// mkhas pas rmi lam gang mthong ba// skye ba med cing 'chi med pa// slar sad nas su sems pa ni/ dbu me
mkhas pa dag yin no// ji ltar 'i dang de'u rnams kyi// grib ma kun tu snang ba bzhin// de ltar 'jig rten rmi lam yang// mkhas pa rnams ni de bzhin bsam// ji ltar sa/
dul ba zhig/ bud med lhan cig rtse dga' rmi/ sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang// lharab btsun ma mnyam pa dang// gzhan yang snatshogs des ngos te// sad nas rnam babasems
pa ni// ci zhig bden namarmi lam yin// rmi lam budamed lhan cig tu// rtsis nas phyi ni bdag gad de// 'di brdzun gyis pa smyugayin// de bzhin bdag gi/
gnyanang kun// rgyal srid stobs kyang de bzhin no// dmag pa gyos rer bu dag dang// ma dad du nu ba dag kyang// rmi lam lta bur zhig bya sa// rnal 'bar sbyar ba'acer mi bya// dka'
thub tshal dang zhing rnams dang// ri dang ri yisman gshong dang// 'om 'byung dang mAl ya// lhun po byon 'da'i dbang chen dang// gangs kyi ri dang ka yi las// chana' bdag la gad
gnas dang// 'dzam bu 'basabu'i khu ba dang// gang dag bdud rtsa bra ba dang// phun u0fa3ma bam par ya tu// ko bo der na gang 'khod dang/ ri rab nang na gang gnas dang// dpag
bsam shing la gang gnas dang// rang rgyal rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang// nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang// thams cad kyi ni rnal 'byor 'di// gang 'byung 'byung ba rnams kyi
skya/ pad+mo'i gnas su brtan bcas te// skyil mo krung dumanyam gzhag cing// rtag tu rnala'abyor sbyabar gyis// 'dodadang bde las rnam par dben// dbang po dbang ba'i don
gyi rnams// thams cad las kyang ru'i bzlog cing// lcags kyus glang po ji bzhin du// sems ni mnyam ra ra gzhag par gyis// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das bsam gtan/
gang yang de bzhin gshags pa'i dag/ 'dod dang dga' ba dbyen la sogs// yang na thams cad bsgrags pa dang// khyad par du yang gzugs med dang// 'du shes med pa'i
bsam gtan rnams// nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang// 'du shes yod min mad min rnams// nyim dang ni zla ba'i dbyibs// pablodang ni'od 'dra zhing// nam
mkha'a'i me med 'dra bar// rnal 'byor zhugs pas rab tu mthong// 'di dag thams cad spangasanas su// snang bar byed bar rab tu gnas// gang tshamtshan med rnal 'byor can//
rnam nga ram rtog chags mdan// sangs rgyas bye ba rnams kyang mthong// zhing dang zhing na mnyam gzhag nga// de dag phyag gis dbang bskur bar// de yi spyi bo'i dbang bskur te//
sangs rgyas sa la bzhugs pa dang// sna tshogs gzugs ni rab tu 'byung// sna tshogs tshul gyi dngos thob nas// kun mkhyen thams cad rig par 'gyur/ stobs dang madrin shas
dbud mad 'theb// gzungs dang thams cad ting nge 'dzin// thams cad kyi ni 'byung gnas 'gyur// thub pa rnal 'byor bskyod pa yang// gzugs ni rdul du rnam gzhigAshing//
mchog rdul yan chad nyid dang na phyi// yod las med par 'gyur ba ste// bong bus ba glang rwa mthong zhing// cha shas med phyir ma shes can// phung po las ni phung can med// de bas ]
las kyi 'bras gyur pa// 'di ni skyama'i bus byas bzhin// 'di na 'a samad 'bras bu med/ las kyi smra ba pa'i ng yod pa min// 'jig tshor byed pas ma byas
byed pa byed pa ma yin no// da la byed pa yodan ni/ 'di rnams thug pa ma da ngar 'gyur// thug med byas pa'i nyes pa yis// thub padrimacan du 'gyur/ da lta lam rgyud sba
tshogs rnams/ chu dang nam mkha'as gnas pa'i// lus can lus la kun gnas te// skyo ba bzang po gnas su ste// ris su 'gro ba yod pas na// ji ltar 'dod par lus
can 'gro/ dbang po sa sa rgya ba yang// ji ltar 'dod par lta la 'dzin te// 'di ni rnam rtog rnam gyur pa// 'o mar ji ltar 'o ma las// de bzhin spyi dang gnas dang 'jig/ las/
kyis byas par 'gyur sams na// rmi lam dridzra sgyu ma sprin// brag cha dang ni glog 'dra ba// smig rgyu ri dgas srid pa ltar/ dngos po rnam bsgoms rnal 'byar can// thog ma med nas
bsags pa yi// mi yi rnam spros bag chags kyis//snatshog gnas ngan yin pa dang//smatshog rtog pas lasasu brtag/dbang po sgyu ma lta bu yin/khul rnams rmi lam 'drab sta//byed dang las dang bya ba
yang / /rnal 'byor sgrub pas mo rtag go/ rtog pa nyams pa'i rtogo pa can// rnamamyosangashas ra nyamachung bas/ khyed nga ra rab tu rtogs pa ni// bya bas 'gro ba byas par te// 'jig
kha rtanagaces pas byas la// rdul gyi rgya las byung bang mi// rgyu med pas kyang byas ma yin// ngo bo nyid kyis phyung ba'ang min// rdo rje lcags dang khab leng dang// rin na 'phrang ba
rgyan rnams kyi/ ji lta bu yi las shig byas/ nor bu gsar du ming btags pas// bya dang ri dgas khra bo dang// tsher ma rnams kyis sne dngos dang// 'gro ba sna tshogs ngo mtshar ba//
rnam rtog las las ma skyasaso// las cig gang las ma yin zhes// rtog can bdan lamos pa ni// bden nga 'i dngos por mdishas ba// 'di ni rnam rtog 'as min du// 'o ma'i
nang na yod pa'i dug/ rjes su ma bde rnam par 'gyur// rnam par rtog pa'i ng thams cad du// de bzhin dngos po rnams la 'jug/ dngos po skye ba ma yin te// dngos po rnam par
'jig pa'i ngamad// rnam rtag sna tshogs de dag ni// rtog pa can gyis mi rig go/ 'gro ba'i ris kyi dngos po dag/ rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par gzhig/ sbyar zhing rnal 'byor de la zhugs//
las dang 'a sa min ma sems par// ris su 'groba'i dngos pa yis// zla banyi ma rnamamadzes pa// rlung gis shin tu bskyong nas su/ mkha' 'a rten pa mang por 'gro// shin tu phra zhingashes
dka'i 'as// stug por gnas pas rab tu mthong// las de ci zhig yod par 'gyur// zhugs brtson rnal 'byor can dag la// ji ltar ma ni shing gi ri// thal bar byed pa skad cig tu//
rnal 'byor can gyi thams cad las// yoshas mas 'tshig skad cig tu// las dang bag chags lhan cig tu// mang po'i dusanas bsagasar dag/ rnal 'byo
yeshes bgachags kyis// thams cad zhig byed skad cig tu// ji ltar sgronAms mun pa'i tshogs// skad rtsig tu ni bsal byed pa/ shes sgronams rtsub pa de/ mi shes rnam
pangasal bar bya// rgyan stug po theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ bdag gi lasakyi bya ba skyed pa zhes bya ste le'u lnga pa'o//bam bo gsum po//
'jim pa rnam+meg thag pa 'a sa// ji ltar gnas pa'i khyim gyi rnams// phan tshun kun nas 'dus 'byor cing// sa yi dbus na snang ba ni/ 'di la yang khyim mang de// rdzas dad
dareg la rnam brtags na// rdzas kyi rnam pa 'dus pa la// khyim zhes gdagasangashing brjod pa ste// sor mo ban tshun kun 'dus na// jiltar lag pa'i phug na du// 'a ga pa/
rgyu gnyis ni bsdus la 'gyur// tha dad pa las mi 'byung ngo// g.yul dang shing rta bsnyams bral khang// grong khyer nags tshal da bzhin te// ri dang sprin dang dba' rlabs kyang// brag cha
glog dang 'dra ba'o// smig rgyu chu zla rgyu 'dra ba/ snom bu rdza sogs grags pa ste// mkha' la dngos po thams cad kyang// rmi lam 'dra bar kun tu snang// da bzhin rnam pa sna
ba[4/]tshogs pa// byis pa'i lam rgyud dag pa na// khams kyis ri bzhin gyur pa ste// khyim ltar rtag tu mi brtan la// 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med// bdag las ma yin gzhan/
las min// rtag dang chad las rnam par grol// gzung dang 'dzin pa yongs su spangs// ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer ni/ bdag tu brad kyang gong ltar snang// de bzhin rang gA
rnam brtags nga 'i// dngos po rnams kyang rab tu 'byung// chos rnams smig rgyu lta bu ste// yod med rnam bral dag ba yin/ rmi lamasInAltar snang ba ste/ rtsig ngos ri mo phug lta
bu'i zhabo long ba 'dra ba ni// dngos kun gcig gis gcig rgyu ba// rang bzhin rtogs par mi'ung sta// rnal 'byor can gyis yang dag mthong// rdul phran rnam pa
gzhigs pa dang// rdul gyi dngos ba mi gnas te// rang bzhin kun gyis mchog yin pas// rdul phran mchog ces de phyir brjod// de phyir blo ni phyir ldog ste// sgra la sog
pa'i yon tan sbas/ 'a'abyor mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can// de tsho ngal bso'i yid du 'gyur// ngal bso'ayid ldan rnal 'byor can// bcings pa kun las gra'abus
na/ 'dirang pha gir mi si/bsam gtan tshul 'a mos pa rnams// sna tshogs rin chen snying po yi// gnas na dbang can de dag rtsa/ yon tan dbang phyug nyes pa med//
rig 'dzin bud med mang po dang// thub pa rnams kyis rab mchod cing// rmi lam bzhin du gnas pa yin// 'di na gnas kyang tshangs pa dang// thub dang thub pa'i/
bu rnams med// rig 'dzin tshogs kyis dbazhin te// spyi gtsug pa lta bar mi nus so// 'di ni thub pa'i rnal 'byor yul// de las bsam gtan brtson par gyi// 'di ni kun gyi yul
ma yin// de phyir grogs po brtan par gyis// brtan pas rnams snatshogs dang// 'od can rnams kyi gnas su yang// 'dod chags phyogs dang bcas pa dang// gti mug zhi
stong de bzhin du// bcom ste sdug po rab yangs pa/ yid bzhin zhi ba'i gnas su 'gro// de ni mu bdag yul ma yin// rnamashes spyod yuld bzhin min// mtshan ma mad pa'i/
gnas yin te// rtog pas de bas bu ma yin no// 'di ni lha rdzas gnas yin te// thug pa rnal 'byor ldan payi// de bas zhing mchog de 'dod na// thub pas bsam gtan de la gyis//
'dod chags zhe sdang rnam bcom ste// nga med nga yi 'gro medadu// 'dod chags zhe sdang mi mnga' bar// bsam gtan mchog 'a bsgom par gyis// phan tshun u'al 'dzin pa'i
phyir/ gnyis kyi blo narab tu 'byung// yod med rtogapas de bzhin du// rnam shes rnams la kun gzhi'o// bud mdarosmapashas rgyas shang// skya bzang mig kyang mdzes pa dang// sna
legs dngul ba dang du bas sdug pa// smin ma stug cing blta mdzes pa// ji ltar 'a la dar chags pa'i// yid kyis rnam par myos pa'i sams// lta zhing rnam par rtog pa'i che// mkhas min
da pa shin tu mos// 'gro 'dug 'grang yang de bzhin tu// snomaza gnyid kyis log pa na'ang// 'dod can gzhan du mi sems te// 'dod pa can mo yid la byed// de bzhin khyed blo rtog pa can/
rnamar kun tu yod la gnas // rdzug yul rtog dang ldan pa yi// bcings pa 'i dbang du ma 'gro zhig/ jaltar la lag bcas// blo yi spyod yul rnam 'khrul pa// maha dgu dang ba glang dang// rlung de dag
dad pas rnams dang// rang gi kr-iSha sa ra dang// shar pa dang su dang// nAn dang g.yag kyang de bzhin te// mgo dkar rnam dang khyu mchog gi/ ru chen rnam par mthong ba dad// 'di bden gzhan
du ma 'gyur zhes// song stag bong bu sogs pa yi// rwa rnams la ni med ces te// yod dang med pa'i lta ba yang// mi mkhas rnams la rab tu 'byung// de ltar gzhan gyi rA mthong zhing//
bong bu'i med ces rnam rtog 'byung// ci ste gzhan gyis ma mthong na// bong ru mad snyam d mi 'byung// lag pa dmigs pa'i rgyu yi phyir// 'di na med ces rtag par 'byung/ de la dmagI
pa med pas kyang// gdon mi zo bar med la rten// rog cag de rgyal spyod yul la// blo gros spyod yul ma rtog cig/ ba glang ba min ma he rnams// rtog pas brtags pa ji bzhin te//
[7]la ra@#/// de ltar khyod kyis sam spyod dang// phung po skye mched spyod yul dag/ mngon sum tshad ma dag gis sam// shasarab kyis kyang rnam par ltas// rnam gro'amago/
ris 'gro ba 'am// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du'ang 'gyur// tshangs pa'i gnas su tshangs pa 'am// mtsho marab dang gnas bdan dang// rin chanasna tshogs gnas su yang/ dbang sgyur
rnam par mdzes par 'gyur// 'od chung rgyas ba dang/ tu 'am// 'dod khams bdag po dbang can nam// nyi zla bdag bdag gnas su 'am// gzhan yang 'ad 'bar gza' yang rung
sum cu rtsa gsum rgyal chen dang// 'phrul la dga' ba'i gnas su yang// tshangs gnas bcu dang ldan pa yi// rnal 'byer can ni rnam par mdzes// gya nom snang dang shin tu mthong//
'dod med mi des de bzhin te// 'og min gnas kyi lha rdzas ni// 'og min shin tu rnam par mdzes// cung zad med mkha' rnam shes dang// 'du shes yod mad ma yin dang//
de bzhin 'phul gyi sde can dang// zhing bcang gzhan du de bzhin tu// mkha' la 'gro dang sprubs pa bzhin/ 'kho la 'khor ba'i rigs su gnas// grol ba rnams kyi srol da la//
su gnas de dag rnam 'bye'o can// 'dod chags stobs las sngon rgyal ba// de dag bzang po'i sa la gnas// 'di lta'i rnala'abyor ldan pas na// rnal 'byol ni thub pa rtsa// sna
ma 'jig pa'i gyi mo la// ji ltar rgyur yang 'gyur ba dang// skad cig 'jig la skad cig ste// mi rtag nyid kyang rtag pa yi// sa bon ji bzhin myu gu la/ rgyu rnams de dad 'du ba yin/
myu gu gzhan min sangon las//sa bon nyid kyang myu gu min// sa snar rnams las rdza sna 'byung// chos nas dma' rung mngon m 'gyug/ nag dad sar dang 'bros pa dang// gro bdamar
padag kyang ste// 'dam bu las ni slog par 'gyur// rwalas lan tshwar de bzhin te// mi gtsang sprang pa dag las kyang/ srin bur 'gyur gzhan mi 'du mang// rgyudang 'du ba'i 'bras
bu ni// sa rnams gang na'ang yodapa yin// gyur pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung// rdul phran gang dag rgyur 'gyur ni// dngos po 'jig pachadapar te// rnam par rtog la ma rtogs
shig rgyu yi bdag dang nang ga bdag/ bdag gi mchog kyang med pa ste/ bdag dang dbang po yid dang don// 'dus pa'i rgyu ni ma yin te/ phrad las 'byung dang rnam shes dang//
rkyen rnams yod pa ma yin no/ shes can shes pas yul rnams la// mkhas pa'i stobs dang ldan da sa ni/ sdadapung stobs dang gzhon bcas pa'i// nyon mangs bdud
rnams gdul bar bya// sad pa'i 'jig rten dma' bar byed// sbyang gyis bad kan mang po bzhin// srid pa bcom zhing thub pa'i rnams// rnam pa mang las rnam par 'grol//
sud ngas rnam par dkrugs pa ni// 'khor las rnam par mi 'gro' te// srod dang rnam bral thar par 'gyur// de bas rnal 'byor sbyor bar gyis// yun rid yod
pa'i bag chags nai// sbrul gdug khros pa ji bzhin yang// 'di dang pha gir 'dred pa ni// 'khod pa'i lam rgyud dag par/ 'phags pa rgyan stug po las// rnal 'byor rnam
par phya ba'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sta 'u drug go///sangs rgyas rnal 'byero nam phu dang// bdag ldan du mas byin gyis brlabs// rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sa/
bya ba'i zhing na bzhugs pa dang// khams gsum gnas pa thams cad dang// sa gnas rnal 'byor ldan pa dang// bad yod zhing dang stug po ste// rnal 'byor can gyi zhing mchog
dang / rtasangs rgyus pad+mo'i dbus bzhugs pa// rdul phran nga zhin bzhugs bdag gis mthong// rnal 'byor de las ba dag langs nas// sa la rgyal ba de dag ni// stag polizhing
na bdag bzhugs shing// rgyal sras thabs cig bzhugs pa dang// mo tog la ta si 'dra ba'i// mkha' la zla ba bzhin bzhugs mthong// mtha bo'i tshags dang rab 'dra ba//
sa rnams dag la rab sbyor ba'i/ rnamagrol snyid po bdag gis mthong// 'di na du khyod su zhig ces// snying po de ltar sems gyur te/ thub pa 'di ni gceg cig snyan
'u zhugs par gyur// 'gro ba rnams kyang skar zhugs nas// thub pa'i pad+mo'i snying po la// sangs rgyas rnams kyi'angs spyod dang// khams gsum na gnas par gyur yang//
gang tshe mthong ba de dus na/ kyi ma mtshar tshes bsams pa dang// de tshe thub pa lha yi lhas// rnal 'byor yul ni rab bsdus te// thub pas sngon pa zhin bzhag par gyur// kye ma bsam
mas lha rdzas 'di// rnal 'byor can gyi sna tshogs gzugs// sangs rgyas lha yi yul yin te// bsam gyis mi khyab bdag gis mthong// chos kyi smin gyi ting 'dzin dang// dga'
dang mi bag lo de bzhin te// ring song mngon du gyur pa dang// khong byed pa yi ma lus par// sgyu med pa' bar 'gro la sogs// gange brjid can kyang ma lus par// gzungs rnams
kyi yang yul yin pa// 'og min thabs las byung ba'o// da ni yid bzhin 'gyur skur mid// dbang ba yon tan brgyad po rnams// phra sogs che ba'i yon tan dang// thob dang 'dod
'byor bsgrigs pa dang// bdag po dbang dang ldan pa dang// ji ltar 'dod nga ra rung ba'i rnams// thob nas stug po 'a dbus yul na// rnam par gnas shing rab tu rtse// sbrul pa'i lha
rdzas stug po nas// phyin pa dag ba da dag kyang// lhun gyi grubapas nag rgyas kyi// 'phrul pa rnams nirab tu 'gyed// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras su// thabs cig bzhugs
par kun n snang// de ltar sa 'desna tshogs te// rang gi gzugs ldan rnams kyang 'dres// cha las phyir log de yi tshe// bya ba byas pas phyug pa'i gzhi//
shes pas bcad cing mkhas pa'i rnams// thub pa dag gis skyug pa mthong// gzhal med pad+mo 'dra ba na// me ltar rab tu 'bar ba yi// thub parnal 'bya'o bde mos pa// rnal
'byor can dang lhan cig gnas// dpa' ba'amtshan dang thams cad ldan// phrab 'i lus can rang gi 'od// dedag dbus su thub pa'i dbang// khyod ni gnas par rab tu 'gyur// lces
shig lha yis cod pan can// du ma mi 'am ci yi bdag/ gzhal med bya ba mang po yis// zla ba bzhin du rab tu 'bar// thub pa rnams dang rgyal ba'i sa// dga' ldan l sogs
lha las mchog/ a ta sa yi ma tig 'dra// shes rab bzang zhing mtshan mang ba// 'phrang ba cod pan thogs pa'i rnams// gzhal med mang pos gnas pa ste// lus ni rab tu
'bar ba dang// kun makhyen thams cad mngon gyur pa// thegs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang// kun tu bzang bo stobs chen te// zla ba 'ang ba'i gzhal med kyis// stug po gangs
tshan mtsho la gnas// rnam pa du mar thams cad nas// thub pa rnams kyis bstod pa ste// chags med tshangs pa'i khyu mchog dang// grub dang dri ba tshogs rnams dang// mkhas dang/
nges ba'i ldan ng yi// skyes bu'i tshogs kyi bdag po dang// rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun du byos// rnam 'byor spyod pas khyad par du// gzims ba lta bar mthong ba ni// de dag la
la bral ba ste// gnyidadang som sogs bsrabs pa yi// sangs rgyas lha yi rjes su 'brang// mur 'dug kun gyis mthong gyur cing/ de bzhin lha dang tshangs la sogs//
'dzam gling rang 'og man dang// 'phrul gyis sprul ras thubamatho ga 'grobs sna tshogs kun gzugs su// sa la kun nas zhugs par te// cho 'phrul rnam pa mang po yis//
mgon po yashin tu rnam par mdzes// 'al nyal zhing rab tu 'bar// de bzhin gzhan dag phan tshuna'achag/ la 'gayon skyo bral zhing bsgom/ de bzhin gzhan yang mya ngan 'da'//
la lamangal du 'jug pa dang// skya dang 'byung dang dka' spyod dang// byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yi// sangs rgyas nyid dang sangs rgyus
yul sangs rgyas mashas bla namad// rgyal ba'i sras po 'jigs med nga// de dag kun gyis 'thob 'gyur te// thub pa shAkya sang ga yis// ji ltar b.rus bzhin
grogs po rnams// rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa yis// 'di dag kun la yid ches kyis// yid ches gyur na sangs rgyas sam/ thar par 'gyur ba the tsom med// 'khor lo bskor
ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// spobs can khams kyi bdag po dang// tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas su yang// gnas 'gyur la khor gyi bdag por 'gyur// dri med zhing

gi padol/thub pa'i dbus su skye bar 'gyur/pad+ma'i dbus su skyob yang/ brtson 'grus ldan ng 'isras kyis 'thob//brtson pas bdud lasargyal bar 'gyur//bag chag 'dod kyi rgyu las kyang/ bdag dbang bdag po pham byas shing/ thog
N+Napa gcig la rab tu 'jug/ brtson 'grus ldan zhing zhum med pa'i// dgis kyang thub pa rab tu sten// sras ngo yangs pa'i rigs gyur cing// zhing dang zhing du bdag por 'gyur// sangs
rgyas nyid du smon sems na// sangs rgyas gsani rnam par dag/ rnam dag rigs can sras de ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan te// myur du sa ngas rgyas ci 'dra ba// de bzhin
thub pa 'tshang rgya'o// rnam sangs rgyas nas nyer 'tsho ba// tshangs la sogs dang rnal 'byor can// sa ltar rtag pa'i dus su yang// lus can rnams la nye bar gnas// thams
cad sman gyi rnal 'byor can/ jiltar grong dang grong gnas nga// nad rnams r dusal ba ltar// rab tu mkhas pa de byed pa// rnam rtog med pa'i yid kyis te// bcud kyang
g.yo zhing 'gul ba mad// 'di ni rnamar ra rig pa tsam// yid ni nad dang phyir yang spyod// bdag dang bdag gi med pa ste// nor bar mthong zhing mi g.yo'o// yid kyi rnam shes yul
can gyi// kun gzhi kun nas gnas pa ste// bcad dad gcod ngan byed pa dang// de nyid gcad bya gcod nga 'dra yin// lus can kun gyi kun gzhi ni// las kyi bag chags rnams
kyis yig/ 'khar ba nor bu nyi ma dag/ ldan las ma 'byung ji bzhin te// gtsub ma gtsupa stan 'dusa'as min// mis kyang byas pa ma yin no// da bzhin sems yid rnam shas dang//
dbang po don dang yid dad las// sems rnams rab tu skyer gyur pa/ rgya mtsho dba' rlabs ji bzhin no// smig rgyu nam mkha' sgyu ma dang// rmi lam ma yin nor pa'i ng min// sbal
parus sbalasmra la dag dang// ri bong ra dang mnyam pa'i ng min// mni shing las skye bar 'gyur// glog ni dbazhin spyi na lasas// mang la spyad pa su yang med// rdza sob sa rdza mkhan/
lta bu 'o// ji ltar rtswa dang shing dag la// brtecing lhan cig sgra 'byung ba// de bzhin chos la sogs pa kun// sems dang sems 'byung lhan cig gnas// sems kyi lul ni bsam du
mad/ stug na gnas pas 'tshigs pa mthong// lha rdzasasngon mdalhan cig skyes// mya ngan 'das dang nam mkha' bzhin// so sor ma brtags 'gog pa ltar// dus gsum rnam par
sngas pa ste// bod can rtag tu dag pa ni// lus can kun gyi kun gzhi'o// dang po tshos pa' zla mdog ltar// bye ba'i zhing du snang bas// ri rab gnas shing 'khor ba yang// dngos
na@#// ba 'jig pa mayin no// de bzhin yid sems rnam par shes// sems can khams na 'khor mod kyi// de la 'pha' zhing 'bri mi dad// rtag tu rang bzhin
'od snang ba'o// ji ltar zla ba skye 'bri bar// mi shes 'gro ba rnam rtog kyang// skya 'bri zla la yod pa min// gling dang gling du'ang rang tu snang/ de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes la//
byis pam shas 'gro rnams kyang// rtag tu skye 'brir rnam rtog ste// deni zag mdasangs rgyas so// kun g ni 'di 'a ji ltar yang// 'byung ngas tha dad mi 'gyur te// 'jug pa'i rnam
'bashas song gnas pa// bag chags kyis ni bla pa bzhin/ chu klung dbus kyi shing lta bur// chunge 'i klung dang 'grogs med kyi// thu dang mtshan du'ang rab tu grub/ rgya mtsho chen por da bzhin
'gro/ da ltar kun gzhi rnam shes kyang// rtag tu ngag chas sa ldan 'gyur ba// rnam par shes pa bdun pa dang// 'grogs kyang 'dra med pa ste// kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dang//
rnam par dag nga 'i rgyu yang da// chos mthong 'phags pa rnams kyi yang// de ni rnal 'byor ma nyam gzhag pa// ngelasong mi dang lhar skya dang// sha zla lce'ang mi dgas dang// lha min de rba
'bar ba yi// lamargyud kun kyang de yi dbang// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzhi mdzes la'ang// de nyid rgyur ni gyur pa ste// da rtogs nas kyang sangs rgyas dang// rigs dang theg pa gzhan min 'gyur//
mtsha thams cad lus l rtag tu gnas// sbyod long yod la rnam par 'dug/ dpaladang ldan la khyad par du// thams cad nas kyang nga tu gnas// rab dang 'bring dang tha mala'ang// 'gro
ba dog pa thams cad na// de ni kun tu gnas pa ste// lus can rnams kyi lus la bstan// 'bras bu'i bdag dang rgyu yi bdag/ nang gi bdag kyang de nyid la// byis pa rnams kyis ma bor zug/
brtag/ de yi dbyibs la thog mamad// gnas ngan len dang las kyis bskyod// bag chags thog mamed la sogs// 'tsho zhing gso bar byed pa ni// rnam pa shes pa bdun po sti/
yid ni rtag tu rlung dang mnyam// g.yo zhing myur bar rab tu'ajug/ lus can rnams kyi lus gnas shing// khams kyi gong la gnas pa'o// las rlung gis bskyod pa ni// dbang bo
rnams la khyad par gnas// rnam shes bdun dang lhan cig tu// dba' rlabs bzhin du rgyu ba ste// rdul phran dus dang gtso bo dang// de bzhin skyes bu dbangabacas su// kun gzhi gcig
phudagang ste// rtog pa can gyi thar zug brtag/ rtag tu sna tshogs rnam ba'igakhrugs// ka yo zhing chu 'byung byed pa ste// kun gzhis rnams thams cad du/ phyi nang bcas par
gnas pa yin// de ni sa yi rgyu yin par// rgyu can rnams kyis brtags pa ste// de yi 'gro ba shin tu phra// rtog pa can rnams myos par byed// bdag denadabang po yid myos pa'i//
[n ]'bya// yang dag ma mthong myos par 'gyur// sngon gyi las kyis bskyod pa yi/ rnam par shes pa srid pa'i rgyu// sna tshogs gzugs can 'gro ba dang// mi rnams kyi
yang rgyu yin no// 'jigs med rgyal pa'i gsa rnams l// ro rdzosnying pos lang skasang// kun gzhi dang lugs dag ba ni// rgyal sras rnams kyis mthong thos te// kun gzhi
mchog dudag ba ni// thams cad lus la zhen pa ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan zhing/ rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba'i// rgyal ba'i 'khor la 'khor bar yang// sa
rnams la'ang 'grobs mthong// ji ltar zla ba skar tshogs dang/ lhan cig mkha' la gnas pa ltar// rnam shes rnams dang kun gzhi yang// de bzhin lhan cig lus la gnas//
ji ltar dbang gis bsgyur pa'i lha// lha yi bu mos mdun bdar zhing// bde chen dbus na rnam mdzes pa// de bzhin kun gzhi sa rnams la// ji ltar chu dbang mu yi lha// chu krung rgya mtsho
rgyamachid rnam la// 'de bzhin skya ldan s yang ste// de bzhin sams ni rnam par mdzes/ ji ltar gzhal med gnas pa'i nyi// ri rab logs la rnam par mdzes// lha rnams kyis ni phyag
kyang bya// de bzhinakun gzhi sangs rgyas sar// sa bcu dag la lhan cig nga// spyad pa spyod pa rgyal ba'i sras// theg pa chen pos phyung ba ste// lus ' gnas pa rnam par mdzes//
brjod pa'i zhal gyis rtag par yang// rgyal ba rnams ni kun nas stod// nyan thos rnams dad rang rgyal dang// rgyal ba'i srasa rnams khyad par du// sa dad sa rnam dag pa// rgyal ba'i sras
zhes mngon bsgrags dang// rgyul ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras// de dag kun gzhi 'di la brjod// lung ston bung bstan 'gyurayi// rgyal sras rgyal ba de bzhin te// kun gzhi dri med bsod
nams kyis// dbazhin bshegs par 'gyur ba yin// 'di lta bu mi kun gzhi yul// skyug na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can// thub brtson rna 'byor spyod pa yis// rab tu mthong gis rnal
'byor gyi// sangs rgyas dag dang rang sangs rgyas// nyan thos rnams dang mur 'dug gzhan// de nyid rtogs nas mthong ba ni// rnal 'byor 'jigs med rnal 'byor ste// rnam par shes
pa'i spyod yul gang// 'di ltar snang ba ci yang rung// rnam par shes par gyur pa ste// lnga la sogs pas ma yin// 'di ltar nor pa gangasnangab// sna tshogs rdzu grugs ci yang rung//
da ni kun gzhi gyur pa ste// snang ba nor ba'i mtshan nyid du// kun gzhi chu klung dbazhin du// snatshogs snang mngon 'gro bsa mthong// bag chags rnams kyis bsgos pa'i sems/ gzung
dang 'dzin pa rab tu 'khor// des de sgyu 'dra ma yin te// sgra yi tshogs dong smig rgyu mni// skyes dang ma samA yin te// stong dang mi stong rnam par sbyangs// dngos su gcig med mi
'gyur te// rang dang thung la sogs pa bzhin// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin skyes pa ni// gang na'ang ci yang yodang min// dan ga sngags skyam ste/ skyes bu rnams la rab tu snar
skyeg rgya sku la sogs pa'i tshogs// gnyis las par ma rlon pa ste// gcig med par nigasapo yang// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// sgyu la sogasapa rnam nga rtag pa/// 'di ni rnam
T+Tha shis gyur pa'o// sgyu med sgyu zhes bya ba lha// dngos po gang na'ang ci yang med/ ci yang rung su gang yod nga// sgyu mas byas pa'i ng yod pa yin// myos par byadang 'jig rten na//
sams la dbang med rnams me yod// skyemadag gam gyi mo dag/ sna tshogs sgyu mas ma byas te// g.yo ba gang dag ci yang rung// de ni snang min sus mi mthong/ 'di la rnam rtog g.yo ba
ni khab long ngag lcags bzhin te// sems can nyid la mi rtog pa'i// shel sgong nor bu ji bzhin no// kun gzhi kun nas sna tshog sar/// byed pa bzhin du snang ba ste/ sku zhing
rgyu'achi bar 'gyur mod kyi// 'khor ba po ni gang yang med// rmi lam 'dra bar skya shi dag/ rab tu mthong na rnam da ra grol// thub pa gang tshe rgyur nga na// grol ba nas ni brjod pa ste// rigs
dnga gzhung gis bstan pa ni// sangs rgyas khyu mchog de yin no// thams cad chog la me led bzhin// lung yind pazhinatshad ma ste// dngos po ku' sgron mngazhin// kha 'ang nga yi jo na
mkha/ gnas// rnal 'byor lam gyi mtshan nyid de// 'jigs pa rnams kyang rnam par zlog/ bsam gtan nga yi bsam gtan mchog/ rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no// kun nas nyonamangs zad
par byed// lam yang rnam par sbyong ba'o// dam pa'i don gyi spyod yul te// 'gyurang rab tu ston pa'o/ 'phags ra rgyan stug po las la 'badun no// danas
byang chub sams dang sems dga' chen po rdo rje snying pos phyogs bcur bltas te/ gtsug gi rin pa che'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyis/ 'jig rtan gyi khams thams cad dang/ dbang byed kyi
gnas dad/ nor bu'an po che'i snying po'i pho brang na gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams la'ang snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god bston
pal sar// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 'godapa ston pa// kha yodanga'i ngos la dgasazams cad gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ri dgas kyi rigs shig yod de/ de ni gnam smyu brgya stong gis
gi dgas mang po rtabar srid cing thabs la bab pa'i 'i dgas rnams bsad cing za'o// ri dgas dus ma phrug gu dang bcas pa mthong na'ang/ phrug gu'i skad du 'bod de// ri dgas rwacan
mthong na'ang/ rwa dadad/ dra bar bsgyur te gan du 'gro'o// de nas d dag de la bag rton pa dang/ des de dag bag ston par rig nas/ sad cade bsadacing za'o// rA mthong na'ang ra'i gzug/
thubya// su bstan te de dag bag phab nas/ jiltar 'dod par bsad cing bsti/ ji ltar 'i dgas na gtum po cingang tshul can de/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ri dgas gsod pa de bzhin
du/ kun gazhi rnam par shes pa'i ng/ phas kyi rgol ba mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba la mngon par zhen pa bdag gi chos nyid kyi rnam par gnas pa/ 'dzin pa de dang de dag gis bcings pa de dag la/
de lta de lta bu'i nad bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyis/ bdag tu smab yongs su rtog car rdul phra mo yan chad du rab tu shes par byed pa de dgal/ de'i bdag tu 'dzinapa nyid du gnas pa ni gzhan du na rnam
par shes pa tsam du mi gnas pa'i bar du sta/ bdag yongs su rtogs par byed po rnams kyis ni/ yid dad/ dbang po dad/ don du ldan pa las shes pa skye ba mthong gi/ bdag dang/
yid dad/ dang nga po dang/ don 'dus ba'i rgyu las ni ma yin no// dang ra na ma tog dang gos su phrad nas gsung gi khyadapar du 'gyur gyi/ ma phrad par bsung dmigs par yang mi 'gyur ro//
de bzhin du sems dang/ sems las byung ba dang/ sid dang rnam par shes pa rnams ma gtogs par don de ma len par gyur pa// snod dang ba da ra lta bu 'am/ ma ma dang smra lta bu 'am/
sgrig le dang mesha ka ltadu/ gzhan ni gang yang med de/ rgyu dang rkyen las sems dang sems lasabyung ba'i tshog sarab tu 'byung zhing/ bdag mad la phra ba dang/ bskyad du ma rung ba dang/
chamadapa dang/ dag nyid thog ma nas 'od snang ba dang/ yul rnam par rig pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi 'phagasang so rang gis rig ba'i spyod yul ma gtogs par/ rtogs bar
byed pa rnams kyisamidamigs so// 'di nyid ni ri dgas kyi gcam zhes gtum po lta bu'i 'jig rten rnams la yod pa dang/ med pa dang/ gcig bdang/ mad po dang//
thams cad dad/ thams cad ma yin pa'i lta bskyadang byed pa sta/ lus can rnam par 'gapa tsam du khong du ma chud pa'i rnams/ bdag dang bdag gis smra ba la mngon par zhen pa'i yang
ltung bar byed do// mi shes pa'i phyir chos khong du chud par 'dod pa'i blos ( 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor 'khor zhon zhing 'didad pha ga nisarab tu rgyug ste/ dag ba'i bshas gnyanas nigs
rgyus dang/ byang chub sams dpa' dad bral ba/ rang gyi phyogs las rang bas kyang ches ring bas nyams pa 'i blo can/ 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad thob par mi nus pa
theg pa gsum las 'ga' tsam la'ang mi 'jug pa'i rnams 'dzin pa rnams las phyir ldog pa ma skyas kyi bar du/ 'phags pa'i lam bden pa mi mthong bas/ stug po 'dakyil 'khor
gyi skal ba can rnams kyang stug po 'am/ stug po'i sgra yang mi thos so// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa// 'di ni rnal 'byor can rnams kyi lta ba yowaM su sbyang g ste/ 'di
@#// la khyed dang byang chub sems dang la gzhan gyis kyang brtson par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'jug pa'i gtam gyi tshul dang rnal 'byor can rnams la ston
cig shad gi rnam bar rig pa'i yul zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyadado//khab leng lo ltar lcags/ yongs kyis kun tu rab 'khor ba// da bzhinapung de shang ste/
ny+nyA stong zhing bag chags byung ba 'khor// rtswa dang 'jim pa shing smig dang/ thag pa rnams su 'dus tshogs las// khyim du ji ltar snang gyur pa// de bzhin phung po'i gzugs 'de'o// lcag
dang khob 'dong ro langs la// sems can nye bar dmigs med kyang// thams cad sems can lta bur g.yo// de bzhin phung po bdag med nga 'o// rgyal sras phyag na rin chan gyis// gzug
N+NaM mang rgyan mchog la smras pa// mnyam gzhag rdo rje snying po la// rgyal po khyod kyis dri bar byas// rgyal sras 'jigs mdu mkhas pa'i rnams// kun gyis thob par 'gyur ba ni// brtag
bral brtag par mi nus pa// brjod pa sa rnam par spangs pa ste// ming dang ming can rnam bral ba// 'on kyang 'du ba de bzhin te// sna tshogs gyur pa'i sa 'di yi// rang bzhin ci dang ci'i gnas
pa'o (da nas gzugs mang rgyal po yis// rdo rje snying pa 'jigs med la// rjesasu 'brel ba'i skabs dris pa// dadas pa don gzhan brtag pa ste// rdo rje dbang po dngos po gang// la
larab tu brtag bya ba// ming dang gdugs sogs pa'i yul/ yod dam rdo rje snying pos smos// ming rnams sus byas ji lta bu// midan rtse la rab tu gnas// mi mgonamig ni thos pa dag
rdo rje snying pos de la skyas// 'di dag thams cad mingatsam ste// 'du shes tsam la rab tu gnas// brjod las tha dad gyur pa yi// brjod par bya ba yod pa min// phung po bzhi ba mang yin
gzugs kyang tshom nas rnam par brtag/ tsamal ming du brtags pa ni// skyes bu 'di zhes bya ba sta// tsam la mtshan ma zhes bya bar// rgyal ba rgyal sras dag gis gsungs// mtshon
ma med par ming du ni// de dag rnam par rtog mi nus// de bas mtshan ma brtan phyagashing/ ming du kun nas brtag pa yin/ ji ltar ldang dad ljabyed dang// bar ba da yang yod pa min//
mtshan ma med pa la ci yang rung// byis pas de la rnam mi brtag/ de bzhin 'di thams cad kyang// mtshan ma med par yod ra min// ci yang mtshan mar mi rtog pa// mtshan ma yod na rnam
par ba rtag/ rdza dad snam bu dang rtag dag/ gzugs yod pa la rnam par brjod// 'jig rtan 'di ni 'di tsam ste// gzugs tsam rnam pa gzhan m 'gyur// tsam la ming du ba rtagasab
sta 'di la yang dag mid yodamin// ming tshad rnam pa khra' par yang// sa rnams thub pa sa mthong ba na// rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug/ rnam rtog med pa mi skya'o// tshor skyemad pa gzhan 'gyur pa//
mi khradad la skye bar 'gyur// rgya mad phyir na ming mdad// 'du shes tsamal rnam par rtog/ de bas rgyal res rtag par yang/ 'dushes ma yin 'du shes bsgoms//
'di dag thams cad 'ditsam ste// thams cad 'a sa ni gzhan mdad// tsam ni gzugs su shes par bya// de bzhin lus dang gzugs dang dbyibs// cha lugs yid dung sku yangs te//
mtshan ma dang ni rnam grangs gcig/ 'du shes med dang rnam rtog dang// brjod dang khyad par lhan cig ste// tsamadang mtshan ma 'du shes su/ spyod pa rab tu gdags pa ste// tsam la gnas
ta ming rnams kyang// kun rdzob don du rnam par brtags// brjod pa med bar dngos po ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// rnam shes rna mas kyi 'byung ba yang// rtog byed mad
par yod pa min// rtogs bya ming dang tsam po ni// sa rnams thams cad de nyidad// dngos po gang la gang ming gis// brtag ngar bya ba de bzhinamad// 'di ni chos rnams tshes nyid de//
brtags na gnas pa med pa'o// 'di dag thams cad ming tsam skya// 'du shes can gyi dngos po med// de med pas na ming mdud// mingamad pas ni rnam mi brtag/ rnam par mi rtog
zhir 'gyur// bsrog pa tshig pa'i me bzhin te// khur tsas ji ltar khur bskur ba// de dang tha dadamtshan can de// de bzhin tsam ni ming gi khu// de dang tha dad mtshan nyid khyir//
