las rnams sogs pas// yid ni khod du chud par byed/ mngalashas nga sa rnamapar riso// lnga pos snang ba rtog par byed//(bam po bzhi/
lus ni sems kyis gzung ba yin/ mid ni lam rgyud 'dod pa ste// rnam ba shes pas rnam par rig// snang ba gtsed pa lnga po'o// rgyu la dmigs shing rnam shes rnams// spyis kyi gzhan ni
de rjes 'brang// yid la dmigs shing gzhan dag kyang/ mthar chags su ni rang tu 'byung/ yid rung nasakyang gzhan dag ni// dbang gi yon tan rnams kyis byas// dbang ni ljadang/
lhan cig tu/ rnam par shes par b tu byed// 'du byed rgyu dang lhan cig tu// de las 'gro dang 'dra ba ste// smigargyu dag ni gzugs dang mnyam// leg nga ma yin bden pa min// 'di ni/
bdag med stong pa ste// srid pas kun tu drangs pa yin// 'byung rnams lhan cig 'byung ba dag/ thams cad dus yid lhan cig ste/ sams byung yod ces bya ba dang// lhan cig rnam pa/
shis pa 'byung// rnam shes lnga po de dag dang// saM/da kyi rnam shes ldan pa ni// gnas nigan 'dzin dang srid bsgom pa// rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung// lus can kun gyis kun gzhi yang/
sems dang sems byung ldan pa 'byung// kun gzhi red nas de dag rgyu// rgyus nas rgyas pa la byed pa ste// sems rnams las rgyud thams cad du// rtag pa'i gcig las gcig rgyas 'gyur//
sa 'di rnam pa sna tshog sab/ rnamapa'i shesang rnams las 'byung/ kun gzhi sna tshogs gzugs can na// mkhas rnams kyi gnas yin no// phan tshun rgyu sa stongs ldan r// rnam
shes 'khogatakhor ba ni/ kun gzhi'atshol dba' rlabs bzhin// sa bon dgu dang myu gu'i rgyud// chu bo'i rgyun kyang mtshams med cing/ rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung
tshe mod kyi// tha dad bye brag rtog kyang snang// dbazhin rnam shes sbyodags te// mtshams med pa yi rgyun du yang/ rgyun mi 'chad pa rab tu 'byung/ gsum dang ldan zhing gsum las yang//
sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams// bag chags srid pas bskyang pa dang/ dad sems rnam par 'khrul pa yis// dba' rlabasabazhin du rtag tu 'byung/ chos rnams kun gyi 'byung ba
dag phying na yang rnam bsgoms te// grub pa'i gnas kyang rnam bsgoms nas// mnyamakhazhag ro lcog por 'gro// rdo rjesnyid po khyed dang yang// rgyal sras 'jigs med gzhon
ngag kyad// stsag pora'agu bar byed pa'i tshes// thams cad chos kyang rab ston pa// rgyal kha rnams dang rgyal srasa rnams// thabs cig rab tu rnamagongs te// chos kyi mtshan nyid
dpa med/ rmad du byung ba 'di bstan to// rje snying po 'jigs med ba rin chen snatshog sawa snying gi sang ga'i khri la'ang bdug sta shes rab chen pos rnam pasnyoms kyis//
rgyalaba'i sras kyis mdun bdar ba/ skyugabo'i rgyan la rnam par bsgoms// rnam par bsgoms nas rtag par 'di// rnam 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor ston// zlarab ng rgyal ba des bstan la//
bgamad par ni ma byed cig/ zla ba'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das// sprul bar bya bar mang sprul cing// 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsams bral dang// gzugs can rnams kyi gnas su
yar rgyal sras rnams kyis kun nas bskor// lha rnams kyis kyang mdun bdar cing// tshul gyi dam pa ston pa ni// 'jig mad stug po'i rgyan yin no// rnal 'byor can gyi spyod
pa'i mchog/ tshul bzang rnal 'byor spyod pa ste// so so'ang mib Nashes pa yi// ting nge 'dzinadang bdag rnams// yang dag mtha' la mi reg par// rjes su myong bar byas nas kyang//
rnal 'byor bde 'asa mngon langs pa shing// gcig la gcig ni phan tshun lta// rnal 'byor spyod tshul dag 'di// gang gis shin mthong bar gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs 'os pa yi// stan
gyi mchog la 'khod pa'i rnams// kun kyang ngo mtshar rmadadu rnyed// bsam medabasam gtan bsams ba dang// bsam gtan rnams kyi dgos pa dag rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i
rnams// kun kyang sams shing rab tu gnas// phyug po'i rgyan dang rgyal po la// lta ba mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams// mgo la rtsod pan thogs pa dag/ mnarab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis/
yan lag khris pa de dag kun// bya ba'i zhing nas 'ongs pa ste// g.yo ba rnams dad shin tu la// thams cad gos bzang cha lugs mdzes// rnal 'byor spyod pa stobs chen te// lta'o
rjesnyid po la'o// rnam par rtog dang rnam dpyod dang// chos la mos pa yang dag tu// mthong ste de nas de kun dang// phyogs rnams bzhipar blta byas te//
'dzum pa sngon dur ba btang nas// 'jam zhing snyan pa'i dbyangs su sa// rgyal sa mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams// rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor lul// gang la rtogatsanamyos 'gyur/
ba/ de dag bdag las ma nyan par gyis// gang bsam gang gi ji lta bu// brasam gtan bsam byed dgos ba dag/ 'dod dang sdig pa rnams kyis dben// rnam par rtog bcas rnam
dpyod bcas// dga' bade dban las skyes par yang// bsam gtan dang po skya ba yin// de lta bu yi khrims tshul du// bzhi dang brgyad dang de bzhin bsu/ mur 'dug badag tu smra ba dang//
bsam gtan can rnams bsam gtan byed// nyan thos theg pa can rnams dang// rang rgyal thog ldan de bzhin te// kun kyang rtag tubasam gtan byed// chos rnams dang ni sa dag gis// rang
gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang// phung pa spyi mchod tshogs kyi rnams// 'di dag thams cad bdag med de// byed pa med cing g.yo ba mad// gsum po 'dus 'garab tu byung// 'khrul 'khor
de 'ongs 'dra ba ste// byed pa rnams kyis rnam pa2pas// thub baphyi rol bsam gtan byed// stong pa'i lta ba'i lta pa can// chos kyi mtshan la mos pa rnams// chud gzon mtshan nyid
ma yin te// phung po bdag med mkhas pa'i rnams// bsam gtan 'di 'drar bsam gtan byed// de bzhin gshegs kyi bsam gtanadas// lha rdzas bsod nams la sbyor ba//
rnal 'byor can dang rgyal ba'asras// mnyam gzhag rtagangar sam gtan byed// 'di dag thams cad sams tsam// mtshan can mtshan nyid yod pa min// bungapo rnams med kham
yod min// thams cad sa la mtshan nyid med// rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang// de dag de ltar mi gnas so// rtog pa skyed pas brtags pa ni// dadab bo sa dang chu la sogs//
dwangs pa'i rang bzhin mi shes pas// mtshan nyid du yang rnam par brtag/ kha dog sdug dang mi sdug dang// kha dog snangagazhan da bzhin te// 'jab dang in+d+rig pa ltar// kha dog sna mang
sprin lta bu'i// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba las// thams cad 'gro ba kun bkang ste// rgyal ba'i skya mchad ces ba bas// 'byung ba rnams kyang rnamakhagazhigs ta// rnal 'byor shes pa
gzugs can gyis// lus la rtag tu gzugs kyang mthong// gang la dmigs te mnyam bzhag pa// de la dmigs shing rnam bltang// gang dang gang la rnam rtog pa// da dang de ni dmigs
pa yin// rnal 'byor can mad rnal 'byor yod// de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni// rnal 'byor can gyis rnal 'byor nyid// kun gzhis rnams thams cad dang// thub pa 'i rnal 'byor bad la
gnas// tshes dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang// rtag tu rab tu rtogs byas shing// mnyam par bzhag pa'i khyad par dag/ mnyam gzhag ldan pa rab tu ston// chos kyi
rung bzhin rnam bya bas// rnal 'byor can gyi blo 'khrugs pa// blo gros zhan pas rab tu skye// chos dang bdagul 'dzin par 'gyur// yid ms lud dang mi ldan par// chos rnams ston par
byed pani// mtshan nyida rnam par rtog pa yis// bdag kyang chudawes gzhan chud gzon/ mtshan nyid can med mtshan nyid med/ 'dres pa'i phyir na rnam par snang// dadar ba'i rnams ni mkhris
pasel// bad kan tsho skyur lan tshwas te// ma zhutshaba'i rnam pa dang// lan tshul sogasa rnam pos sal// mkhris pa bad kan 'khrug pa las// rims rnams skye bar gyur ba dang// lus/
can rnams kyi lus khul du/ 'dus pa rlung 'as byungab dang// mas dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// thub pas bsdu ba byas pani// tshul sogs yan 'gu drug sha dngaskol ma khu ba
ngag thu dud mtshan gyi 'jig 'gyur ba//lus tsana rnams kyi rims kun to// rnamashes rnams ni kun gzhi la// phan tshun thudrad ma gnas te// gul chos kyi rang bzhin nam// mAtsha/
nyidagacig ni yod gyur na// dam tshis dang mtshan nyid la// mtshan nyid mi ' dri med par 'gyur/ rdzas rnams bsdus ngas sal mi nus// mi langasos bar mi 'gyur ro// sos dang rnam
par bsal ba 'di// mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ste// gzhan du kun gzhi rnam shes pa// rnam pa mang por gnas pa ste// sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin 'khor ba// rnal 'byor brtson ngas brtag
pa yin// mtshan med mtshan can med du ste// phung po rnams las phung po can// gzhan med yan lag nying lag las/ yan lag can med lan 'khrag la// 'jig rten rgyu yis ma byas te/
'bras bu rnams largyu yang med// 'jig rten rdul phran bsags pa yin// phyogs dang gnas su 'gro'o// de dgasor gnyis sor gsum du// ci yang bartson par mi byed de// dngos po yod
buphradapa'i phyir/ rdul phran thamasacad 'du bar 'dod// de tshe yon tan khyad yod pa// yon tan rnams kyis yon tan du// 'jig rten ma byas rang bzhin gyis// 'jig rtan cun la ma byung
sta// 'dod rgyal dngos kyis dbazhin min// chos gsum pas kyang ma byas te/ bag chags rnams kyis dkrugs pa'i mas// rnam par rtog pa mang pos gnas// snying gi phyogasaMn
gnas pa yi// lus can kun gyi kun gzhi dang// sems dang lad dang rnam shes rnams// 'gro ba dag gis sna tshogs brtags// 'gro ba ma lus rab mnan te// sgyu ma'i ri dgas bzhin du
gnas// sems tsam du ni 'jug pa las// gzhan du yongs su bod nas 'pho ste// sa la stong zhes brjod par bya// sems ni dngas pa'i tshul du gnas // rdzas la sogs pa'i yul mad de//
sams ni rdza ma lta bu 'o// sa la gzugasa rnams yod pa dang// lha yul gnas pa'i khyim rnams kyang// rnamapasAtshogs gangasnang ba// de dag kun gzhi snang ba yin/
kun gzhi kun tu lag pa ste// kun tu kha migamago bo yang// cig car bamamam 'ams kyis kyang/ sa rnams yogaba'ang zhu gnas // byis pa rnam par mos byed de// gang gis snying 'a gang
gnas pa// de nid 'ganyis tshul du// lus kun bkang starab tu gnas// stongamin dngos po gang yang med// thos pas jiltar rdza bzhin du// dngos po gang la gzhol bya ba'i// dngos po
dngos su yodapa min// dan+tastong pa'i dngos yod na/ 'jigs med ma yin gzhig par 'gyur// gzhig bya gzhig par byed pa gang// dani rnam pa na rtogs pas brtags// na ra ro ba

tsan gyur pa'i// bdag tu lta ba mi gnod kyi// stobanyid lta ba gnod pa ni// nga rgyalami bden paartags pa gon la 'byor spyodabs stong ba nyid//gnas ma yin par sbyar zhig gsaminag la sbyar tshul nas dud
rtsacig tu 'gyur bu yin// lta ba rjes da gang yang rung// lus can rnams la yod pa yi// lta ba rnam par spangs ba'i yi// stong pa nyid kyi tshul bstanato// stong pa nyid kyi lta gros kyang//
'a ma'i lta ba ma zhig na// gsor mi rung ba'i lta can te// sman pas btang ba'i nad pa bzhin// dziltar ng srogs pa tshig pa 'i ma// bsreg pa med pas mi gnas so// der zhin bsreg bya lta
tshag na// stong nyid ma yang 'gag par 'gyur// lta pas 'gog pa'i dus su yang// mi shes yang dag ma 'byung ste/ nyon mongs thams cad sreg par byed// nyon mongs bsregs nas
rnam par mdzes// thub pa rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnams// yoshes 'di ldan thub spyodadag/ dbazhinagags pa'i gnas kyi mchog/ stug po der ni rab tu 'dod// rikhong rwa yis ni
bang rnams// mngon par gzhig bya ma mthongs// 'di la mgasham bu las kyang// srogachags gang yang gsad pa med// ri bong rwayi gzhu yis kyang// su yang 'thab mo ma byed
de mo gsham bu la su yang rung// khyim gyi las su mi so'i// stong ba nyid dang mi rtag nyid// rtag tudangos dad gcig gyur te/ yod dang med pa'i rang bzhan yang// de bzhin gcig
pa nyid du gyur// mngal na gnas dus tshun chad kyang// gzugs rnams gzhig pa'i brtson pa ste// gang nu'adrad med gzugs yod min// gzugasamad bar lang dmadad// khyad pa
med nga la 'gyur ba ni// ma sgribasazla dang 'od zer bzhin// derazhinadangos rnams stong nyid dang// lhan cage gcig tu 'byung ba ste// pan tshun rnam pa tha dadadu// de dgadagos pami sgrubabo//
rgyu dang rkyen rnams tshogs pa las// rnal 'byoratsan gyis las bsgrub bo// lus 'dibadag yodag yin te// rolas 'khrul 'khor 'dra ba ni// sadapa'israd bus bcing byas shing/ dolul/
gyi rnams kyis drang ba yin// lha rdzas stong pa nyid bshad nga// lta ba thams cad sbyor ba ste/ mtha' rgal stong pa nyid lta ba// rgyal ba rnams kyis lta med bshad//
stong nyid lta ba sbyong ba ni// yod dang mad pa gzhig pa'i phyir// blo ldan mnyamapar gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgom// rnadad shing dang rgya mo dag/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos
rgyur byas te/ sngags kyis ci dang cir 'dod par// gzugs kyi dngos su rab tu byed// gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang// srid dang mig rnams bsgyur byas shing/ mig gi rnam
shis glu ba bzhin// gang gi yul du'ang 'ong ba med// yul gzhan dag tu 'ang 'gro ba min// 'di lta'i rnam shes 'byung ba la// yod dang med ban rtog mi bya// sgra yi tshogs dang de da
bu'i ra/mo gsham bu dang smig rgyu dang// dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang// ming du grag gi yod pa min// stag dang gokhrig dang dom dag dang// rnga rta bod du khyi rnams dang/ dbyi dang/
mtshabadung rus sbal la// nA ni yod du ma yin na// thubam rtsod par brtson ga yis// dedag ci phyir mi brtag cing// bong bu'i rwa'abartag bar bya// jigo de dag sgrub nus sam// shes
ba can gyis sar bstan pa// de dag ni brtag bar bya// rtog pa can rnams 'khor ba ni// blun po 'on pa long ba 'dra// sgrol ba'i rangashos de la med// so so rang rig yul yang med//
[z/ ]gzhan gyisabyas ba'i tshul dag la/ kha par rtog pas ci zhig nus// sdug por gnas pa/ra rnam par rtogs// de la brtags shing dag pa thob// 'a'abyor mnyam gzhagarnal 'byor/
can// dan gnas pa bzhin du snang// lha yul gnas pa'i sunas dra' dang// zla ba gza' la sogs pa yang// rludagis rab tu bskyod pa'i rnams// ri rab rtan cing rgyu ba yin// de
bzhin rnam par shes pa bdun// bag chags rnams dang ldan pa yi/ kun gzhi kun gyi sa bon can// de la brtenacing rab tu rgyu// dziltas la kun brtan cing// sa skya kun kyid 'byung ba bzhin
sems can kun gyi gnas yin te// 'byung ba kun gyi khyad par du// de bzhin na gzhi rnam shes kyang// rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin te// sems dang sems las byung bar ldan// dba'
rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung// dziltar rma bya'i 'ab sgro rnams// 'od dang kha dog rnam mang ste// gtsug phud can rnams 'adabasgrayis// rma bya mo dang langs rtsa ba// dri bzhin kun gzhi
rnam shes kyang/ sa bonamang can mtsho ltar gnas// gran sa[']cad rmas kyi gzhi yin te// rnal 'byor nanagyis rtag tu mthong// ji ltar rgya mtshochu bo yis// nyin gcig bzhin du dgang
bya yang// chu bo rnams ni rgyun mi 'chad// rgya mtsho rdzogos par 'ong ma byed// de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang// zab cing mtsho ltar gnas pa ste// rnam shes rnams kyis gcog bzhin//
ston pa yin// de bzhin kun zhinamashes kyang// rnam rtog rnams dang lhan cig 'byung// de ni 'khor ba 'a 'al byed de// rgyu na de bzhin gshegs pa yin// de bzhin kha/shags pa
bag chags chu bos rab tu gang// ji ltar rin chen ldanub yas/ sna tshogs kun tu phan 'dogs te// sems ma rnams kyang nye bar 'tsho// lon tan dngos su
stobs bcu man// spyod pa legs bshad gtsang ma ni// sa bcupa las mngon 'byung ste// bde bar gshegs pa'i sar zhugs nas// yang dag mtha' la rab gnas pa// sna
tshogs sems can rnam sprul bas// 'jigs pa med par 'byung ba ni// rnam par rtog med sa bzhinano// sosaka ma tog mang bo gzugs// midar bya yi yid du 'ong// de nga ni/
sna tshogs len pa'i semaso// chub shes yid 'ong myos bar byed// ji ltar don mkhas rgyal pa'i sras// 'byung las byung ba ma yin pa// med ba'i blo can de bzhin te//
log par smra la brtson ba dag/ chos dang mi mthun phram can/ lce gnyis log par lta ba dag/ rnamar gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos/ rnam pa gzhan du ston par byed// ji ltar
sgyu ma'i skyasabu zhig/ 'bras bu sna tshogs ston byed ba// 'bras bu ma tog de named// sngags dang khong gzos ze mdog bde// 'jig rten rnamar gzhan nas da// rnam/
pa gzhan du ston par byed// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras// kun kyang thabs kyi dmigs la mkhas/ bsanab gzhan la rjesad du// bstan pa byas pa de dag kun//
bde bshegs rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis// bstan pa stug po'i rgyan 'khastan// khams rnams dug dang bco brgyadadang// skye mched bcu dad gnyis kyi mi// yid
kyi srad bus btags pa dag/ sems can kun tu rab tu 'khor// rnam par shes brgyud kyi tshogs// khams dang skya mchod phung po ste// yid kyi srad bus bcings
byas pashing// lus dang lus 'a rab tu rgyu/ 'di ni 'gro ba'i skyes bu ste// 'gro ba rnams kyi don du bstan// lus can kun gyi skyas bun// 'gro yang 'byung/
bam yin to// khams rnams drug po skyes bu yin// skya mtshod bcu gnyis de bzhin tu/ bco brgyad rnams la yid rgyu ba// dang nga skyar las ni bya ba ste// dbang
sgyur pho brang snatshogs pa/ nor bu rin chen grong rdal dang// dga' ldan lasogs bsams bral dang// mtsho ma'i gnas su'ang de bzhin bshad// rdo da ngo
dengod can la// rgyal sras 'jing/ sa pa med pa'i rnams// go'o dag shes dga' 'bod cing/ thams cad mgo bo phyag 'tshal la// thub ldan snapa 'byed
sbyod pa dang/ rgyal pa dag dang rgyal ba'i sras// zhing dang zhing na bzhugs ba dang// lha yul gnas pa'i rgyal sras dang// rnala'abyor
bdag po rnal 'byor can// yaMshes dbang po 'phrul chen dang// dbang sgyur lhamo'i tshogs rnams kyang// b.lamo sbyar te gnas par gyur// phun tshun
gcig la gcig lta zhing// rgyal ba'i sras la skya ba ni// 'gro ba'i lha rdzas skyes bu yang// mur 'dug bdag smad sobs// thub can kun gyi skyes bu ni//
thub pa'i khyu mchog khyod kyis bstan// 'das dang da ltar byung ba las// sngon byas ma byas par da ni// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi// khams drug
skyes bu dgo ba'o// ji ltar mkha'alabya rjes rnams// rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du// sems tshogs ldan pa'i khams kyi rnams// gtan
ska tshags bcas pa rab tu bstan// ji ltar shing las me dag gis// malce gnam du gnas par 'gyur// bsreg pa gzhan ni ma red cing// klung gis bab na
gtan mi 'ad// bya rjes rnam par gzhag pa ni// mkha' la gnas par mi snangs// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'khor yi// 'gro ba'i skyes b snying ba yin//
bya rnams rkang pas mi 'dong ba// du dag sgro yishugs kyis 'dong/ bya yi rjes dang 'dra ba ni/ skyes bu'i sgo nas rab tu bstun// las kyi spyas bu bstan pa ni//
'khor na rtag tu 'khor ba ste// bad dang sdug bsngal myod byed pa// byas pa'i las ni chud mi zug/ ji ltar zhing pa rnams kyi las// 'bras bu med par mi
'gyur te// don dang ldan pad dag ni// gzhan yang 'bazhes rmo ba med// lha rdzas 'gro ba'i skyes bu ni// rnal 'byor can la rnal 'byor ston// lus can
lus kyi nang na zhi// da ni dag ba'i las byed do// 'di dang phyi ma'i bde ba dang// lha yul gnas pa'i gnas mthong zhing// 'khor lasasangs rgyas rgyus 'gyur
ba'i/ bsod nams rnams ni rtag tu byed// thar dad pa la phyin rnams dang// sangs rgyas bsam gtan spyod yul kun/ Na'agro ba'i skyes bu med na ni// kun kyang
bras bu med par 'gyur// lha ya bad ba thams cad dang// dbang sgyu rnams kyi 'bras bu dang/ de bzhin nyid mthong thub pa yi// rnal 'byor rnams kyang med par 'gyur/
las dang las kyi 'bras bu mthong// las rnams den med ma yin te// 'dod 'bod la gags pa dang// mnar med mtha' dang lha rnams kyi// lam gyi rgyud kyang yod nga/
yin 'gro ba'i skyes bu de yod na/ srid pa'i la khor lo 'khor bar 'gyur// 'khor dang phral na thar pa rgyu// blo zhan rnams kyis me shasaso//
'gupa'i rgyas bu med nani// tshog sham du yang 'gro bar 'gyug bong bu'i yang nor 'gyur te// byamalas kyang til mar 'byung phyi dang nang gas rnams ni/ ldan
tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste// gang dang gang du 'drib pa// de dang dadag 'grogs pa yin/ lha dang lha yi bu mo' tshogs// dbang sgyur rgyalapa'i sras rnams dang// dri za
grub pa'i rgyal po dang// sngags 'chang chung ma'i tshogs rnams kyang// chub 'amachod par 'osaM yis rdo rjesnying bo sras bcas la/ 'dod de gsol ba 'debs byed// thams
cad d 'od g bshas sma// nyams nga med pa'i chos kyi tshul/ rgyudang dang yis brgyan pa ni// ga zha gyi rgo'ab 'dzoms pa ste// dang pachen po khyed kyis bstan// 'ag ba gzu
zla lhag ched tshar gcod pa/ bdag gi phyogs kyi yon tan ston/ shes rab can gyis bstan du gsol/ 'gro ba 'di dag tan la 'gyur// rjesnyang rgyalakha'isras rnams dang// lha yi/
rgyal ba kun kyang nyon// shin tu dka' ba'i bsams rgyu// brtag 'das rtog dang bral ba gi/ rgyudang dpoli ma tog ste// rnapa' bo rnams kyis thub dag bas/ stug po'i rgyananangashad pa'i
pya/ na thub la rnal 'a'i ston// cug re 'dun de snatshegs te// stag na spyod pa'i thub pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas kyi mchog/ thub pa kun gyi dam ba'o// sastangs thubud 'i du ma

la rdo rje sang bos lang sa nga/ rtag pa la du ma khyed kyis kyang// chos kyi dngos nyid shes par gyis// dngos po rnams kyi rangabazhin ci// dngos su stongangan rtag pa zhes/ 'di 'dra'i lta dang ldan pa yi//
thub pa'i rnal 'byar mi 'khrul lo// chos pa gcig du rtogs pa las/ chos bda mngon dushes pa ste// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin yang// dngos pa gcig gis shes da ra 'gyur//
dzultar ji bzhin bsrungs pa'i zho/ sor mo'i rtse mos mdzAn shes pa// dengazhin dngos po thams cad kyi// rang bzhin dngos pos gsar ra 'gyur// dngos po tsa mad stong pa nyid/
dades bo dadas por yod pa'i ng med// 'di dag kun gzhi'i rnam pa sta// stong nyid kun gzhi rnam pa 'o// rgyal sras dru ma 'jigs ma dang sa// rdo rje'i snying po de la snas//
lus can rnams kyis khams kyi mi// ji lta bur na sems tsam 'gyur// 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas shing// 'byung las byung ba ji lta bu// g.yo gshar tshe dang sa nga yi// khamA
rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal sras rdo rje ga nge po yis// du ma'i bdag po'i tshig thos nas// mi 'am ci de dag khyed dag ste/ khyed na dga'o la nga dga'o// rnal 'byor can
gyi snying bo'i mchog yid 'od byed pa gang dris pa/ sems ni skyes bu'i lus can la// khams rnams skye 'gyur rje lha zhes// de phyir dbang sgyur rgyal sras la//
dani dag bar ngashad par bya// de bas mi 'am ci bdag/ ba lang slob dpon bdag la nyo/ jilta' mi 'am ci yib dag/ khyod dang mi ci mdabacas pa/ gsus khra'amang po sna tshogs kyis// nam
mkha' las ni rang 'dong zhing// rgyalab hran gros tshogs 'khor du// pi wang sgradabyangs snyan drus pas// thub pa du ma lcog shAg ces// ban tshun gcig 'gacig kyang gsung bstanubral mang
bo tshog san/ me'am ci dang 'gros satsa zhing/ pi wang de dus smras pa/ 'an cing mkha' 'a[']'gro ba'i tshe/ pi wang yid 'od shin tustan/ dbyangs kyis longs su spyas nga sku// mi 'am ci yi
bdag po las// btubs pa 'dus pa'i tshe/ nyan thos rnams kyags pyadad/ thos de rgyun par/ rgyal sras rnams kyis mthong bar// 'od cungs rnal 'byor mkhra tsan dang/ lha yi rtsed pan
las pa// rnam rtog med pa'i dbyangs kyi gi wang sgrani bsgrags pa sa 'dod chags la bci phyir gyu 'od srungs khyod kyis dal ston// rgyal sras stobs chen myur rlud bzhi/
ridage sa rnams dang 'dra ba ni/ tagosagayo ba'i blo rnams/ bcachags 'dam gyi dri ma can// nyon mongs rnam rtog ngas tshanar/ yab gsang sargyas skared nas// bag chags dri mi yongs bsal
[o/]te/ bdag med gnyis kyis yongs gceng// shes bya sgrib pa'i dri mdan// sems kyi khams las gzhan 'gyur ba'i// de bzhin gshags pa rang tu'agyur// khyod ni dbangacan bra lul ldan// shes rgya che
zhing gtsug lag malus// dbang po 'jig rten phul ba yi// gtsug lag mtshan la khyod ga nas to// mi 'am ci yi gtsug lag kyang// de bzhin gshegs pa 'i rnal 'a byed dag/ sa yi mtshan nyid mkhas
bya la// bslabs te zla ba bzhin gnas pa// mi 'am ci la dbang po khyod/ sudang zhing rnams phye bar mdzes// khyod ni da ltar rnam mdzes shing// thub can dbang sgyur tshogs dbus su khams
kyisams las skyes ba kho go la'i sras kyis dris// mnyam mams mnyam ba'akha zhags// thams cad mAnag mnyan dar gyis/ khamasa rnams gad du+i tshul du// sems su grags/
pa'i skyes bu la// rgyu rnams gang gis 'byung ba yi// de tshul bdag gis bstan par bya/ muniT+Than rnam skyod par byed// khyod ni ma 'o sra ba sa bdag la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams// rlung gi khams
kyi kun nas rtsom/ gzugs la sogs pa'ihaM mtshan ni// nam mkha' kun nas rtsom par byed// rnamashas sna tshogs yul can ni/ bag chags rnams kyi rab tu bskyod// srid kyi mtshams dad
mig dag gi/ skya ba'i sgo rnam byed pa ni// gzugs la sogs pa 'i tshogs kun te// rgyal ba mtshan ni rnam pa mang/ nor bu bzhi chas sna tshogs gnas// dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na/ rnal
'byor ldan can zhugs 'dzin bag/ rgyal sras rnams kyis mdun bdar zhing// goso'i stan las kun la sa te/ yang dad mang zhing phyag 'tshal nas/ rim gror rdo rje'i
snying po la// mchodang 'i dam ra sa mchod pa byed/ rinaman dra bas stong bkacing// yang dang yang du gsol ba red/ dga'od g 'o yang dga'o// dga' ldan la ba gnas shing/ a kyi sprin gyi tshul nyid
nas sangasargyus la zhugs te// bad sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas ru la rnams rab tu bstan// rgyal go lhamobacas pa las// de nas yang du mchod byas te// rnala'abyor tshe can dga'o
dag/ rdo rje'i snying nge 'dzibs yod pa/ lha rdzas dang zhin gshegs pa yi// chos de bdag la bstan pas na// nor bu rin chen snatshogs gnas/ rakra shis gtsad ma' rab tu byas// thugaldan
phags pa spyanasag zigs// blo gros chen po byams pa dang// blo gros mi zad matshutshan dang// 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang// lha yi cod pan la 'byor bdag/ shugs 'dzin du ma blo gros
dang gzungs kyi dbang po'i rgyal bod// rin chen gtsug phud 'phrul can dang// lang dag ji bzhin mthong ba dang/ mtsho ma zhib dang 'byor 'dzinadang rnal 'bya'o slob dpon rnal 'byor tsho// rnal
'byor can lasems snon ba// thub pa thams cad don 'grub pa// thub sras 'jigs pa med pa rnams/ 'di dag gzhan yang mad ro ste/ rgyalaba'isras po 'phrul chen rnams// so so'i stan las kun/
la sa nas// de dag gcig la gcig bltas ta// rdo rje snying ba de la sus// chos kyi tshu ni bstan par gyis// khyed rgyal dang byin gyis ru [.ht] rnams kyis rab tu mchod// na 2 lutshan
'amakhas pa yang// khyod la thams cad shin tu bags// khyod la gsol ba 'debs pa'i/ rgyul sras stobs chen thams cad dang/ rnal 'byor car rna ba 'byer bdag sngags 'chang ngu dmar
thams cad do// rgyal ba rnams dad rgyal sras dang// 'jig rtan rnams kyi ngo mtshar ga ni// mdo kun gyisadi nyid cing// btsan rang ga pa rnam sngangs pa sdug ngo 'irgyan 'debastan nga 'i sa
'gro bdag khyod spobs par gyis// sprul pa sa bshad g sngag pa ste// de bzhin gtam dang sprul bas kyang/ zag pa med pa chos kyi dbyings// so so rang rig spyod pa 'olu la// lha rdzas na sheng da'i rma
'bad// 'phags pa nags la de laM// phung po lhag ma lus pa// grol ba'i tshes kyi dbyings ston cig/ ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs kyi rnams rnam par thar dang dbang rnams dang// yid brten
rnam pa bcud gi/ lus kyi tshogs kyang bstan la gyis// sangs rgyas man kyis nad pa dang/ mgon po rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyalasras kyis/ rgyal phran bzhin gyi sku dus dang//
skra rtse brgya cha phra ba dag/ rgyal sras khyod kyis bshad par gyis// bstan dang/ mgra2 ring/ brjod pas rnam par spangs pa yi/ sdug ngo ning ga dam pa de// ci nas/thub pa/ 'dod po'i phyir//
rnal 'byor pa la sangs sang ga ltar/ thub pa de dag kun ngo ltas te/ 'gro ba'i tshe las rnams thams cad la// brtag par ma nus brtag dral ba'i// chos tshul rab tu bstan par bya//

blo yi mthu lang kun partags na// rnal 'bur cad g ches kyitshul// sngon gyi gzhung lugs nyan nus pas/ tshas nga 'i sgra dang dbyangs su ste// ka la bida'i sgra skad du// rgyal chen lce yis ra snyan ru ra//

k+Sha rdo rje snying po si du bshad// seng ge ro stod las 'chang ba// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis dang// dpa byad ba zad pos brgyan pa'i sa// rdo rje'i snying ngas shin tu bstan// kim kan+d+he sgra la pas ngas/

na/ sgra yi mtshan nyid grags pa yis// mdog dang yid nyid 'gyur du// rgyalasras de ni shin tu ston// sang sang dag pa dbyang r 'a sogs// mthong zhing ring ba'i sgraspyod dang// gnad ra dngar ldan ng ra

rgyal ba'i sas gos rab tu bstan// risha dang de ba du// sha rdza ka shA lA pa ya/ sga skadamtshan nyid ldan nga[']yi// dbyangs kyi thub pa rnam par gsung// ring dang dal med pa'i ngag/ zab cing snyan pa'i
sgra dbyangs te// mtshan nyidams dang dri ba la// langanin sa pa bang chag ren tan ldan ng gi tshig rdo rje snying pe se brjod ba ni// lhun gyis grub nga la byas ra/// sprul pa 'i gzhin du 'byung
ba yin// thub srasardo rje'i snying po ni/[' ]deng slong par du thams cad la ma lag tsha5nyid sgra// 'a 2ga rnams 'asa mngond ra 'byung// sminamadapal ba'i po dang/ [0f38 ]/phrag pa sna rtsa bya
pa las// mos kyi tshul rnams rab ston cing// dag pa'i sgra rnams 'byung bar 'gyug/ rdordzasnying bo thub pa yi/ smon lam lags las byung pa ste// bram 'i ngang pa'i rgyal de bzhin// rgyal ba'i sras/
rnams kun nas 'dus// dbang sgyur pho brang brang ngo na/ kum cadegaka ka chen bzhin// dpa' chen rnarje'i snying da da// rnam por mdzod la kun ltalo/ skar ma'i dbang po skar ma yi//

gza' yi dbus na mdzes ba bzhin// rje NA'i snying bo rnal 'byor can// dam pa'i stan la rnam par mdzes// jiltar ska ra ma'i dbang po dang// zla ba'i 'od du bya brag mad// da bzhin rdo rje'i snying po dang
rgyal ba rnams su khyad par med/ yang dag ji bzhin don mthong ba'i// rgyal ba'i sras po stobs po che// rnal 'byor can dad thub ba mchog/ rnal 'byor pa la ma gnas pa// stanalas 'jigasapar/

ldang byas shing// rgyal sras rnams la mngon baltas nas// tshig dag rnam nga ra smas pa// kye ma thag tshan drug pa na// sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam mi khyab// de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang// rgya' pa dang

gyis ma khyab ston// bya ba'i zhing bzhugs rgyal da dang// rgyal sras de dag thams cad kyang/ rimad bsam gyis khyab chos// dgongasad so phug bya 'os pa yin// theg pa chen po 'i tshul dag ni// mchog tu pra zhing
dkon pa/ gzhan du gyur pa 'i tshul gyi mchog/ [- ]sed [''']yin// rnam par shes pa gat+tha kyi la// rang bzhin rnams la khyad par bud// bdag med nyid ni lnga pa yi// da bzhin khyad par byed
bsan// bag chags spros pas 'phangs ba de// kun ring gnas ngan len pa dang// sa nas rang sems las byung ldan zhing// rnam shes rnams las rab tu byung// lha rdzas tshul 'di/
mthong b dang// gsur bzhin rnam dra ru byang bar 'gyur// rnam dag rigs la gnas pa dag/ sangs rgyas rigs su dedag 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzas 'gas/ de mur 'dug nyan thos rnam sbyangs pa// thob

nas gas rgyas zhing ker chog/ skyug bo dbazhin 'dong bar 'gyur/ ting 'dzin 'di yi yul ni gang// ting 'dzin 'di mi'ing yang tso/ rdorjesnying sagang thob phyir// tshul dag 'di ni stanar gyur// de 'i snying pa'i rkang

gnyis// thub pa rnams kyis phyab byas nas// rdo rje snying po 'jigs med kyi// rdo rje'i blo la bshad par mdzod/ ting 'dzin yul nagapa zhig yin// ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci// gang la gnas shing tshul
ba 'di yang// rgyal sras khyod ni bshad pa mdzod// rgyal ba'i bris rnams nyanabar 'dod// dbang bdag kyang d bzhin/ 'jo rje snying nge 'jigs med kyis// 'khor du 'dus pa tham sa cad nga//
tshul 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dang// rgyalang 'i sras kyi mthu stobs dang// blo la 'dzin pa 'i mthu kun dang// nus mami nus zhes bltas nas// blo 'dzin mthu ldan mthong ba dang// rgyal sras thams cad

mthu ldan gyis// thams cad ma 'gyur mnyan par gyis// gzhan du gyurapa'i tshul dag pa// dbang sgyur lha yu'a gnas pa dang// thub pa rnams la bshad par bya// theg pa chen po 'od can gyi// ting 'dzin yul ni/
'di yin te// de la gnas kyi mkhar/ tshul dang skyeng// bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu mthong// de dag mgo bo de bzhin no// rdul gyi ma 'amar thug pa 'i rnams// de dag rang bzhin
'bag ston to// dga' dag zhes rtag tu gsungs// 2den buldan 'am// lam 'dis nged rnams thams cad kyang// ting de 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba// thob nas sangs rgyas dri mar gyur/ gang yang
sangs rgyas ting 'dzin skyes// theg pa chen po sna ba yi// ting nge 'tshon kyi sams pa// de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang// rgyal ba bsam yas spyod yul can/ sprul ba mang po las// so sa rang
rig sbyad yulang// ting 'dzin sangs rgyas mdzad pa ni/ shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed de// so sorang gis 'bri tshulani/ dgang 'ag/ngas rgyas gnas pa yi// chos 'di'atshanam med pa ste// sgra dang gzug

kyis rnam par spangs// mingani mtshan mas bskyed pa yin// mtshon mkhyen 'as byung ba ste// rnam par rtog pa gnyis las skye// chos rnams kyi ni di bzhin nyid// de'i yang dag gsunga mthong ba// nga yi yi shes gang
dag mtshan// rang bzhin brtags pa ming yin te// mtshan ma gzhan dag su byung/ ming dang mtshan ma mad pa na/ rang bzhin don gyi dam pa ni// thams cad la kun nas gnas// kun gzhi da phyi'i 'byung ba
bag chags rnams kyi gyi khre gnas// de nas snyan ngan 'a ka shugs/ yid kyi rnam shes spyod pa sa pa che ba khyol 0rgyas par byas// rnam shes lta yul can dag/ 'byung zhing phyir lang ldeg pa lo
rnam shes lta yi lul rnams// samasu can bzhin gnas lugs chagal// kun gzhir grags pa ni chu klung la// 'bul slad bzhin du rab tu 'byung// rnam shes kun gzhir mtshor gnas pa//

bag gsa rnams kyis bags pa'i rnams// yul gyi rlung gis skyodang dag/ rnam bar rgyunarma med pa rgyu// chos la bdag med mkhas pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras/ khadaba' gshags da ' gnas 'thob/
mngon dang rgyab ste gsado/phug ro kang zag bdag ma la// rgyab tu rnam pa mthong gyur cing// chos kyi dngos yodam bshigs bar/ nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'gyur dag med gnyis la rang sapa/
rgyal ba'i dus nas sgom par byed// rnamang rab snyoms su so ba mi// tshul bshad bzhin du yang dag mtha'// yang dag mtha' yakhad myong zhing// snying rje mang ra'i sus rnams/ sems can dgos pa'i

rgyun chad pas// de dag sangs rgyas ma 'thob bo// bsam pas kyi snas shes 'di// sems can rnams kyi bde bskyod// mkhyen cing rgyal ba las rnams// blo chung rnams la tshul ston te// dzilcag 'dam las byed bu yis/

bag ba'i mtshan ldan pa khyod// thub pa rnams dang lha dgug/ nye ba'i 'angs spyodargyu yin no// dbazhin 'khor ba'i 'damamolas// rgyal ba'i srasa rnams 'byung ba ni// sangs rgyas dri mdar ba red cing// lha la yid

du 'ong ba yin// byang chub sems dpa' mi rnams dang// lha yi khrod du khyad par du// rgyal po'i khyu mchog 'gyur ba ste// 'khor lo can du'o khyad par du/ lha yul gnas pa'i bdag po dang// dri bra rnams kyi de bzhi/
[5; ] thag chen yon tan ldan pa yi// lus can rnams kyis rtag tu'athob// de phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// theg pa la brtsegs gyis// mthar gyis bdagshegs gnas bab dang// rgyal po rtag tu'ang
gyur bar 'do// kun nas nyon mongs chos rnams dang// rnam par byang ba'i yod pa kun// rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi// sa la kun gzhi 'byung ba yin// spyi dang rgyu rnams lhan cig gam// 'on tam spyi

dad dbang pos kyang// gtso btsun dang rgyu rnams kyi// 'jig rtenarab tu bsgrub par byas// khyed ba can gyi sgrubarjod pa// cinas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste// rgyu med par lad med par 'gyur// byamad ba yod

med par 'gyur// rnam par byang dang tha mi dad// kun gzhitha dad 'gyur ba min// desnyan rnam byang bdad na// kugazhi rtag pa ma yin 'gyur// sngon chad 'jigs med rtag bas// mtha' bzhi rnam par spangs pa
lan/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag/ sprul pa shes slar yang grags// tshunasnying po mi dad// de'i sor gdub bzhin du gnas/ ga sas tshog sakun gzhi ste// bde gshegs snying po dag la'ang de//

snying po da la kun gzhi sgras// dbazhin gshegs pe ston pa mdzad// snying po kun gazhi sgrugs par yang// blo zhana rnam kyis mi shes so// gas thag mkhas pas rnam dag gis// gas las sor gdub byas pa na//
rnam bshasa'i yul// bdun pa'i ni da pa dang// 'byungaba'as kyang rnam par ldeg/ 'phags pa mthong ba'i chos ldan gyi// ge sorang rig mthong ba dang// phyi dang bdag gi 'baka'aphags pa// thams cad
gdang sa mi nas// rje sud yul de dbang rtsang/ dpems dang rnam shes skadabu'adu// su rob saMstangag de dag kyang// rtsa she'ar te pha'amado/ sa ga'i mang gnyeng ngogs/ gzung dang

( bu sogasa' yi// yu'ani gang yang yod pa min// jiltar ri rab ngan ngus shing// re drug bya yi tshogs kyi rnams// bral ba med par rtag 'phrang ngo// dbu2na rnam dag kun b zu la// rnam dag 'phag pa 'a spyod mu la ni//

ngat+tagasur nad mngarung/ sams dang rnams shes sbyadasul du// sna 'a 'osnangabade dag kyang/ rnam shes yer te yu'achad do// sems ni rnam pa gnyis dngos su gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste// rdzapra sAm

rtag par gser bzhin rab tu 'bar/ kun gzhi song ngo la bsgrags bani// rtog pa'i sems kyi yul ma yin// rang bzhin rnam par brtag pa dang// rtogs par nus pa ma yin dang// longs su grub pa'i rang bzhin yang/

rnal 'byor thub can rtag tu mthong/ yid kyi rnam shes mu'u can ni// byis pa rnams la 'ching pa'i dngos// smig rgyus tshogs byung ba ste// 'phags pa rnams kyis dri med gabrigs// stong phrag bcu ba nyis pa'i

rgyan stug po 'a sa/ jisnyad brjod nga 'i mad rdzogs so//bsgyur ba ma rdzogs par bazhud@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa tur sa dusU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bdenang bzhi'i mdo/ sangs rgyas Mdang byang chub san su dang 'a thams cad rang ga 'tshala'// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das dmar bu can gyi grong khyar dang rgyal po'i khab kyi dar gyi de bu gzhan rgyal po'i ma'i dbyug pa can nusam 3bar rtenacing/ dag slong dge 'dun chen po dang thubs cig tu bzhugs so//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dab slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag nga dang khyed cag kho nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag ma shes/ ma mthong// khong du
mchud/ so sor ma rtogs pas 'am 'di de 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to// bzhi ba de gangazhin/ dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes/ ma mthong/ khong du ma chud/
so sor ma rtogs ra bka' ma'i de dag 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to/nga dang khyad cag kho nas sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'phags ba'i 'dzin rim las/ ma mthong/ khong du ma chud/ sos ra ma rtogs

pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to// nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal 'gog kho'abag pa 'ing nang ma sa cha mthong/ khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas lan 'di po 'dir rgyug cing 'kher
bar gyur to// nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal 'gog ra lam 'phags pa'i bden pam shes/ ma mthong/ khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur
to/ ngagoslong dag ngas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rjesasu rtogs shing so sor rtogs te/ srid pa'i sudar bcad ng sa 'khor ba'i skye bzad de/ da ni srid pa gzhan med do// ngas
gyi// sdug bsngal kun 'byungab 'phagasar 'i bdenang rjes su rtogs shing sa sang rtags tu/ srid pa'i sridad de bcad pas 'khar ba'i skye ba zad de/ nga ni srid
bragazhan med do// ngas sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa 'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sar tshugs te/ sridang 'a sradang da bcudangs 'khor ba'i skyab zad d/ da ni srid pa gzhan
mdade// ngas sdug bsngal 'gog da ra 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtags te/ srid pa'i srad pa da nad pas 'khor ba'i skya ba zad d/ nga ni
srid bgazhanamad de// bcom ldan 'das kyis da sad cas bka' stsal te/ bang smar gshags pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to//
nga dang khyad cig khe na yis// 'thab dus pa'i bangand bzhi pa dag/ ji lta ba bzhin ma nong bas// lan ring du ni 'khor bar 'gyur// bden pa de dag mthong nas ni//
srid du 'a srad ra da cad nas na// 'khor ba'i sku bu zad pas na/ da ni sri dang ga zhan mdade// badzem ldan 'das kyisang skad ces bka' sul pa dang/
dag slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs nga 'a mngan par bstod do// 'phags pa bden pa bzhi'i mdo rdzogs so//
